2455 		//determine which is the correct result
2456 		if(result[0]>=0 && result[0]<=1) toreturn=result[0];
2457 		if(!toreturn && result[1]>=0 && result[1]<=1) toreturn=result[1];
2458 		if(!toreturn && result[2]>=0 && result[2]<=1) toreturn=result[2];
2459 		//cache result for next time
2460 		this.solutions[ref]=toreturn;
2461 		
2462 		return toreturn;
2463 	}
2464 };
2465 2466 /**
2467 * Get the value of the a single bezier curve 
2468 * @param {Number} x xcoord of point to get
2469 * @param {Number} C1 First bezier control point
2470 * @param {Number} C2 Second bezier control point
2471 * @param {Number} C3 Third bezier control point
2472 * @param {Number} C4 Forth bezier control point
2473 * @returns {Number} The value of the curve at the given x
2474 */
2475 GLGE.AnimationCurve.prototype.atX=function(x,C1,C2,C3,C4){
2476 	a=C1.x-C2.x*3+C3.x*3-C4.x;
2477 	b=C2.x*3-C3.x*6+C4.x*3;
2478 	c=C3.x*3-C4.x*3;
2479 	d=C4.x-x;
2480 	return this.getBezier(this.Quad3Solve(a,b,c,d),C1,C2,C3,C4);
2481 };
2482 
2483 /**
2484 * @class The AnimationVectors class allows you to specify the 2D Animation curves that define specific channels of animation within the engine. 
2485 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2486 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2487 */
2488 GLGE.AnimationVector=function(uid){
2489     GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2490     this.curves=[];
2491 }
2492 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.AnimationVector);
2493 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.AnimationVector);
2494 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.curves=[];
2495 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.frames=250;
2496 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.startFrame=0;
2497 
2498 /**
2499 * Adds an Animation Curve to a channel 
2500 * @param {String} channel The name of the curve to be added
2501 * @param {GLGE.AnimationCurve} curve The animation curve to add
2502 */
2503 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.addAnimationCurve=function(curve){
2504 	this.curves[curve.channel]=curve;
2505 	return this;
2506 }
2507 /**
2508 * Removes an Animation Curve form a channel
2509 * @param {String} channel The name of the curve to be removed
2510 */
2511 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.removeAnimationCurve=function(name){
2512 	delete(this.curves[name]);
2513 }
2514 /**
2515 * Sets the number of frames in the animation
2516 * @param {number} value The number of frames in the animation
2517 */
2518 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.setFrames=function(value){
2519 	this.frames=value;
2520 	return this;
2521 }
2522 /**
2523 * Sets the number of frames in the animation
2524 * @returns {number} The number of frames in the animation
2525 */
2526 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.getFrames=function(){
2527 	return this.frames;
2528 }
2529 
2530 /**
2531 * Sets the start frame
2532 * @param {number} value The starting frame for the animation
2533 */
2534 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.setStartFrame=function(value){
2535 	this.startFrame=value;
2536 	return this;
2537 }
2538 /**
2539 * Gets the start fames
2540 * @returns {number} The starting frame for the animation
2541 */
2542 GLGE.AnimationVector.prototype.getStartFrame=function(){
2543 	return this.startFrame;
2544 }
2545 
2546 /**
2547 * @constant 
2548 * @description Enumeration for node group type
2549 */
2550 GLGE.G_NODE=1;
2551 /**
2552 * @constant 
2553 * @description Enumeration for root group type
2554 */
2555 GLGE.G_ROOT=2;
2556 /**
2557 * @class Group class to allow object transform hierarchies 
2558 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
2559 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
2560 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2561 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2562 */
2563 GLGE.Group=function(uid){
2564 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2565 	this.children=[];
2566 }
2567 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Group);
2568 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Group);
2569 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Group);
2570 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Group);
2571 GLGE.Group.prototype.children=null;
2572 GLGE.Group.prototype.className="Group";
2573 GLGE.Group.prototype.type=GLGE.G_NODE;
2574 /**
2575 * Sets the action for this Group
2576 * @param {GLGE.Action} action the action to apply
2577 */
2578 GLGE.Group.prototype.setAction=function(action,blendTime,loop){
2579 	action.start(blendTime,loop,this.getNames());
2580 	return this;
2581 }
2582 /**
2583 * Gets the name of the object and names of any sub objects
2584 * @returns an object of name
2585 */
2586 GLGE.Group.prototype.getNames=function(names){
2587 	if(!names) names={};
2588 	var thisname=this.getName();
2589 	if(thisname!="") names[thisname]=this;
2590 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2591 		if(this.children[i].getNames){
2592 			this.children[i].getNames(names);
2593 		}
2594 	}
2595 	return names;
2596 }
2597 /**
2598 * Gets the bounding volume for this group
2599 * @returns {GLGE.BoundingVolume} 
2600 */
2601 GLGE.Group.prototype.getBoundingVolume=function(local){
2602 	this.boundingVolume=null;
2603 	for(var i=0; i<this.children.length;i++){
2604 		if(this.children[i].getBoundingVolume){
2605 			if(!this.boundingVolume) {
2606 				this.boundingVolume=this.children[i].getBoundingVolume(true).clone();
2607 			}else{
2608 				this.boundingVolume.addBoundingVolume(this.children[i].getBoundingVolume(true));
2609 			}
2610 		}
2611 	}
2612 	if(!this.boundingVolume) this.boundingVolume=new GLGE.BoundingVolume(0,0,0,0,0,0);
2613 	if(local){
2614 		this.boundingVolume.applyMatrix(this.getLocalMatrix());
2615 	}else{
2616 		this.boundingVolume.applyMatrix(this.getModelMatrix());
2617 	}
2618 	
2619 	return this.boundingVolume;
2620 }
2621 /**
2622 * Gets a list of all objects in this group
2623 * @param {array} pointer to an array [optional]
2624 * @returns {GLGE.Object[]} an array of GLGE.Objects
2625 */
2626 GLGE.Group.prototype.getObjects=function(objects){
2627 	if(this.lookAt) this.Lookat(this.lookAt);
2628 	if(this.animation) this.animate();
2629 
2630 	if(!objects) objects=[];
2631 	for(var i=0; i<this.children.length;i++){
2632 		if(this.children[i].className=="Object" || this.children[i].className=="Text" || this.children[i].toRender){
2633 		if(this.children[i].renderFirst) objects.unshift(this.children[i]);
2634 			else	objects.push(this.children[i]);
2635 		}else if(this.children[i].getObjects){
2636 			this.children[i].getObjects(objects);
2637 		}
2638 	}
2639 	return objects;
2640 }
2641 /**
2642 * Gets a list of all lights in this group
2643 * @param {array} pointer to an array [optional]
2644 * @returns {GLGE.Lights[]} an array of GLGE.Lights
2645 */
2646 GLGE.Group.prototype.getLights=function(lights){
2647 	if(!lights) lights=[];
2648 	for(var i=0; i<this.children.length;i++){
2649 		if(this.children[i].className=="Light"){
2650 			lights.push(this.children[i]);
2651 		}else if(this.children[i].getLights){
2652 			this.children[i].getLights(lights);
2653 		}
2654 	}
2655 	return lights;
2656 }
2657 
2658 
2659 /**
2660 * Adds a new object to this group
2661 * @param {object} object the object to add to this group
2662 */
2663 GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild=function(object){
2664 	if(object.parent) object.parent.removeChild(object);
2665 	object.matrix=null; //clear any cache
2666 	object.parent=this;
2667 	this.children.push(object);
2668 	//if the child added contains lights or is a light then we'll need to update shader programs
2669 	if((object.getLights && object.getLights().length>0) || object.className=="Light"){
2670 		var root=object;
2671 		while(root.parent) root=root.parent;
2672 		var objects=root.getObjects();
2673 		for(var i=0;i<objects.length;i++){
2674 			if(objects[i].updateProgram) objects[i].updateProgram();
2675 		}
2676 	}	
2677 	return this;
2678 }
2679 GLGE.Group.prototype.addObject=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2680 GLGE.Group.prototype.addObjectInstance=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2681 GLGE.Group.prototype.addGroup=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2682 GLGE.Group.prototype.addLight=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2683 GLGE.Group.prototype.addText=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2684 GLGE.Group.prototype.addSkeleton=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2685 GLGE.Group.prototype.addCamera=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2686 GLGE.Group.prototype.addWavefront=GLGE.Group.prototype.addChild;
2687 
2688 
2689 /**
2690 * Removes an object or sub group from this group
2691 * @param {object} object the item to remove
2692 */
2693 GLGE.Group.prototype.removeChild=function(object){
2694 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2695 		if(this.children[i]==object){
2696 			this.children.splice(i, 1);
2697 			if(this.scene && this.scene["remove"+object.className]){
2698 				this.scene["remove"+object.className](object);
2699 			}
2700 			break;
2701 		}
2702 	}
2703 }
2704 
2705 
2706 
2707 /**
2708 * Gets an array of all children in this group
2709 */
2710 GLGE.Group.prototype.getChildren=function(){
2711 	return this.children;
2712 }
2713 /**
2714 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
2715 * @private
2716 */
2717 GLGE.Group.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
2718 	this.gl=gl;
2719 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2720 		if(this.children[i].GLInit){
2721 			this.children[i].GLInit(gl);
2722 		}
2723 	}
2724 }
2725 /**
2726 * Gets the pickable flag for the object
2727 */
2728 GLGE.Group.prototype.getPickable=function(){
2729 	return this.pickable;
2730 }
2731 /**
2732 * Sets the pickable flag for the object
2733 * @param {boolean} value the picking flag
2734 */
2735 GLGE.Group.prototype.setPickable=function(pickable){
2736 	for(var i=0;i<this.children.length;i++){
2737 		if(this.children[i].setPickable){
2738 			this.children[i].setPickable(pickable);
2739 		}
2740 	}
2741 	this.pickable=pickable;
2742 	return this;
2743 }
2744  
2745 /**
2746 * @class Class defining a channel of animation for an action
2747 * @param {string} uid a unique reference string for this object
2748 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2749 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2750 */
2751 GLGE.ActionChannel=function(uid){
2752 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2753 }
2754 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.ActionChannel);
2755 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.ActionChannel);
2756 /**
2757 * Sets the name/object of the bone channel
2758 * @param {string} name the name of the bone channel
2759 */
2760 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.setTarget=function(object){
2761 	this.target=object;
2762 };
2763 /**
2764 * Sets the animation for this channel
2765 * @param {GLGE.AnimationVector} animation the animation vector for this channel
2766 */
2767 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.setAnimation=function(animation){
2768 	this.animation=animation;
2769 };
2770 /**
2771 * Gets the name/object of the bone channel
2772 * @returns {string} the name of the bone channel
2773 */
2774 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.getTarget=function(){
2775 	return this.target;
2776 };
2777 /**
2778 * Gets the animation vector for this channel
2779 * @returns {GLGE.AnimationVector} the animation vector for this channel
2780 */
2781 GLGE.ActionChannel.prototype.getAnimation=function(){
2782 	return this.animation;
2783 };
2784 
2785 /**
2786 * @class Class to describe and action on a skeleton
2787 * @param {string} uid a unique reference string for this object
2788 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2789 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2790 */
2791 GLGE.Action=function(uid){
2792 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2793 	this.channels=[];
2794 };
2795 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Action);
2796 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Action);
2797 /**
2798  * @name Action#animFinished
2799  * @event
2800  * @param {object} data
2801  */
2802 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Action);
2803 
2804 /**
2805 * Starts playing the action
2806 */
2807 GLGE.Action.prototype.start=function(blendTime,loop,names){
2808 	if(!loop) loop=false;
2809 	if(!blendTime) blendTime=0;
2810 	var channels=this.channels;
2811 	var start=(new Date()).getTime();
2812 	this.animFinished=false;
2813 	
2814 	for(var i=0;i<channels.length;i++){
2815 		var animation=channels[i].getAnimation();
2816 		var action=this;
2817 		var channel=channels[i];
2818 		var target=channel.getTarget();
2819 		if(typeof target=="string"){
2820 			if(names && names[target]){
2821 				target=names[target];
2822 			}
2823 		}
2824 		var closure={};
2825 		closure.finishEvent=function(data){
2826 			target.removeEventListener("animFinished",closure.finishEvent);
2827 			if(!action.animFinished && target.animation==animation){
2828 				action.fireEvent("animFinished",{});
2829 				action.animFinished=true;
2830 			}
2831 		}
2832 		target.addEventListener("animFinished",closure.finishEvent);
2833 		
2834 		target.setAnimation(animation,blendTime,start);
2835 		target.setLoop(loop);
2836 
2837 	}
2838 };
2839 /**
2840 * Sets the start frame for all animations
2841 * @param {number} startFrame the starting frame for the animation
2842 */
2843 GLGE.Action.prototype.setStartFrame=function(startFrame){
2844 	for(var i=0;i<this.channels.length;i++){
2845 		this.channels[i].getAnimation().setStartFrame(startFrame);
2846 	}
2847 	return this;
2848 };
2849 /**
2850 * Sets the number of frames to play
2851 * @param {number} frame the number of frames to play
2852 */
2853 GLGE.Action.prototype.setFrames=function(frames){
2854 	for(var i=0;i<this.channels.length;i++){
2855 		this.channels[i].getAnimation().setFrames(frames);
2856 	}
2857 	return this;
2858 };
2859 
2860 
2861 /**
2862 * Adds and action channel to this action
2863 * @param {GLGE.ActionChannel} channel the channel to be added
2864 */
2865 GLGE.Action.prototype.addActionChannel=function(channel){
2866 	this.channels.push(channel);
2867 	return this;
2868 };
2869 /**
2870 * Removes and action channel to this action
2871 * @param {GLGE.ActionChannel} channel the channel to be removed
2872 */
2873 GLGE.Action.prototype.removeActionChannel=function(channel){
2874 	for(var i=0;i<this.channels.length;i++){
2875 		if(this.channels[i]==channels){
2876 			this.channels.splice(i,1);
2877 			break;
2878 		}
2879 	}
2880 };
2881 
2882 
2883 
2884 /**
2885 * @class Text that can be rendered in a scene
2886 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
2887 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
2888 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
2889 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
2890 */
2891 GLGE.Text=function(uid){
2892 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
2893 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
2894 	this.color={r:1.0,g:1.0,b:1.0};
2895 }
2896 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Text);
2897 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Text);
2898 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Text);
2899 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Text);
2900 GLGE.Text.prototype.className="Text";
2901 GLGE.Text.prototype.zTrans=true;
2902 GLGE.Text.prototype.canvas=null;
2903 GLGE.Text.prototype.aspect=1.0;
2904 GLGE.Text.prototype.color=null;
2905 GLGE.Text.prototype.text="";
2906 GLGE.Text.prototype.font="Times";
2907 GLGE.Text.prototype.size=100;
2908 GLGE.Text.prototype.pickType=GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK;
2909 
2910 /**
2911 * Gets the pick type for this text
2912 * @returns {string} the pick type
2913 */
2914 GLGE.Text.prototype.getPickType=function(){
2915 	return this.pickType;
2916 };
2917 /**
2918 * Sets the pick type GLGE.TEXT_BOXPICK for picking based on bound box or GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK for pixel perfect text picking
2919 * @param {Number} value the picking type
2920 */
2921 GLGE.Text.prototype.setPickType=function(value){
2922 	this.pickType=value;
2923 	return this;
2924 };
2925 /**
2926 * Gets the font of the text
2927 * @returns {string} the font of the text
2928 */
2929 GLGE.Text.prototype.getFont=function(){
2930 	return this.size;
2931 };
2932 /**
2933 * Sets the font of the text
2934 * @param {Number} value the font of the text
2935 */
2936 GLGE.Text.prototype.setFont=function(value){
2937 	this.font=value;
2938 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2939 2940 	return this;
2941 };
2942 /**
2943 * Gets the size of the text
2944 * @returns {string} the size of the text
2945 */
2946 GLGE.Text.prototype.getSize=function(){
2947 	return this.size;
2948 };
2949 /**
2950 * Sets the size of the text
2951 * @param {Number} value the size of the text
2952 */
2953 GLGE.Text.prototype.setSize=function(value){
2954 	this.size=value;
2955 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2956 	return this;
2957 };
2958 /**
2959 * Gets the rendered text
2960 * @returns {string} the text rendered
2961 */
2962 GLGE.Text.prototype.getText=function(){
2963 	return this.text;
2964 };
2965 /**
2966 * Sets the text to be rendered
2967 * @param {Number} value the text to render
2968 */
2969 GLGE.Text.prototype.setText=function(value){
2970 	this.text=value;
2971 	if(this.gl) this.updateCanvas(this.gl);
2972 	return this;
2973 };
2974 /**
2975 * Sets the base colour of the text
2976 * @param {string} color The colour of the material
2977 */
2978 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColor=function(color){
2979 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
2980 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
2981 	return this;
2982 };
2983 /**
2984 * Sets the red base colour of the text
2985 * @param {Number} r The new red level 0-1
2986 */
2987 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
2988 	this.color.r=value;
2989 	return this;
2990 };
2991 /**
2992 * Sets the green base colour of the text
2993 * @param {Number} g The new green level 0-1
2994 */
2995 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
2996 	this.color.g=value;
2997 	return this;
2998 };
2999 /**
3000 * Sets the blue base colour of the text
3001 * @param {Number} b The new blue level 0-1
3002 */
3003 GLGE.Text.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
3004 	this.color.b=value;
3005 	return this;
3006 };
3007 /**
3008 * Gets the current base color of the text
3009 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base color
3010 */
3011 GLGE.Text.prototype.getColor=function(){
3012 	return this.color;
3013 	return this;
3014 };
3015 
3016 /**
3017 * Sets the Z Transparency of this text
3018 * @param {boolean} value Does this object need blending?
3019 */
3020 GLGE.Text.prototype.setZtransparent=function(value){
3021 	this.zTrans=value;
3022 	return this;
3023 }
3024 /**
3025 * Gets the z transparency
3026 * @returns boolean
3027 */
3028 GLGE.Text.prototype.isZtransparent=function(){
3029 	return this.zTrans;
3030 }
3031 /**
3032 * Creates the shader program for the object
3033 * @private
3034 */
3035 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLGenerateShader=function(gl){
3036 	if(this.GLShaderProgram) gl.deleteProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
3037 
3038 	//Vertex Shader
3039 	var vertexStr="";
3040 	vertexStr+="attribute vec3 position;\n";
3041 	vertexStr+="attribute vec2 uvcoord;\n";
3042 	vertexStr+="varying vec2 texcoord;\n";
3043 	vertexStr+="uniform mat4 Matrix;\n";
3044 	vertexStr+="uniform mat4 PMatrix;\n";
3045 	vertexStr+="varying vec4 pos;\n";
3046 	
3047 	vertexStr+="void main(void){\n";
3048 	vertexStr+="texcoord=uvcoord;\n";    
3049 	vertexStr+="pos = Matrix * vec4(position,1.0);\n";
3050 	vertexStr+="gl_Position = PMatrix * pos;\n";
3051 	vertexStr+="}\n";
3052 	
3053 	//Fragment Shader
3054 	var fragStr="#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n";
3055 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE;\n";
3056 	fragStr=fragStr+"varying vec2 texcoord;\n";
3057 	fragStr=fragStr+"varying vec4 pos;\n";
3058 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform float far;\n";
3059 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform int picktype;\n";
3060 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform vec3 pickcolor;\n";
3061 	fragStr=fragStr+"uniform vec3 color;\n";
3062 	fragStr=fragStr+"void main(void){\n";
3063 	fragStr=fragStr+"float alpha=texture2D(TEXTURE,texcoord).a;\n";
3064 	fragStr=fragStr+"if(picktype=="+GLGE.TEXT_BOXPICK+"){gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,1.0);}"
3065 	fragStr=fragStr+"else if(picktype=="+GLGE.TEXT_TEXTPICK+"){gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,alpha);}"
3066 	fragStr=fragStr+"else{gl_FragColor = vec4(color.rgb*alpha,alpha);};\n";
3067 	fragStr=fragStr+"}\n";
3068 	
3069 	this.GLFragmentShader=gl.createShader(gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER);
3070 	this.GLVertexShader=gl.createShader(gl.VERTEX_SHADER);
3071 
3072 
3073 	gl.shaderSource(this.GLFragmentShader, fragStr);
3074 	gl.compileShader(this.GLFragmentShader);
3075 	if (!gl.getShaderParameter(this.GLFragmentShader, gl.COMPILE_STATUS)) {
3076 	      GLGE.error(gl.getShaderInfoLog(this.GLFragmentShader));
3077 	      return;
3078 	}
3079 	
3080 	//set and compile the vertex shader
3081 	//need to set str
3082 	gl.shaderSource(this.GLVertexShader, vertexStr);
3083 	gl.compileShader(this.GLVertexShader);
3084 	if (!gl.getShaderParameter(this.GLVertexShader, gl.COMPILE_STATUS)) {
3085 		GLGE.error(gl.getShaderInfoLog(this.GLVertexShader));
3086 		return;
3087 	}
3088 	
3089 	this.GLShaderProgram = gl.createProgram();
3090 	gl.attachShader(this.GLShaderProgram, this.GLVertexShader);
3091 	gl.attachShader(this.GLShaderProgram, this.GLFragmentShader);
3092 	gl.linkProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);	
3093 }
3094 /**
3095 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
3096 * @private
3097 */
3098 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
3099 	this.gl=gl;
3100 	this.createPlane(gl);
3101 	this.GLGenerateShader(gl);
3102 	
3103 	this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
3104 	this.updateCanvas(gl);
3105 }
3106 /**
3107 * Updates the canvas texture
3108 * @private
3109 */
3110 GLGE.Text.prototype.updateCanvas=function(gl){
3111 	var canvas = this.canvas;
3112 	canvas.width=1;
3113 	canvas.height=this.size*1.2;
3114 	var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
3115 	ctx.font = this.size+"px "+this.font;
3116 	canvas.width=ctx.measureText(this.text).width;
3117 	canvas.height=this.size*1.2;
3118 	 ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
3119 	ctx.textBaseline="top";
3120 	ctx.font = this.size+"px "+this.font;
3121 	this.aspect=canvas.width/canvas.height;
3122 	ctx.fillText(this.text, 0, 0);   
3123 	
3124 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
3125 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
3126 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas);}
3127 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas,null);}
3128 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
3129 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
3130 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3131 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
3132 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
3133 }
3134 
3135 /**
3136 * Renders the text to the render buffer
3137 * @private
3138 */
3139 GLGE.Text.prototype.GLRender=function(gl,renderType,pickindex){
3140 	if(!this.gl){
3141 		this.GLInit(gl);
3142 	}
3143 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT || renderType==GLGE.RENDER_PICK){	
3144 		//if look at is set then look
3145 		if(this.lookAt) this.Lookat(this.lookAt);
3146 		
3147 		if(gl.program!=this.GLShaderProgram){
3148 			gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
3149 			gl.program=this.GLShaderProgram;
3150 		}
3151 					
3152 		var attribslot;
3153 		//disable all the attribute initially arrays - do I really need this?
3154 		for(var i=0; i<8; i++) gl.disableVertexAttribArray(i);
3155 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "position");
3156 
3157 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.posBuffer);
3158 		gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
3159 		gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.posBuffer.itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
3160 		
3161 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "uvcoord");
3162 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.uvBuffer);
3163 		gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
3164 		gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.uvBuffer.itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
3165 		
3166 		gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE0"]);
3167 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
3168 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "TEXTURE"),0);
3169 		
3170 		if(!pickindex) pickindex=0;
3171 		var b = pickindex >> 16 & 0xFF; 
3172 		var g = pickindex >> 8 & 0xFF; 
3173 		var r = pickindex & 0xFF;
3174 		GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "pickcolor"),r/255,g/255,b/255);
3175 		
3176 		if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_PICK){
3177 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "picktype"), this.pickType);	
3178 		}else{
3179 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "picktype"), 0);	
3180 		}
3181 		
3182 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays={};
3183 
3184 		
3185 		//generate and set the modelView matrix
3186 		var scalefactor=this.size/100;
3187 		var mMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix(),GLGE.mulMat4(this.getModelMatrix(),GLGE.scaleMatrix(this.aspect*scalefactor,scalefactor,scalefactor)));
3188 		var mUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "Matrix");
3189 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix=new Float32Array(mMatrix);
3190 			else GLGE.mat4gl(mMatrix,this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix);
3191 		GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",mUniform, true, this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.mMatrix);
3192 		
3193 		var mUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "PMatrix");
3194 
3195 		if(!this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix) this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix=new Float32Array(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix());
3196 			else GLGE.mat4gl(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix);
3197 		GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",mUniform, true, this.GLShaderProgram.glarrays.pMatrix);
3198 
3199 		
3200 		var farUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "far");
3201 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",farUniform, gl.scene.camera.getFar());
3202 		//set the color
3203 		GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgram, "color"), this.color.r,this.color.g,this.color.b);
3204 		
3205 		gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
3206 		gl.drawElements(gl.TRIANGLES, this.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
3207 		gl.scene.lastMaterail=null;
3208 	}
3209 }
3210 /**
3211 * creates the plane mesh to draw
3212 * @private
3213 */
3214 GLGE.Text.prototype.createPlane=function(gl){
3215 	//create the vertex positions
3216 	if(!this.posBuffer) this.posBuffer = gl.createBuffer();
3217 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.posBuffer);
3218 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array([1,1,0,-1,1,0,-1,-1,0,1,-1,0]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
3219 	this.posBuffer.itemSize = 3;
3220 	this.posBuffer.numItems = 4;
3221 	//create the vertex uv coords
3222 	if(!this.uvBuffer) this.uvBuffer = gl.createBuffer();
3223 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.uvBuffer);
3224 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array([0,0,1,0,1,1,0,1]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
3225 	this.uvBuffer.itemSize = 2;
3226 	this.uvBuffer.numItems = 4;
3227 	//create the faces
3228 	if(!this.GLfaces) this.GLfaces = gl.createBuffer();
3229 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
3230 	gl.bufferData(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, new Uint16Array([0,1,2,2,3,0]), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
3231 	this.GLfaces.itemSize = 1;
3232 	this.GLfaces.numItems = 6;
3233 }
3234 
3235 
3236 
3237 /**
3238 * @class Creates a new load for a multimaterial
3239 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3240 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3241 */
3242 GLGE.ObjectLod=function(uid){
3243 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3244 }
3245 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.ObjectLod);
3246 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.ObjectLod);
3247 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.mesh=null;
3248 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.className="ObjectLod";
3249 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.material=null;
3250 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.program=null;
3251 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.GLShaderProgramPick=null;
3252 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.GLShaderProgramShadow=null;
3253 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.GLShaderProgram=null;
3254 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.pixelSize=0;
3255 
3256 /**
3257 * sets the mesh
3258 * @param {GLGE.Mesh} mesh 
3259 */
3260 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.setMesh=function(mesh){
3261 	if(typeof mesh=="string")  mesh=GLGE.Assets.get(mesh);
3262 	
3263 	//remove event listener from current material
3264 	if(this.mesh){
3265 		this.mesh.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.meshupdated);
3266 	}
3267 	var multiMaterial=this;
3268 	this.meshupdated=function(event){
3269 		multiMaterial.GLShaderProgram=null;
3270 	};
3271 	//set event listener for new material
3272 	mesh.addEventListener("shaderupdate",this.meshupdated);
3273 	
3274 	this.GLShaderProgram=null;
3275 	this.mesh=mesh;
3276 	return this;
3277 }
3278 /**
3279 * gets the mesh
3280 * @returns {GLGE.Mesh}
3281 */
3282 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.getMesh=function(){
3283 	return this.mesh;
3284 }
3285 /**
3286 * sets the material
3287 * @param {GLGE.Material} material 
3288 */
3289 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.setMaterial=function(material){
3290 	if(typeof material=="string")  material=GLGE.Assets.get(material);
3291 	
3292 	//remove event listener from current material
3293 	if(this.material){
3294 		this.material.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.materialupdated);
3295 	}
3296 	var ObjectLOD=this;
3297 	this.materialupdated=function(event){
3298 		ObjectLOD.GLShaderProgram=null;
3299 	};
3300 	//set event listener for new material
3301 	material.addEventListener("shaderupdate",this.materialupdated);
3302 	
3303 	this.GLShaderProgram=null;
3304 	this.material=material;
3305 	return this;
3306 }
3307 /**
3308 * gets the material
3309 * @returns {GLGE.Material}
3310 */
3311 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.getMaterial=function(){
3312 	return this.material;
3313 }
3314 
3315 /**
3316 * gets the pixelsize limit for this lod
3317 * @returns {number}
3318 */
3319 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.getPixelSize=function(){
3320 	return this.pixelSize;
3321 }
3322 /**
3323 * sets the pixelsize limit for this lod
3324 * @returns {number}
3325 */
3326 GLGE.ObjectLod.prototype.setPixelSize=function(value){
3327 	this.pixelSize=parseFloat(value);
3328 }
3329 
3330 
3331 /**
3332 * @class Creates a new mesh/material to add to an object
3333 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3334 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3335 */
3336 GLGE.MultiMaterial=function(uid){
3337 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3338 	this.lods=[new GLGE.ObjectLod]
3339 }
3340 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.MultiMaterial);
3341 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.MultiMaterial);
3342 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.className="MultiMaterial";
3343 /**
3344 * sets the mesh
3345 * @param {GLGE.Mesh} mesh 
3346 */
3347 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.setMesh=function(mesh){
3348 	this.lods[0].setMesh(mesh);
3349 	return this;
3350 }
3351 /**
3352 * gets the mesh
3353 * @returns {GLGE.Mesh}
3354 */
3355 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.getMesh=function(){
3356 	return this.lods[0].getMesh();
3357 }
3358 /**
3359 * sets the material
3360 * @param {GLGE.Material} material 
3361 */
3362 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.setMaterial=function(material){
3363 	this.lods[0].setMaterial(material);
3364 	return this;
3365 }
3366 /**
3367 * gets the material
3368 * @returns {GLGE.Material}
3369 */
3370 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.getMaterial=function(){
3371 	return this.lods[0].getMaterial();
3372 }
3373 
3374 /**
3375 * returns the load for a given pixel size
3376 * @param {number} pixelsize the current pixel size of the object
3377 * @returns {GLGE.ObjectLod}
3378 */
3379 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.getLOD=function(pixelsize){
3380 	var currentSize=0;
3381 	var currentLOD=this.lods[0];
3382 	if(this.lods.length>1){
3383 		for(var i=1; i<this.lods.length;i++){
3384 			var size=this.lods[i].pixelSize;
3385 			if(size>currentSize && size<pixelsize && this.lods[i].mesh && this.lods[i].mesh.loaded){
3386 				currentSize=size;
3387 				currentLOD=this.lods[i];
3388 			}
3389 		}
3390 	}
3391 	return currentLOD;
3392 }
3393 
3394 /**
3395 * adds a lod to this multimaterial
3396 * @param {GLGE.ObjectLod} lod the lod to add
3397 */
3398 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.addObjectLod=function(lod){
3399 	this.lods.push(lod);
3400 	return this;
3401 }
3402 
3403 /**
3404 * Updates the GL shader program for the object
3405 * @private
3406 */
3407 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.updateProgram=function(){
3408 	for(var i=0; i<this.lods.length;i++){
3409 		this.lods[i].GLShaderProgram=null;
3410 	}
3411 	return this;
3412 }
3413 
3414 
3415 /**
3416 * removes a lod to this multimaterial
3417 * @param {GLGE.ObjectLod} lod the lod to remove
3418 */
3419 GLGE.MultiMaterial.prototype.removeObjectLod=function(lod){
3420 	var idx=this.lods.indexOf(lod);
3421 	if(idx) this.lods.splice(idx,1);
3422 	return this;
3423 }
3424 
3425 
3426 
3427 /**
3428 * @class An additional instance of an object that can be rendered in a scene
3429 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
3430 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
3431 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3432 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3433 */
3434 GLGE.ObjectInstance=function(uid){
3435 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3436 }
3437 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3438 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3439 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3440 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.ObjectInstance);
3441 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.parentObject=null;
3442 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.className="ObjectInstance";
3443 /**
3444 * Sets the parent object to instance
3445 * @param {GLGE.Object} value the object to instance
3446 */
3447 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.setObject=function(value){
3448 	if(this.parentObject) this.parentObject.removeInstance(this);
3449 	this.parentObject=value;
3450 	value.addInstance(this);
3451 	return this;
3452 }
3453 /**
3454 * Gets the Object being instanced
3455 * @returns boolean
3456 */
3457 GLGE.ObjectInstance.prototype.getObject=function(){
3458 	return this.parentObject;
3459 }
3460 
3461 
3462 3463 

3464 /**
3465 * @class An object that can be rendered in a scene
3466 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
3467 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
3468 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
3469 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
3470 */
3471 GLGE.Object=function(uid){
3472 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
3473 	this.multimaterials=[];
3474 	this.instances=[];
3475 	this.renderCaches=[];
3476 }
3477 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Object);
3478 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Object);
3479 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Object);
3480 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Object);
3481 GLGE.Object.prototype.className="Object";
3482 GLGE.Object.prototype.mesh=null;
3483 GLGE.Object.prototype.skeleton=null;
3484 GLGE.Object.prototype.scene=null;
3485 GLGE.Object.prototype.transformMatrix=GLGE.identMatrix();
3486 GLGE.Object.prototype.material=null;
3487 GLGE.Object.prototype.gl=null;
3488 GLGE.Object.prototype.multimaterials=null;
3489 GLGE.Object.prototype.instances=null;
3490 GLGE.Object.prototype.zTrans=false;
3491 GLGE.Object.prototype.renderCaches=null;
3492 GLGE.Object.prototype.id="";
3493 GLGE.Object.prototype.pickable=true;
3494 GLGE.Object.prototype.drawType=GLGE.DRAW_TRIS;
3495 GLGE.Object.prototype.pointSize=1;
3496 GLGE.Object.prototype.cull=false;
3497 
3498 //shadow fragment
3499 var shfragStr=[];
3500 shfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3501 shfragStr.push("uniform float distance;\n");
3502 shfragStr.push("varying vec3 eyevec;\n");
3503 shfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3504 shfragStr.push("{\n");
3505 //shfragStr.push("float depth = gl_FragCoord.z / gl_FragCoord.w;\n");
3506 shfragStr.push("float depth=length(eyevec);\n");
3507 shfragStr.push("vec4 rgba=fract(depth/distance * vec4(16777216.0, 65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3508 shfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=rgba-rgba.rrgb*vec4(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625,0.00390625);\n");
3509 shfragStr.push("}\n");
3510 GLGE.Object.prototype.shfragStr=shfragStr.join("");
3511 
3512 //normal fragment
3513 var nfragStr=[];
3514 nfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3515 nfragStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");
3516 nfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3517 nfragStr.push("{\n");
3518 nfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(n,1.0);\n");
3519 nfragStr.push("}\n");
3520 GLGE.Object.prototype.nfragStr=nfragStr.join("");
3521 
3522 //picking fragment
3523 var pkfragStr=[];
3524 pkfragStr.push("#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n");
3525 pkfragStr.push("uniform float far;\n");
3526 pkfragStr.push("uniform vec3 pickcolor;\n");
3527 pkfragStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");
3528 pkfragStr.push("varying vec4 UVCoord;\n");
3529 pkfragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3530 pkfragStr.push("{\n");
3531 pkfragStr.push("float Xcoord = gl_FragCoord.x+0.5;\n");
3532 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>0.0) gl_FragColor = vec4(pickcolor,1.0);\n");
3533 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>1.0) gl_FragColor = vec4(n,1.0);\n");
3534 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>2.0){");	
3535 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract((gl_FragCoord.z/gl_FragCoord.w) * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3536 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3537 pkfragStr.push("}");
3538 //x tex coord
3539 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>3.0){");	
3540 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract(UVCoord.x * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3541 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3542 pkfragStr.push("}");
3543 //y tex coord
3544 pkfragStr.push("if(Xcoord>4.0){");	
3545 pkfragStr.push("vec3 rgb=fract(UVCoord.y * vec3(65536.0, 256.0, 1.0));\n");
3546 pkfragStr.push("gl_FragColor=vec4(rgb-rgb.rrg*vec3(0.0,0.00390625,0.00390625),1.0);\n");
3547 pkfragStr.push("}");
3548 pkfragStr.push("}\n");
3549 GLGE.Object.prototype.pkfragStr=pkfragStr.join("");
3550 
3551 
3552 /**
3553 * Gets the pickable flag for the object
3554 */
3555 GLGE.Object.prototype.getPickable=function(){
3556 	return this.pickable;
3557 }
3558 /**
3559 * Sets the pickable flag for the object
3560 * @param {boolean} value the culling flag
3561 */
3562 GLGE.Object.prototype.setPickable=function(pickable){
3563 	this.pickable=pickable;
3564 	return this;
3565 }
3566 
3567 /**
3568 * Gets the culling flag for the object
3569 */
3570 GLGE.Object.prototype.getCull=function(){
3571 	return this.cull;
3572 }
3573 /**
3574 * Sets the culling flag for the object
3575 * @param {boolean} value the culling flag
3576 */
3577 GLGE.Object.prototype.setCull=function(cull){
3578 	this.cull=cull;
3579 	return this;
3580 }
3581 
3582 /**
3583 * Gets the objects draw type
3584 */
3585 GLGE.Object.prototype.getDrawType=function(){
3586 	return this.drawType;
3587 }
3588 /**
3589 * Sets the objects draw type
3590 * @param {GLGE.number} value the draw type of this object
3591 */
3592 GLGE.Object.prototype.setDrawType=function(value){
3593 	this.drawType=value;
3594 	return this;
3595 }
3596 
3597 /**
3598 * Gets the objects draw point size
3599 */
3600 GLGE.Object.prototype.getPointSize=function(){
3601 	return this.pointSize;
3602 }
3603 /**
3604 * Sets the objects draw points size
3605 * @param {GLGE.number} value the point size to render
3606 */
3607 GLGE.Object.prototype.setPointSize=function(value){
3608 	this.pointSize=parseFloat(value);
3609 	return this;
3610 }
3611 
3612 
3613 /**
3614 * Gets the objects skeleton
3615 * @returns GLGE.Group
3616 */
3617 GLGE.Object.prototype.getSkeleton=function(){
3618 	return this.skeleton;
3619 }
3620 /**
3621 * Sets the objects skeleton
3622 * @param {GLGE.Group} value the skeleton group to set
3623 */
3624 GLGE.Object.prototype.setSkeleton=function(value){
3625 	this.skeleton=value;
3626 	this.bones=null;
3627 	return this;
3628 }
3629 
3630 GLGE.Object.prototype.getBoundingVolume=function(local){
3631 	if(!local) local=0;
3632 	if(!this.boundingVolume) this.boundingVolume=[];
3633 	if(!this.boundmatrix) this.boundmatrix=[];
3634 	
3635 	var matrix=this.getModelMatrix();
3636 	if(matrix!=this.boundmatrix[local] || !this.boundingVolume[local]){
3637 		var multimaterials=this.multimaterials;
3638 		var boundingVolume;
3639 		for(var i=0;i<multimaterials.length;i++){
3640 			if(multimaterials[i].lods[0].mesh){
3641 				if(!boundingVolume){
3642 					boundingVolume=multimaterials[i].lods[0].mesh.getBoundingVolume().clone();
3643 				}else{
3644 					boundingVolume.addBoundingVolume(multimaterials[i].lods[0].mesh.getBoundingVolume());
3645 				}
3646 			}
3647 		}
3648 		if(!boundingVolume) boundingVolume=new GLGE.BoundingVolume(0,0,0,0,0,0);
3649 		if(local){
3650 			boundingVolume.applyMatrix(this.getLocalMatrix());
3651 		}else{
3652 			boundingVolume.applyMatrix(this.getModelMatrix());
3653 		}
3654 		this.boundingVolume[local]=boundingVolume;
3655 	}
3656 	this.boundmatrix[local]=matrix;
3657 	return this.boundingVolume[local];
3658 }
3659 
3660 /**
3661 * Sets the Z Transparency of this object
3662 * @param {boolean} value Does this object need blending?
3663 */
3664 GLGE.Object.prototype.setZtransparent=function(value){
3665 	this.zTrans=value;
3666 	return this;
3667 }
3668 /**
3669 * Gets the z transparency
3670 * @returns boolean
3671 */
3672 GLGE.Object.prototype.isZtransparent=function(){
3673 	return this.zTrans;
3674 }
3675 
3676 /**
3677 * Adds a new instance of this object
3678 * @param {GLGE.ObjectInstance} value the instance to add
3679 3680 */
3681 GLGE.Object.prototype.addInstance=function(value){
3682 	this.instances.push(value);
3683 	return this;
3684 }
3685 
3686 /**
3687 * Removes an instance of this object
3688 * @param {GLGE.ObjectInstance} value the instance to remove
3689 */
3690 GLGE.Object.prototype.removeInstance=function(value){
3691 	for(var i=0; i<this.instances;i++){
3692 		if(this.instance==value) this.instances.splice(i);
3693 	}
3694 }
3695 
3696 /**
3697 * Sets the material associated with the object
3698 * @param GLGE.Material
3699 */
3700 GLGE.Object.prototype.setMaterial=function(material,idx){
3701 	if(typeof material=="string")  material=GLGE.Assets.get(material);
3702 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3703 	if(!this.multimaterials[idx]) this.multimaterials[idx]=new GLGE.MultiMaterial();
3704 	if(this.multimaterials[idx].getMaterial()!=material){
3705 		this.multimaterials[idx].setMaterial(material);
3706 		this.updateProgram();
3707 	}
3708 	return this;
3709 }
3710 /**
3711 * Gets the material associated with the object
3712 * @returns GLGE.Material
3713 */
3714 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMaterial=function(idx){
3715 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3716 	if(this.multimaterials[idx]) {
3717 		return this.multimaterials[idx].getMaterial();
3718 	}else{
3719 		return false;
3720 	}
3721 }
3722 /**
3723 * Sets the mesh associated with the object
3724 * @param GLGE.Mesh
3725 */
3726 GLGE.Object.prototype.setMesh=function(mesh,idx){
3727 	if(typeof mesh=="string")  mesh=GLGE.Assets.get(mesh);
3728 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3729 	if(!this.multimaterials[idx]) this.multimaterials.push(new GLGE.MultiMaterial());
3730 	this.multimaterials[idx].setMesh(mesh);
3731 	this.boundingVolume=null;
3732 	return this;
3733 }
3734 /**
3735 * Gets the mesh associated with the object
3736 * @returns GLGE.Mesh
3737 */
3738 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMesh=function(idx){
3739 	if(!idx) idx=0;
3740 	if(this.multimaterials[idx]) {
3741 		return this.multimaterials[idx].getMesh();
3742 	}else{
3743 		return false;
3744 	}
3745 }
3746 /**
3747 * Initiallize all the GL stuff needed to render to screen
3748 * @private
3749 */
3750 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
3751 	this.gl=gl;
3752 }
3753 /**
3754 * Cleans up all the GL stuff we sets
3755 * @private
3756 */
3757 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLDestory=function(gl){
3758 }
3759 /**
3760 * Updates the GL shader program for the object
3761 * @private
3762 */
3763 GLGE.Object.prototype.updateProgram=function(){
3764 	for(var i=0; i<this.multimaterials.length;i++){
3765 		this.multimaterials[i].updateProgram();
3766 	}
3767 }
3768 /**
3769 * Adds another material to this object
3770 * @returns GLGE.Material
3771 */
3772 GLGE.Object.prototype.addMultiMaterial=function(multimaterial){
3773 	if(typeof multimaterial=="string")  multimaterial=GLGE.Assets.get(multimaterial);
3774 	this.multimaterials.push(multimaterial);
3775 	this.boundingVolume=null;
3776 	return this;
3777 }
3778 /**
3779 * gets all of the objects materials and meshes
3780 * @returns array of GLGE.MultiMaterial objects
3781 */
3782 GLGE.Object.prototype.getMultiMaterials=function(){
3783 	return this.multimaterials;
3784 }
3785 /**
3786 * Creates the shader program for the object
3787 * @private
3788 */
3789 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLGenerateShader=function(gl){
3790 	//create the programs strings
3791 	//Vertex Shader
3792 	var UV=joints1=joints2=false;
3793 	var lights=gl.lights;
3794 	var vertexStr=[];
3795 	var tangent=false;
3796 	if(!this.mesh.normals) this.mesh.calcNormals();
3797 	for(var i=0;i<this.mesh.buffers.length;i++){
3798 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="tangent") tangent=true;
3799 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].size>1){
3800 			vertexStr.push("attribute vec"+this.mesh.buffers[i].size+" "+this.mesh.buffers[i].name+";\n");
3801 		}else{
3802 			vertexStr.push("attribute float "+this.mesh.buffers[i].name+";\n");
3803 		}
3804 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="UV") UV=true;
3805 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="joints1") joints1=this.mesh.buffers[i];
3806 		if(this.mesh.buffers[i].name=="joints2") joints2=this.mesh.buffers[i];
3807 	}
3808 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 worldView;\n");
3809 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 projection;\n");  
3810 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 worldInverseTranspose;\n");
3811 	vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 envMat;\n");
3812 
3813 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3814 			vertexStr.push("uniform vec3 lightpos"+i+";\n");
3815 			vertexStr.push("uniform vec3 lightdir"+i+";\n");
3816 			vertexStr.push("uniform mat4 lightmat"+i+";\n");
3817 			vertexStr.push("varying vec4 spotcoord"+i+";\n");
3818 	}
3819 	
3820 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 eyevec;\n"); 
3821 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3822 			vertexStr.push("varying vec3 lightvec"+i+";\n"); 
3823 			vertexStr.push("varying float lightdist"+i+";\n"); 
3824 	}
3825 	
3826 	if(this.mesh.joints && this.mesh.joints.length>0){
3827 		vertexStr.push("uniform vec4 jointMat["+(3*this.mesh.joints.length)+"];\n"); 
3828 	}
3829 	
3830 	if(this.material) vertexStr.push(this.material.getVertexVarying(vertexStr));
3831     
3832 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 n;\n");  
3833 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 t;\n");  
3834 	
3835 	vertexStr.push("varying vec4 UVCoord;\n");
3836 	vertexStr.push("varying vec3 OBJCoord;\n");
3837 	
3838 	vertexStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3839 	vertexStr.push("{\n");
3840 	if(UV) vertexStr.push("UVCoord=UV;\n");
3841 		else vertexStr.push("UVCoord=vec4(0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0);\n");
3842 	vertexStr.push("OBJCoord = position;\n");
3843 	vertexStr.push("vec3 tang;\n");
3844 	vertexStr.push("vec4 pos = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3845 	vertexStr.push("vec4 norm = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3846 	vertexStr.push("vec4 tang4 = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);\n");
3847 	
3848 	if(joints1){
3849 		if(joints1.size==1){
3850 			vertexStr.push("pos += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3851                            "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+1.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3852                            "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+2.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),1.0)*weights1;\n");
3853 			vertexStr.push("norm += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3854                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+1.0)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3855                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+2.0)].xyz,normal),1.0)*weights1;\n");
3856             if (tangent)
3857 			  vertexStr.push("tang4 += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3858                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+1.0)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3859                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1+2.0)].xyz,tangent),1.0)*weights1;\n");
3860 		}else{
3861 			for(var i=0;i<joints1.size;i++){
3862 			vertexStr.push("pos += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"])],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3863                            "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+1.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3864                            "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+2.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");
3865 			vertexStr.push("norm += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"])].xyz,normal),\n"+
3866                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+1.0)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3867                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+2.0)].xyz,normal),1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");
3868             if (tangent)
3869 			  vertexStr.push("tang4 += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"])].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3870                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+1.0)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3871                            "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints1["+i+"]+2.0)].xyz,tangent),1.0)*weights1["+i+"];\n");
3872 			}
3873 		}
3874 
3875 		if(joints2){
3876 		    if(joints2.size==1){
3877 			    vertexStr.push("pos += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3878                                "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+1.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3879                                "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+2.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),1.0)*weights2;\n");
3880 			    vertexStr.push("norm += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3881                                "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+1.0)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3882                                "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+2.0)].xyz,normal),1.0)*weights2;\n");
3883                 if (tangent)
3884 			        vertexStr.push("tang4 += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3885                                    "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+1.0)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3886                                    "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2+2.0)].xyz,tangent),1.0)*weights2;\n");
3887 		    }else{
3888 			    for(var i=0;i<joints2.size;i++){
3889 			        vertexStr.push("pos += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"])],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3890                                    "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+1.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),\n"+
3891                                    "              dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+2.0)],vec4(position,1.0)),1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");
3892 			        vertexStr.push("norm += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"])].xyz,normal),\n"+
3893                                    "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+1.0)].xyz,normal),\n"+
3894                                    "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+2.0)].xyz,normal),1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");
3895             if (tangent)
3896 			    vertexStr.push("tang4 += vec4(dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"])].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3897                                "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+1.0)].xyz,tangent),\n"+
3898                                "               dot(jointMat[int(3.0*joints2["+i+"]+2.0)].xyz,tangent),1.0)*weights2["+i+"];\n");
3899 			    }
3900 		    }
3901 		}
3902 		
3903 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3904 			vertexStr.push("spotcoord"+i+"=lightmat"+i+"*vec4(pos.xyz,1.0);\n");
3905 		}
3906 		vertexStr.push("pos = worldView * vec4(pos.xyz, 1.0);\n");
3907 		vertexStr.push("norm = worldInverseTranspose * vec4(norm.xyz, 1.0);\n");
3908 		if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang = (worldInverseTranspose*vec4(tang4.xyz,1.0)).xyz;\n");
3909 	}else{	
3910 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
3911 			vertexStr.push("spotcoord"+i+"=lightmat"+i+"*vec4(position,1.0);\n");
3912 		}
3913 		vertexStr.push("pos = worldView * vec4(position, 1.0);\n");
3914 		vertexStr.push("norm = worldInverseTranspose * vec4(normal, 1.0);\n");  
3915 		if(tangent) vertexStr.push("tang = (worldInverseTranspose*vec4(tangent,1.0)).xyz;\n");
3916 	}
3917 	
3918     
3919 	vertexStr.push("gl_Position = projection * pos;\n");
3920 	vertexStr.push("gl_PointSize="+(this.pointSize.toFixed(5))+";\n");
3921 	
3922 	vertexStr.push("eyevec = -pos.xyz;\n");
3923 	
3924 	vertexStr.push("t = normalize(tang);");
3925 	vertexStr.push("n = normalize(norm.rgb);");
3926 
3927 	
3928 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){			
3929 			if(lights[i].getType()==GLGE.L_DIR){
3930 				vertexStr.push("lightvec"+i+" = -lightdir"+i+";\n");
3931 			}else{
3932 3933 				vertexStr.push("lightvec"+i+" = -(lightpos"+i+"-pos.xyz);\n");
3934 			}
3935 			
3936 			vertexStr.push("lightdist"+i+" = length(lightpos"+i+".xyz-pos.xyz);\n");
3937 	}
3938 	if(this.material) vertexStr.push(this.material.getLayerCoords(vertexStr));
3939 	vertexStr.push("}\n");
3940 	
3941 	vertexStr=vertexStr.join("");
3942 	//Fragment Shader
3943 	if(!this.material){
3944 		var fragStr=[];
3945 		fragStr.push("void main(void)\n");
3946 		fragStr.push("{\n");
3947 		fragStr.push("gl_FragColor = vec4(1.0,1.0,1.0,1.0);\n");
3948 		fragStr.push("}\n");
3949 		fragStr=fragStr.join("");
3950 	}
3951 	else
3952 	{
3953 		fragStr=this.material.getFragmentShader(lights);
3954 	}
3955 3956 	
3957 	this.GLFragmentShaderNormal=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.nfragStr);
3958 	this.GLFragmentShaderShadow=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.shfragStr);
3959 	this.GLFragmentShaderPick=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,this.pkfragStr);
3960 	this.GLFragmentShader=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.FRAGMENT_SHADER,fragStr);
3961 	this.GLVertexShader=GLGE.getGLShader(gl,gl.VERTEX_SHADER,vertexStr);
3962 
3963 	this.GLShaderProgramPick=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderPick);
3964 	this.GLShaderProgramShadow=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderShadow);
3965 	this.GLShaderProgramNormal=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShaderNormal);
3966 	this.GLShaderProgram=GLGE.getGLProgram(gl,this.GLVertexShader,this.GLFragmentShader);
3967 }
3968 /**
3969 * creates shader programs;
3970 * @param multimaterial the multimaterial object to create the shader programs for
3971 * @private
3972 */
3973 GLGE.Object.prototype.createShaders=function(multimaterial){
3974 	if(this.gl){
3975 		this.mesh=multimaterial.mesh;
3976 		this.material=multimaterial.material;
3977 		this.GLGenerateShader(this.gl);
3978 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgramPick=this.GLShaderProgramPick;
3979 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgramShadow=this.GLShaderProgramShadow;
3980 		multimaterial.GLShaderProgram=this.GLShaderProgram;
3981 	}
3982 }
3983 
3984 /**
3985 * Sets the shader program uniforms ready for rendering
3986 * @private
3987 */
3988 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLUniforms=function(gl,renderType,pickindex){
3989 	var program;
3990 	switch(renderType){
3991 		case GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT:
3992 			program=this.GLShaderProgram;
3993 			break;
3994 		case GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW:
3995 			program=this.GLShaderProgramShadow;
3996 			break;
3997 		case GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL:
3998 			program=this.GLShaderProgramNormal;
3999 			break;
4000 		case GLGE.RENDER_PICK:
4001 			program=this.GLShaderProgramPick;
4002 			var b = pickindex >> 16 & 0xFF; 
4003 			var g = pickindex >> 8 & 0xFF; 
4004 			var r = pickindex & 0xFF;
4005 			GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "pickcolor"), r/255,g/255,b/255);
4006 			break;
4007 	}
4008 	
4009 	if(!program.caches) program.caches={};
4010 	if(!program.glarrays) program.glarrays={};
4011 	var pc=program.caches;
4012 	var pgl=program.glarrays;
4013 	var scene=gl.scene;
4014 	var camera=scene.camera;
4015 
4016 	if(pc.far!=camera.far){
4017 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "far"), camera.far);
4018 		pc.far=camera.far;
4019 	}
4020 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
4021 		if(pc.ambientColor!=scene.ambientColor){
4022 			var ambientColor=scene.ambientColor;
4023 			GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "amb"), ambientColor.r,ambientColor.g,ambientColor.b);
4024 			pc.ambientColor=ambientColor;
4025 		}
4026 		if(pc.fogFar!=scene.fogFar){
4027 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogfar"), scene.fogFar);
4028 			pc.fogFar=scene.fogFar;
4029 		}
4030 		if(pc.fogNear!=scene.fogNear){
4031 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fognear"), scene.fogNear);
4032 			pc.fogNear=scene.fogNear;
4033 		}
4034 		if(pc.fogType!=scene.fogType){
4035 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogtype"), scene.fogType);
4036 			pc.fogType=scene.fogType;
4037 		}
4038 		if(pc.fogType!=scene.fogcolor){
4039 			GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "fogcolor"), scene.fogColor.r,scene.fogColor.g,scene.fogColor.b);
4040 			pc.fogcolor=scene.fogcolor;
4041 		}
4042 	}
4043 
4044 			
4045 	
4046 	var cameraMatrix=camera.getViewMatrix();
4047 	var modelMatrix=this.getModelMatrix();
4048 	
4049 	if(!pc.mvMatrix) pc.mvMatrix={cameraMatrix:null,modelMatrix:null};
4050 	var mvCache=pc.mvMatrix;
4051 	
4052 	if(mvCache.camerMatrix!=cameraMatrix || mvCache.modelMatrix!=modelMatrix){
4053 		//generate and set the modelView matrix
4054 		if(!this.caches.mvMatrix) this.caches.mvMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,modelMatrix);
4055 		mvMatrix=this.caches.mvMatrix;
4056 		
4057 		if(this.mesh.joints){
4058 		mvMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4059 		}
4060 	
4061 		var mvUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "worldView");
4062 		if(!pgl.mvMatrix){
4063 			pgl.mvMatrixT=new Float32Array(GLGE.transposeMat4(mvMatrix));
4064 		}else{
4065 			GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(mvMatrix),pgl.mvMatrixT);
4066 		}
4067 		pgl.mvMatrix=mvMatrix;
4068 		GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",mvUniform, false, program.glarrays.mvMatrixT);
4069 	    
4070 		//invCamera matrix
4071 		var icUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "envMat");
4072 		if(icUniform){
4073 			if(!this.caches.envMat){
4074 				var envMat = GLGE.inverseMat4(mvMatrix);
4075 				envMat[3]=0;
4076 				envMat[7]=0;
4077 				envMat[11]=0;
4078 				this.caches.envMat = envMat;
4079 			}
4080 			envMat=this.caches.envMat;
4081 			
4082 			if(!program.glarrays.envMat){
4083 				pgl.envMatT=new Float32Array(GLGE.transposeMat4(envMat));
4084 			}else{
4085 				GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(envMat),pgl.envMatT);	
4086 			}
4087 			pgl.envMat=envMat;
4088 				
4089 			GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",icUniform, false, pgl.envMatT);
4090 		}
4091 		//normalising matrix
4092 		if(!this.caches.normalMatrix){
4093 			var normalMatrix = GLGE.inverseMat4(mvMatrix);
4094 			this.caches.normalMatrix = normalMatrix;
4095 		}
4096 		normalMatrix=this.caches.normalMatrix;
4097 		var nUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "worldInverseTranspose");
4098 		
4099 		if(!pgl.normalMatrix) pgl.normalMatrix=new Float32Array(normalMatrix);
4100 			else GLGE.mat4gl(normalMatrix,pgl.normalMatrix);	
4101 		GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",nUniform, false, pgl.normalMatrix);
4102 		
4103 		var cUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "view");
4104 		if(!pgl.cameraMatrix){
4105 			pgl.cameraMatrixT=new Float32Array(GLGE.transposeMat4(cameraMatrix));
4106 		}else{
4107 			GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(cameraMatrix),pgl.cameraMatrixT);	
4108 		}
4109 		pgl.cameraMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4110 			
4111 		GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",cUniform, false, pgl.cameraMatrixT);
4112 		
4113 		mvCache.camerMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4114 		mvCache.modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4115 	}
4116 
4117 
4118 	var pUniform = GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "projection");
4119 	if(!pgl.pMatrix){
4120 		pgl.pMatrixT=new Float32Array(GLGE.transposeMat4(camera.getProjectionMatrix()));
4121 	}else{
4122 		GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(camera.getProjectionMatrix()),pgl.pMatrixT);	
4123 	}
4124 	pgl.pMatrix=camera.getProjectionMatrix();
4125 			
4126 	GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",pUniform, false, pgl.pMatrixT);
4127 
4128 	
4129 	//light
4130 	//dont' need lighting for picking
4131 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT || renderType==GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW){
4132 		var pos,lpos;
4133 		var lights=gl.lights
4134 		if(!pc.lights) pc.lights=[];
4135 		if(!pgl.lights) pgl.lights=[];
4136 		if(!this.caches.lights) this.caches.lights=[];
4137 		var lightCache=pc.lights;
4138 		for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
4139 			if(!lightCache[i]) lightCache[i]={modelMatrix:null,cameraMatrix:null};
4140 			if(lightCache[i].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix || lightCache[i].cameraMatrix!=cameraMatrix){
4141 				if(!this.caches.lights[i])this.caches.lights[i]={};
4142 				
4143 				if(!this.caches.lights[i].pos) this.caches.lights[i].pos=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,lights[i].getModelMatrix()),[0,0,0,1]);
4144 				pos=this.caches.lights[i].pos;
4145 				GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightpos"+i), pos[0],pos[1],pos[2]);		
4146 				
4147 				
4148 				if(!this.caches.lights[i].lpos) this.caches.lights[i].lpos=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameraMatrix,lights[i].getModelMatrix()),[0,0,1,1]);
4149 				lpos=this.caches.lights[i].lpos;
4150 				GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightdir"+i),lpos[0]-pos[0],lpos[1]-pos[1],lpos[2]-pos[2]);
4151 				
4152 				if(lights[i].s_cache){
4153 					var lightmat=GLGE.mulMat4(lights[i].s_cache.smatrix,modelMatrix);
4154 					if(!pgl.lights[i]) pgl.lights[i]=new Float32Array(lightmat);
4155 						else GLGE.mat4gl(lightmat,pgl.lights[i]);
4156 					GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "lightmat"+i), true,pgl.lights[i]);
4157 					lightCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4158 					lightCache[i].cameraMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4159 				}else{
4160 					lightCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4161 					lightCache[i].cameraMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4162 				}
4163 			}
4164 		}
4165 	}
4166 	
4167 	if(this.mesh.joints){
4168 		if(!pc.joints) pc.joints=[];
4169 		if(!pgl.joints) pgl.joints=[];
4170 		if(!pgl.jointsT) pgl.jointsT=[];
4171 		if(!pgl.jointsinv) pgl.jointsinv=[];
4172         if ((!pgl.jointsCombined)||pgl.jointsCombined.length!=this.mesh.joints.length*12) 
4173             pgl.jointsCombined = new Float32Array(this.mesh.joints.length*12);
4174 		var jointCache=pc.joints;
4175 		var ident=GLGE.identMatrix();
4176 		for(i=0;i<this.mesh.joints.length;i++){
4177 			if(!jointCache[i]) jointCache[i]={modelMatrix:null,invBind:null};
4178 			if(typeof this.mesh.joints[i]=="string"){
4179 				if(!this.bones) this.bones=this.skeleton.getNames();
4180 				if(this.bones){
4181 					var modelMatrix=this.bones[this.mesh.joints[i]].getModelMatrix();
4182 				}
4183 			}else{
4184 				var modelMatrix=this.mesh.joints[i].getModelMatrix();
4185 			}
4186 			var invBind=this.mesh.invBind[i];
4187 			if(jointCache[i].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix || jointCache[i].invBind!=invBind){
4188 				var jointmat=GLGE.mulMat4(modelMatrix,invBind);
4189 				if(!pgl.joints[i]){
4190 					pgl.jointsT[i]=new Float32Array(GLGE.transposeMat4(jointmat));
4191 				}else{
4192 					GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(jointmat),pgl.jointsT[i]);	
4193 				}
4194 				pgl.joints[i]=jointmat;
4195 				
4196 				if(!pgl.jointsinv[i]) pgl.jointsinv[i]=new Float32Array(GLGE.inverseMat4(jointmat));
4197 				else GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.inverseMat4(jointmat),pgl.jointsinv[i]);		
4198 				var mat=pgl.jointsT[i];
4199                 var combinedMat=pgl.jointsCombined;
4200                 combinedMat[i*12]=mat[0];
4201                 combinedMat[i*12+1]=mat[4];
4202                 combinedMat[i*12+2]=mat[8];
4203                 combinedMat[i*12+3]=mat[12];
4204 
4205                 combinedMat[i*12+4]=mat[1];
4206                 combinedMat[i*12+5]=mat[5];
4207                 combinedMat[i*12+6]=mat[9];
4208                 combinedMat[i*12+7]=mat[13];
4209 
4210                 combinedMat[i*12+8]=mat[2];
4211                 combinedMat[i*12+9]=mat[6];
4212                 combinedMat[i*12+10]=mat[10];
4213                 combinedMat[i*12+11]=mat[14];
4214                 
4215 				//GLGE.setUniform4(gl,"4f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointMat["+(i*3)+"]"), mat[0],mat[4],mat[8],mat[12]);
4216 				//GLGE.setUniform4(gl,"4f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointMat["+(i*3+1)+"]"), mat[1],mat[5],mat[9],mat[13]);
4217 				//GLGE.setUniform4(gl,"4f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointMat["+(i*3+2)+"]"), mat[2],mat[6],mat[10],mat[14]);
4218 				jointCache[i].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4219 				jointCache[i].invBind=invBind;
4220 			}
4221 		}
4222         gl.uniform4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,program, "jointMat"),pgl.jointsCombined);
4223 	}
4224 
4225     
4226 	if(this.material && renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT && gl.scene.lastMaterial!=this.material) this.material.textureUniforms(gl,program,lights,this);
4227 	gl.scene.lastMaterial=this.material;
4228 }
4229 /**
4230 * Renders the object to the screen
4231 * @private
4232 */
4233 GLGE.Object.prototype.GLRender=function(gl,renderType,pickindex,multiMaterial,distance){
4234 	if(!gl) return;
4235 	if(!this.gl) this.GLInit(gl);
4236 	
4237 	//if look at is set then look
4238 	if(this.lookAt) this.Lookat(this.lookAt);
4239  
4240 	//animate this object
4241 	if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT){
4242 		if(this.animation) this.animate();
4243 	}
4244 	
4245 	if(!this.renderCaches[renderType]) this.renderCaches[renderType]={};
4246 	
4247 	var cameraMatrix=gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix();
4248 	var modelMatrix=this.getModelMatrix();
4249 	
4250 	if(this.renderCaches[renderType].camerMatrix!=cameraMatrix || this.renderCaches[renderType].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix){
4251 		this.renderCaches[renderType]={};
4252 		this.renderCaches[renderType].camerMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4253 		this.renderCaches[renderType].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4254 	}
4255 	
4256 	this.caches=this.renderCaches[renderType];
4257 	
4258 	for(var n=0;n<this.instances.length;n++){
4259 		var instance=this.instances[n];
4260 		if(!instance.renderCaches) instance.renderCaches=[];
4261 		if(!instance.renderCaches[renderType]) instance.renderCaches[renderType]={};
4262 	
4263 		var modelMatrix=instance.getModelMatrix();
4264 		
4265 		if(instance.renderCaches[renderType].camerMatrix!=cameraMatrix || instance.renderCaches[renderType].modelMatrix!=modelMatrix){
4266 			instance.renderCaches[renderType]={};
4267 			instance.renderCaches[renderType].camerMatrix=cameraMatrix;
4268 			instance.renderCaches[renderType].modelMatrix=modelMatrix;
4269 		}
4270 	
4271 	}
4272 	
4273 
4274 	var pixelsize;
4275 	
4276 	if(multiMaterial==undefined){
4277 		var start=0;
4278 		var end=this.multimaterials.length;
4279 	}else{
4280 		var start=multiMaterial;
4281 		var end=multiMaterial+1;
4282 	}
4283 
4284 	for(var i=start; i<end;i++){
4285 		if(this.multimaterials[i].lods.length>1 && !pixelsize){
4286 			var camerapos=gl.scene.camera.getPosition();
4287 			var modelpos=this.getPosition();
4288 			var dist=GLGE.lengthVec3([camerapos.x-modelpos.x,camerapos.y-modelpos.y,camerapos.z-modelpos.z]);
4289 			dist=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),[this.getBoundingVolume().getSphereRadius(),0,-dist,1]);
4290 			pixelsize=dist[0]/dist[3]*gl.scene.renderer.canvas.width;
4291 		}
4292 	
4293 		var lod=this.multimaterials[i].getLOD(pixelsize);
4294 
4295 		if(lod.mesh && lod.mesh.loaded){
4296 			if(renderType==GLGE.RENDER_NULL){
4297 				if(lod.material) lod.material.registerPasses(gl,this);
4298 				break;
4299 			}
4300 			if(!lod.GLShaderProgram){
4301 				this.createShaders(lod);
4302 			}else{
4303 				this.GLShaderProgramPick=lod.GLShaderProgramPick;
4304 				this.GLShaderProgramShadow=lod.GLShaderProgramShadow;
4305 				this.GLShaderProgram=lod.GLShaderProgram;
4306 			}
4307 			this.mesh=lod.mesh;
4308 			this.material=lod.material;
4309 			
4310 			var drawType;
4311 			switch(this.drawType){
4312 				case GLGE.DRAW_LINES:
4313 					drawType=gl.LINES;
4314 					break;
4315 				case GLGE.DRAW_POINTS:
4316 					drawType=gl.POINTS;
4317 					break;
4318 				case GLGE.DRAW_LINELOOPS:
4319 					drawType=gl.LINE_LOOP;
4320 					break;
4321 				case GLGE.DRAW_LINESTRIPS:
4322 					drawType=gl.LINE_STRIP;
4323 					break;
4324 				default:
4325 					drawType=gl.TRIANGLES;
4326 					break;
4327 			}
4328 
4329 			switch(renderType){
4330 				case  GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT:
4331 					if(gl.program!=this.GLShaderProgram){
4332 						gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgram);
4333 						gl.program=this.GLShaderProgram;
4334 					}
4335 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgram);
4336 					break;
4337 				case  GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW:
4338 					if(gl.program!=this.GLShaderProgramShadow){
4339 						gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramShadow);
4340 						gl.program=this.GLShaderProgramShadow;
4341 					}
4342 					GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,this.GLShaderProgramShadow, "distance"), distance);
4343 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramShadow);
4344 					break;
4345 				case  GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL:
4346 					if(gl.program!=this.GLShaderProgramNormal){
4347 						gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramNormal);
4348 						gl.program=this.GLShaderProgramNormal;
4349 					}
4350 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramNormal);
4351 					break;
4352 				case  GLGE.RENDER_PICK:
4353 					if(gl.program!=this.GLShaderProgramPick){
4354 						gl.useProgram(this.GLShaderProgramPick);
4355 						gl.program=this.GLShaderProgramPick;
4356 					}
4357 					this.mesh.GLAttributes(gl,this.GLShaderProgramPick);
4358 					drawType=gl.TRIANGLES;
4359 					break;
4360 			}
4361 			//render the object
4362 			this.GLUniforms(gl,renderType,pickindex);
4363             switch (this.mesh.windingOrder) {
4364             case GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_UNKNOWN:
4365                 gl.disable(gl.CULL_FACE);
4366                 break;
4367             case GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_COUNTER:
4368                 gl.cullFace(gl.FRONT);
4369             default:
4370                 break;
4371             }
4372 			if(this.mesh.GLfaces){
4373 				gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.mesh.GLfaces);
4374 				gl.drawElements(drawType, this.mesh.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
4375 			}else{
4376 				gl.drawArrays(drawType, 0, this.mesh.positions.length/3);
4377 			}
4378             switch (this.mesh.windingOrder) {
4379             case GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_UNKNOWN:
4380                 if (gl.scene.renderer.cullFaces)
4381                     gl.enable(gl.CULL_FACE);    
4382                 break;
4383             case GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_COUNTER:
4384                 gl.cullFace(gl.BACK);
4385             default:
4386                 break;
4387             }
4388 			var matrix=this.matrix;
4389 			var caches=this.caches;
4390 			for(var n=0;n<this.instances.length;n++){
4391 				this.matrix=this.instances[n].getModelMatrix();
4392 				if(this.skeleton) this.skeleton.setStaticMatrix(this.matrix);
4393 				this.caches=this.instances[n].caches;
4394 				this.GLUniforms(gl,renderType,pickindex);
4395 				if(this.mesh.GLfaces){
4396 					gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.mesh.GLfaces);
4397 					gl.drawElements(drawType, this.mesh.GLfaces.numItems, gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
4398 				}else{
4399 					gl.drawArrays(drawType, 0, this.mesh.positions.length/3);
4400 				}
4401 			}
4402 
4403 			this.matrix=matrix;
4404 			this.caches=caches;
4405 		}
4406 	}
4407 }
4408 
4409 
4410 
4411 /**
4412 * @class Creates a new mesh
4413 * @see GLGE.Object
4414 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
4415 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
4416 * @augments GLGE.Events
4417 */
4418 GLGE.Mesh=function(uid,windingOrder){
4419 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
4420 	this.GLbuffers=[];
4421 	this.buffers=[];
4422 	this.UV=[];
4423 	this.boneWeights=[];
4424 	this.setBuffers=[];
4425 	this.faces={};
4426     if (windingOrder!==undefined)
4427 4428         this.windingOrder=windingOrder;
4429     else
4430         this.windingOrder=GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_CLOCKWISE;
4431 };
4432 
4433 GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_UNKNOWN=2;
4434 GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_CLOCKWISE=1;
4435 GLGE.Mesh.WINDING_ORDER_COUNTER=0;
4436 
4437 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Mesh);
4438 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Mesh);
4439 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Mesh);
4440 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.gl=null;
4441 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.className="Mesh";
4442 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLbuffers=null;
4443 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.buffers=null;
4444 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setBuffers=null;
4445 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLfaces=null;
4446 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.faces=null;
4447 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.UV=null;
4448 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.joints=null;
4449 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.invBind=null;
4450 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.loaded=false;
4451 /**
4452  * @name GLGE.Mesh#shaderupdate
4453  * @event fired when the shader needs updating
4454  * @param {object} data
4455  */
4456 
4457 /**
4458 * Gets the bounding volume for the mesh
4459 * @returns {GLGE.BoundingVolume} 
4460 */
4461 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.getBoundingVolume=function(){
4462 	if(!this.boundingVolume){
4463 		var minX,maxX,minY,maxY,minZ,maxZ;
4464 		for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
4465 			if(this.buffers[i].name=="position") var positions=this.buffers[i].data;
4466 		}
4467 		for(var i=0;i<positions.length;i=i+3){
4468 			if(i==0){
4469 				minX=maxX=positions[i];
4470 				minY=maxY=positions[i+1];
4471 				minZ=maxZ=positions[i+2];
4472 			}else{
4473 				minX=Math.min(minX,positions[i]);
4474 				maxX=Math.max(maxX,positions[i]);
4475 				minY=Math.min(minY,positions[i+1]);
4476 				maxY=Math.max(maxY,positions[i+1]);
4477 				minZ=Math.min(minZ,positions[i+2]);
4478 				maxZ=Math.max(maxZ,positions[i+2]);
4479 			}
4480 		}
4481 		this.boundingVolume=new GLGE.BoundingVolume(minX,maxX,minY,maxY,minZ,maxZ);
4482 	}
4483 	return this.boundingVolume;
4484 }
4485 /**
4486 * Sets the joints
4487 * @param {string[]} jsArray set joint objects
4488 */
4489 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setJoints=function(jsArray){
4490 	this.joints=jsArray;
4491 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
4492 	return this;
4493 }
4494 /**
4495 * Sets the inverse bind matrix for each joint
4496 * @param {GLGE.Matrix[]} jsArray set joint names
4497 */
4498 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setInvBindMatrix=function(jsArray){
4499 	this.invBind=jsArray;
4500 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
4501 	return this;
4502 }
4503 /**
4504 * Sets the joint channels for each vertex 
4505 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of bones
4506 * @param {Number} num the number of chanels in this mesh
4507 */
4508 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setVertexJoints=function(jsArray,num){
4509 	if(!num){
4510 		num=jsArray.length*3/this.positions.length;
4511 	}
4512 	if(num<5){
4513 		this.setBuffer("joints1",jsArray,num);
4514 	}else{
4515 		var jsArray1=[];
4516 		var jsArray2=[];
4517 		for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++){
4518 			if(i%num<4){
4519 				jsArray1.push(jsArray[i]);
4520 			}else{
4521 				jsArray2.push(jsArray[i]);
4522 			}
4523 		}
4524 		this.setBuffer("joints1",jsArray1,4);
4525 		this.setBuffer("joints2",jsArray2,num-4);
4526 	}
4527 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
4528 	return this;
4529 }
4530 /**
4531 * Sets the joint weights on each vertex
4532 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of weights
4533 * @param {Number} num the number of chanels in this mesh
4534 */
4535 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setVertexWeights=function(jsArray,num){
4536 	if(!num){
4537 		num=jsArray.length*3/this.positions.length;
4538 	}
4539 	//normalize the weights!
4540 	for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i=i+parseInt(num)){
4541 		var total=0;
4542 		for(var n=0;n<num;n++){
4543 			total+=parseFloat(jsArray[i+n]);
4544 		}
4545 		for(var n=0;n<num;n++){
4546 			jsArray[i+n]=jsArray[i+n]/total;
4547 		}
4548 	}
4549 
4550 	if(num<4){
4551 		this.setBuffer("weights1",jsArray,num);
4552 	}else{
4553 		var jsArray1=[];
4554 		var jsArray2=[];
4555 		for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++){
4556 			if(i%num<4){
4557 				jsArray1.push(jsArray[i]);
4558 			}else{
4559 				jsArray2.push(jsArray[i]);
4560 			}
4561 		}
4562 		this.setBuffer("weights1",jsArray1,4);
4563 		this.setBuffer("weights2",jsArray2,num-4);
4564 	}
4565 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
4566 	return this;
4567 }
4568 /**
4569 * clears any buffers currently set
4570 * @param {Number[]} jsArray the UV coords in a 1 dimentional array
4571 */
4572 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.clearBuffers=function(){
4573 	//if(this.GLfaces) this.gl.deleteBuffer(this.GLfaces);
4574 	this.GLFaces=null;
4575 	delete(this.GLFaces);
4576 	for(i in this.buffers){
4577 		//if(this.buffers[i].GL) this.gl.deleteBuffer(this.buffers[i].GL);
4578 		this.buffers[i]=null;
4579 		delete(this.buffers[i]);
4580 	}
4581 	this.buffers=[];
4582 	this.loaded=false;
4583 }
4584 /**
4585 * Set the UV coord for the first UV layer
4586 * @param {Number[]} jsArray the UV coords in a 1 dimentional array
4587 */
4588 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setUV=function(jsArray){
4589 	var idx=0;
4590 	for(var i=0; i<jsArray.length;i=i+2){
4591 		this.UV[idx]=jsArray[i];
4592 		this.UV[idx+1]=jsArray[i+1];
4593 		if(!this.UV[idx+2]) this.UV[idx+2]=jsArray[i];//<-- hack in case the collada file only specified UV1 but accesses UV2 and expects the UV1 coordinates to be properly reflected there
4594 		if(!this.UV[idx+3]) this.UV[idx+3]=jsArray[i+1];
4595 		idx=idx+4;
4596 	}
4597 	this.setBuffer("UV",this.UV,4);
4598 	return this;
4599 }
4600 /**
4601 * Set the UV coord for the second UV layer
4602 * @param {Number[]} jsArray the UV coords in a 1 dimentional array
4603 */
4604 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setUV2=function(jsArray){
4605 	var idx=0;
4606 	for(var i=0; i<jsArray.length;i=i+2){
4607 		if(!this.UV[idx]) this.UV[idx]=jsArray[i];
4608 		if(!this.UV[idx+1]) this.UV[idx+1]=jsArray[i+1];
4609 		this.UV[idx+2]=jsArray[i];
4610 		this.UV[idx+3]=jsArray[i+1];
4611 		idx=idx+4;
4612 	}
4613 	this.setBuffer("UV",this.UV,4);
4614 	return this;
4615 }
4616 /**
4617 * Sets the positions of the verticies
4618 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of positions
4619 */
4620 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setPositions=function(jsArray){
4621 	this.loaded=true;
4622 	this.positions=jsArray;
4623 	this.setBuffer("position",jsArray,3);
4624 	return this;
4625 }
4626 /**
4627 * Sets the normals of the verticies
4628 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
4629 */
4630 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setNormals=function(jsArray){
4631 	this.normals=jsArray;
4632 	this.setBuffer("normal",jsArray,3);
4633 	return this;
4634 }
4635 /**
4636 * Sets a buffer for the
4637 * @param {String} boneName The name of the bone
4638 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of weights
4639 * @private
4640 */
4641 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setBuffer=function(bufferName,jsArray,size){
4642 	//make sure all jsarray items are floats
4643 	for(var i=0;i<jsArray.length;i++) jsArray[i]=parseFloat(jsArray[i]);
4644 	var buffer;
4645 	for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
4646 		if(this.buffers[i].name==bufferName) buffer=i;
4647 	}
4648 	if(!buffer){
4649 		this.buffers.push({name:bufferName,data:jsArray,size:size,GL:false});
4650 	}
4651         else 
4652 	{
4653 		this.buffers[buffer]={name:bufferName,data:jsArray,size:size,GL:false};
4654 	}
4655 	return this;
4656 }
4657 
4658 /**
4659 * gets a vert tangent
4660 * @private
4661 */
4662 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.tangentFromUV=function(p1,p2,p3,uv1,uv2,uv3,n){
4663 	var toUnitVec3=GLGE.toUnitVec3;
4664 	var subVec3=GLGE.subVec3;
4665 	var scaleVec3=GLGE.scaleVec3;
4666 	var dotVec3=GLGE.dotVec3;
4667 	var crossVec3=GLGE.crossVec3;
4668 	
4669 	uv21=[uv2[0]-uv1[0],uv2[1]-uv1[1]];
4670 	uv31=[uv3[0]-uv1[0],uv3[1]-uv1[1]];
4671 	
4672 	p21=GLGE.subVec3(p2,p1);
4673 	p31=GLGE.subVec3(p3,p1);
4674 	var s=(uv21[0]*uv31[1]-uv31[0]*uv21[1]);
4675 
4676 	if(s!=0){
4677 		s=1/s;
4678 		var t=subVec3(scaleVec3(p21,uv31[1]*s),scaleVec3(p31,uv21[1]*s));
4679 		var b=subVec3(scaleVec3(p31,uv21[0]*s),scaleVec3(p21,uv31[0]*s));
4680 	}else{
4681 		t=[0,0,0];
4682 		b=[0,0,0];
4683 	}
4684 	if(GLGE.dotVec3(GLGE.crossVec3(p21,p31),n)>0){
4685 		t=scaleVec3(t,-1);
4686 		b=scaleVec3(b,-1);
4687 	}
4688 	return [t,b];
4689 }
4690 
4691 /**
