4692 * Sets the faces for this mesh
4693 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
4694 */
4695 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.setFaces=function(jsArray){
4696 	this.faces={data:jsArray,GL:false};	
4697 	//if at this point calculate normals if we haven't got them yet
4698 	if(!this.normals) this.calcNormals();
4699 	
4700 	//add a tangent buffer
4701 	for(var i=0;i<this.buffers.length;i++){
4702 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="position") var position=this.buffers[i].data;
4703 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="UV") var uv=this.buffers[i].data;
4704 		if(this.buffers[i].name=="normal") var normal=this.buffers[i].data;
4705 	}
4706 	
4707 
4708 	if(position && uv){
4709 		var tangentArray=[];
4710 		var data={};
4711 		var ref;
4712 		for(var i=0;i<position.length;i++){
4713 			tangentArray[i]=0;
4714 		}
4715 		for(var i=0;i<this.faces.data.length;i=i+3){
4716 			var p1=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+2]];
4717 			var p2=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+2]];
4718 			var p3=[position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+1],position[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+2]];
4719 			
4720 			var n1=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*3+2]];
4721 			var n2=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*3+2]];
4722 			var n3=[normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+1],normal[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*3+2]];
4723 			
4724 			var uv1=[uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4],uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i]))*4+1]];
4725 			var uv2=[uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*4],uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+1]))*4+1]];
4726 			var uv3=[uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*4],uv[(parseInt(this.faces.data[i+2]))*4+1]];
4727 			
4728 			var tb=this.tangentFromUV(p2,p1,p3,uv2,uv1,uv3,n2);
4729 
4730 			
4731 			
4732 			if(!data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")]){
4733 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")]=tb;
4734 			}else{
4735 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][0][0]+=tb[0][0];
4736 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][0][1]+=tb[0][1];
4737 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][0][2]+=tb[0][2];
4738 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][1][0]+=tb[1][0];
4739 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][1][1]+=tb[1][1];
4740 				data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][1][2]+=tb[1][2];
4741 			}
4742 			if(!data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")]){
4743 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")]=tb;
4744 			}else{
4745 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][0][0]+=tb[0][0];
4746 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][0][1]+=tb[0][1];
4747 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][0][2]+=tb[0][2];
4748 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][1][0]+=tb[1][0];
4749 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][1][1]+=tb[1][1];
4750 				data[[p2[0],p2[1],p2[2],uv2[0],uv2[1],n2[0],n2[1],n2[2]].join(",")][1][2]+=tb[1][2];
4751 			}
4752 			if(!data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")]){
4753 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")]=tb;
4754 			}else{
4755 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][0][0]+=tb[0][0];
4756 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][0][1]+=tb[0][1];
4757 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][0][2]+=tb[0][2];
4758 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][1][0]+=tb[1][0];
4759 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][1][1]+=tb[1][1];
4760 				data[[p3[0],p3[1],p3[2],uv3[0],uv3[1],n3[0],n3[1],n3[2]].join(",")][1][2]+=tb[1][2];
4761 			}
4762 
4763 		}		
4764 		for(var i=0;i<position.length/3;i++){
4765 			var p1=[position[i*3],position[i*3+1],position[i*3+2]];
4766 			var n1=[normal[i*3],normal[i*3+1],normal[i*3+2]];
4767 			var uv1=[uv[i*4],uv[i*4+1]];
4768 			var t=GLGE.toUnitVec3(data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][0]);
4769 			var b=GLGE.toUnitVec3(data[[p1[0],p1[1],p1[2],uv1[0],uv1[1],n1[0],n1[1],n1[2]].join(",")][1]);
4770 			
4771 			if(t){
4772 				tangentArray[i*3]=t[0];
4773 				tangentArray[i*3+1]=t[1];
4774 				tangentArray[i*3+2]=t[2];
4775 			}
4776 		}
4777 		this.setBuffer("tangent",tangentArray,3);
4778 	}
4779 	return this;
4780 }
4781 /**
4782 * Sets the faces for this mesh
4783 * @param {Number[]} jsArray The 1 dimentional array of normals
4784 * @private
4785 */
4786 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLSetFaceBuffer=function(gl){
4787 	if(!this.GLfaces) this.GLfaces = gl.createBuffer();
4788 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLfaces);
4789 	gl.bufferData(gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, new Uint16Array(this.faces.data), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
4790 	this.GLfaces.itemSize = 1;
4791 	this.GLfaces.numItems = this.faces.data.length;
4792 }
4793 /**
4794 * Sets up a GL Buffer
4795 * @param {WebGLContext} gl The context being drawn on
4796 * @param {String} bufferName The name of the buffer to create
4797 * @param {Number[]}  jsArray The data to add to the buffer
4798 * @param {Number}  size Size of a single element within the array
4799 * @private
4800 */
4801 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLSetBuffer=function(gl,bufferName,jsArray,size){
4802 	if(!this.GLbuffers[bufferName]) this.GLbuffers[bufferName] = gl.createBuffer();
4803 	gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLbuffers[bufferName]);
4804 	gl.bufferData(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array(jsArray), gl.STATIC_DRAW);
4805 	this.GLbuffers[bufferName].itemSize = size;
4806 	this.GLbuffers[bufferName].numItems = jsArray.length/size;
4807 };
4808 /**
4809 * Calculates the normals for this mesh
4810 * @private
4811 */
4812 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.calcNormals=function(){
4813 	var normals=[];
4814 	var positions=this.positions;
4815 	var faces=this.faces.data;
4816 	if(!faces){
4817 		faces=[];
4818 		for(var i=0;i<positions.length/3;i++) faces[i]=i;
4819 	}
4820 	for(var i=0;i<faces.length;i=i+3){
4821 		var v1=[positions[faces[i]*3],positions[faces[i]*3+1],positions[faces[i]*3+2]];
4822 		var v2=[positions[faces[i+1]*3],positions[faces[i+1]*3+1],positions[faces[i+1]*3+2]];
4823 		var v3=[positions[faces[i+2]*3],positions[faces[i+2]*3+1],positions[faces[i+2]*3+2]];
4824 		var vec1=GLGE.subVec3(v2,v1);
4825 		var vec2=GLGE.subVec3(v3,v1);
4826 		var norm=GLGE.toUnitVec3(GLGE.crossVec3(vec1,vec2));
4827 		if(normals[faces[i]]==undefined) normals[faces[i]]=[];
4828 		normals[faces[i]].push(norm);
4829 		if(normals[faces[i+1]]==undefined) normals[faces[i+1]]=[];
4830 		normals[faces[i+1]].push(norm);
4831 		if(normals[faces[i+2]]==undefined) normals[faces[i+2]]=[];
4832 		normals[faces[i+2]].push(norm);
4833 	}
4834 	var norms=[];
4835 	for(i=0;i<normals.length;i++){
4836 		var x=0,y=0,z=0;
4837 		if(normals[i]!=undefined){
4838 			for(var j=0;j<normals[i].length;j++){
4839 				x+=normals[i][j][0];
4840 				y+=normals[i][j][1];
4841 				z+=normals[i][j][2];
4842 			}
4843 			x/=normals[i].length;
4844 			y/=normals[i].length;
4845 			z/=normals[i].length;
4846 			norms[i*3]=x;
4847 			norms[i*3+1]=y;
4848 			norms[i*3+2]=z;
4849 		}
4850 	}
4851 	this.setNormals(norms);
4852 }
4853 /**
4854 * Sets the Attributes for this mesh
4855 * @param {WebGLContext} gl The context being drawn on
4856 * @private
4857 */
4858 GLGE.Mesh.prototype.GLAttributes=function(gl,shaderProgram){
4859 	this.gl=gl;
4860 	//if at this point we have no normals set then calculate them
4861 	if(!this.normals) this.calcNormals();
4862 	
4863 	//disable all the attribute initially arrays - do I really need this?
4864 	for(var i=0; i<8; i++) gl.disableVertexAttribArray(i);
4865 	//check if the faces have been updated
4866 	if(!this.faces.GL && this.faces.data && this.faces.data.length>0){
4867 		this.GLSetFaceBuffer(gl);
4868 		this.faces.GL=true;
4869 	}
4870 	//loop though the buffers
4871 	for(i=0; i<this.buffers.length;i++){
4872 		if(!this.buffers[i].GL){
4873 			this.GLSetBuffer(gl,this.buffers[i].name,this.buffers[i].data,this.buffers[i].size);
4874 			this.buffers[i].GL=true;
4875 		}
4876 		attribslot=GLGE.getAttribLocation(gl,shaderProgram, this.buffers[i].name);
4877 		if(attribslot>-1){
4878 			gl.bindBuffer(gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, this.GLbuffers[this.buffers[i].name]);
4879 			gl.enableVertexAttribArray(attribslot);
4880 			gl.vertexAttribPointer(attribslot, this.GLbuffers[this.buffers[i].name].itemSize, gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
4881 		}
4882 	}
4883 }
4884 
4885 
4886 
4887 /**
4888 * @class Creates a new light source to be added to a scene
4889 * @property {Boolean} diffuse Dose this light source effect diffuse shading
4890 * @property {Boolean} specular Dose this light source effect specular shading
4891 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
4892 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
4893 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
4894 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
4895 */
4896 GLGE.Light=function(uid){
4897 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
4898 	this.color={r:1,g:1,b:1};
4899 }
4900 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Light);
4901 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Light);
4902 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Light);
4903 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Light);
4904 GLGE.Light.prototype.className="Light";
4905 /**
4906 * @constant 
4907 * @description Enumeration for an point light source
4908 */
4909 GLGE.L_POINT=1;
4910 /**
4911 * @constant 
4912 * @description Enumeration for an directional light source
4913 */
4914 GLGE.L_DIR=2;
4915 /**
4916 4917 * @constant 
4918 * @description Enumeration for an spot light source
4919 */
4920 GLGE.L_SPOT=3;
4921 
4922 GLGE.Light.prototype.constantAttenuation=1;
4923 GLGE.Light.prototype.linearAttenuation=0.002;
4924 GLGE.Light.prototype.quadraticAttenuation=0.0008;
4925 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotCosCutOff=0.95;
4926 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotPMatrix=null;
4927 GLGE.Light.prototype.spotExponent=10;
4928 GLGE.Light.prototype.color=null; 
4929 GLGE.Light.prototype.diffuse=true; 
4930 GLGE.Light.prototype.specular=true; 
4931 GLGE.Light.prototype.samples=0; 
4932 GLGE.Light.prototype.softness=0.01; 
4933 GLGE.Light.prototype.type=GLGE.L_POINT;
4934 GLGE.Light.prototype.frameBuffer=null;
4935 GLGE.Light.prototype.renderBuffer=null;
4936 GLGE.Light.prototype.texture=null;
4937 GLGE.Light.prototype.bufferHeight=256;
4938 GLGE.Light.prototype.bufferWidth=256;
4939 GLGE.Light.prototype.shadowBias=2.0;
4940 GLGE.Light.prototype.castShadows=false;
4941 
4942 /**
4943 * Gets the spot lights projection matrix
4944 * @returns the lights spot projection matrix
4945 * @private
4946 */
4947 GLGE.Light.prototype.getPMatrix=function(){
4948 	if(!this.spotPMatrix){
4949 		var far;
4950 		if(this.scene && this.scene.camera) far=this.scene.camera.far;
4951 			else far=1000;
4952 		this.spotPMatrix=GLGE.makePerspective(Math.acos(this.spotCosCutOff)/3.14159*360, 1.0, 0.1, far);
4953 	}
4954 	return this.spotPMatrix;
4955 }
4956 
4957 
4958 /**
4959 * Sets the shadow casting flag
4960 * @param {number} distance
4961 */
4962 GLGE.Light.prototype.setDistance=function(value){
4963 	this.distance=value;
4964 	return this;
4965 }
4966 /**
4967 * Gets the shadow casting distance
4968 * @returns {number} distance
4969 */
4970 GLGE.Light.prototype.getDistance=function(){
4971 	return this.distance;
4972 }
4973 
4974 /**
4975 * Sets negative shadow flag
4976 * @param {boolean} negative shadow
4977 */
4978 GLGE.Light.prototype.setNegativeShadow=function(value){
4979 	this.negativeShadow=value;
4980 	return this;
4981 }
4982 /**
4983 * Gets negative shadow flag
4984 * @param {boolean} negative shadow
4985 */
4986 GLGE.Light.prototype.getNegative=function(){
4987 	return this.negativeShadow;
4988 }
4989 
4990 /**
4991 * Sets the shadow casting flag
4992 * @param {number} value should cast shadows?
4993 */
4994 GLGE.Light.prototype.setCastShadows=function(value){
4995 	this.castShadows=value;
4996 	return this;
4997 }
4998 /**
4999 * Gets the shadow casting flag
5000 * @returns {number} true if casts shadows
5001 */
5002 GLGE.Light.prototype.getCastShadows=function(){
5003 	return this.castShadows;
5004 	return this;
5005 }
5006 /**
5007 * Sets the shadow bias
5008 * @param {number} value The shadow bias
5009 */
5010 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowBias=function(value){
5011 	this.shadowBias=value;
5012 	return this;
5013 }
5014 /**
5015 * Gets the shadow bias
5016 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer bias
5017 */
5018 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowBias=function(){
5019 	return this.shadowBias;
5020 }
5021 
5022 /**
5023 * Sets the number of samples for this shadow
5024 * @param {number} value The number of samples to perform
5025 */
5026 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowSamples=function(value){
5027 	this.samples=value;
5028 	return this;
5029 }
5030 /**
5031 * Gets the number of samples for this shadow
5032 * @returns {number} The number of samples
5033 */
5034 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowSamples=function(){
5035 	return this.samples;
5036 }
5037 /**
5038 * Sets the shadow softness
5039 * @param {number} value The number of samples to perform
5040 */
5041 GLGE.Light.prototype.setShadowSoftness=function(value){
5042 	this.softness=value;
5043 	return this;
5044 }
5045 /**
5046 * Gets the shadow softness
5047 * @returns {number} The softness of the shadows
5048 */
5049 GLGE.Light.prototype.getShadowSamples=function(){
5050 	return this.softness;
5051 }
5052 /**
5053 * Sets the shadow buffer width
5054 * @param {number} value The shadow buffer width
5055 */
5056 GLGE.Light.prototype.setBufferWidth=function(value){
5057 	this.bufferWidth=value;
5058 	return this;
5059 }
5060 /**
5061 * Gets the shadow buffer width
5062 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer width
5063 */
5064 GLGE.Light.prototype.getBufferHeight=function(){
5065 	return this.bufferHeight;
5066 }
5067 /**
5068 * Sets the shadow buffer width
5069 * @param {number} value The shadow buffer width
5070 */
5071 GLGE.Light.prototype.setBufferHeight=function(value){
5072 	this.bufferHeight=value;
5073 	return this;
5074 }
5075 /**
5076 * Gets the shadow buffer width
5077 * @returns {number} The shadow buffer width
5078 */
5079 GLGE.Light.prototype.getBufferWidth=function(){
5080 	return this.bufferWidth;
5081 }
5082 /**
5083 * Sets the spot light cut off
5084 * @param {number} value The cos of the angle to limit
5085 */
5086 GLGE.Light.prototype.setSpotCosCutOff=function(value){
5087 	this.spotPMatrix=null;
5088 	this.spotCosCutOff=value;
5089 	return this;
5090 }
5091 /**
5092 * Gets the spot light cut off
5093 * @returns {number} The cos of the limiting angle 
5094 5095 */
5096 GLGE.Light.prototype.getSpotCosCutOff=function(){
5097 	return this.spotCosCutOff;
5098 }
5099 /**
5100 * Sets the spot light exponent
5101 * @param {number} value The spot lights exponent
5102 */
5103 GLGE.Light.prototype.setSpotExponent=function(value){
5104 	this.spotExponent=value;
5105 	return this;
5106 }
5107 /**
5108 * Gets the spot light exponent
5109 * @returns {number} The exponent of the spot light
5110 */
5111 GLGE.Light.prototype.getSpotExponent=function(){
5112 	return this.spotExponent;
5113 }
5114 /**
5115 * Sets the light sources Attenuation
5116 * @returns {Object} The components of the light sources attenuation
5117 */
5118 GLGE.Light.prototype.getAttenuation=function(constant,linear,quadratic){
5119 	var attenuation={};
5120 	attenuation.constant=this.constantAttenuation;
5121 	attenuation.linear=this.linearAttenuation;
5122 	attenuation.quadratic=this.quadraticAttenuation;
5123 	return attenuation;
5124 }
5125 /**
5126 * Sets the light sources Attenuation
5127 * @param {Number} constant The constant part of the attenuation
5128 * @param {Number} linear The linear part of the attenuation
5129 * @param {Number} quadratic The quadratic part of the attenuation
5130 */
5131 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuation=function(constant,linear,quadratic){
5132 	this.constantAttenuation=constant;
5133 	this.linearAttenuation=linear;
5134 	this.quadraticAttenuation=quadratic;
5135 	return this;
5136 }
5137 /**
5138 * Sets the light sources constant attenuation
5139 * @param {Number} value The constant part of the attenuation
5140 */
5141 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationConstant=function(value){
5142 	this.constantAttenuation=value;
5143 	return this;
5144 }
5145 /**
5146 * Sets the light sources linear attenuation
5147 * @param {Number} value The linear part of the attenuation
5148 */
5149 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationLinear=function(value){
5150 	this.linearAttenuation=value;
5151 	return this;
5152 }
5153 /**
5154 * Sets the light sources quadratic attenuation
5155 * @param {Number} value The quadratic part of the attenuation
5156 */
5157 GLGE.Light.prototype.setAttenuationQuadratic=function(value){
5158 	this.quadraticAttenuation=value;
5159 	return this;
5160 }
5161 
5162 /**
5163 * Sets the color of the light source
5164 * @param {string} color The color of the light
5165 */
5166 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColor=function(color){
5167 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
5168 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
5169 	return this;
5170 }
5171 /**
5172 * Sets the red color of the light source
5173 * @param {Number} value The new red level 0-1
5174 */
5175 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
5176 	this.color.r=value;
5177 	return this;
5178 }
5179 /**
5180 * Sets the green color of the light source
5181 * @param {Number} value The new green level 0-1
5182 */
5183 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
5184 	this.color.g=value;
5185 	return this;
5186 }
5187 /**
5188 * Sets the blue color of the light source
5189 * @param {Number} value The new blue level 0-1
5190 */
5191 GLGE.Light.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
5192 	this.color.b=value;
5193 	return this;
5194 }
5195 /**
5196 * Gets the current color of the light source
5197 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current position
5198 */
5199 GLGE.Light.prototype.getColor=function(){
5200 	return this.color;
5201 }
5202 /**
5203 * Gets the type of the light
5204 * @return {Number} The type of the light source eg GLGE.L_POINT
5205 */
5206 GLGE.Light.prototype.getType=function(){
5207 	return this.type;
5208 }
5209 /**
5210 * Sets the type of the light
5211 * @param {Number} type The type of the light source eg GLGE.L_POINT
5212 */
5213 GLGE.Light.prototype.setType=function(type){
5214 	this.type=type;
5215 	return this;
5216 }
5217 /**
5218 * init for the rendering
5219 * @private
5220 */
5221 GLGE.Light.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){	
5222 	this.gl=gl;
5223 	if(this.type==GLGE.L_SPOT && !this.texture){
5224 		this.createSpotBuffer(gl);
5225 	}
5226 }
5227 /**
5228 * Sets up the WebGL needed to render the depth map for this light source. Only used for spot lights which produce shadows
5229 * @private
5230 */
5231 GLGE.Light.prototype.createSpotBuffer=function(gl){
5232     this.frameBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
5233     this.renderBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
5234     this.texture = gl.createTexture();
5235     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture);
5236 
5237     try {
5238         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
5239     } catch (e) {
5240         var tex = new Uint8Array(this.bufferWidth * this.bufferHeight * 4);
5241         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, parseFloat2(this.bufferWidth), parseFloat2(this.bufferHeight), 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
5242     }
5243     
5244     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.frameBuffer);
5245     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
5246     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight);
5247     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
5248     
5249     gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture, 0);
5250     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
5251     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
5252 }
5253 
5254 /**
5255 * @constant 
5256 * @description Enumeration for a perspective camera
5257 */
5258 GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE=1;
5259 /**
5260 * @constant 
5261 * @description Enumeration for a orthographic camera
5262 */
5263 GLGE.C_ORTHO=2;
5264 
5265 /**
5266 * @class Creates a new camera object
5267 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
5268 * @augments GLGE.Placeable
5269 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5270 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5271 */
5272 GLGE.Camera=function(uid){
5273 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5274 };
5275 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Placeable,GLGE.Camera);
5276 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Camera);
5277 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Camera);
5278 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Camera);
5279 GLGE.Camera.prototype.className="Camera";
5280 GLGE.Camera.prototype.fovy=35;
5281 GLGE.Camera.prototype.aspect=1.0;
5282 GLGE.Camera.prototype.near=0.1;
5283 GLGE.Camera.prototype.far=1000.0;
5284 GLGE.Camera.prototype.orthoscale=5;
5285 GLGE.Camera.prototype.type=GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE;
5286 GLGE.Camera.prototype.pMatrix=null;
5287 
5288 
5289 /**
5290 * Method gets the orthographic scale for the camers
5291 * @return {Matrix} Returns the orthographic scale
5292 */
5293 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getOrthoScale=function(){
5294 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
5295 		return this.orthoscale
5296 	}else{
5297 		GLGE.error("You may only get a scale for a orthographic camera");
5298 		return 1;
5299 	}
5300 };
5301 /**
5302 * Method sets the orthographic scale for the camers
5303 * @param {number} scale The new orthographic scale
5304 */
5305 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setOrthoScale=function(scale){
5306 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
5307 		this.orthoscale=scale;
5308 		this.pMatrix=null;
5309 	}
5310 	else
5311 	{
5312 		GLGE.error("You may only set a scale for a orthographic camera");
5313 	}
5314 	return this;
5315 };
5316 
5317 /**
5318 * Method gets the far drawing distance
5319 * @return {Matrix} Returns the cameras far draw distance
5320 */
5321 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getFar=function(){
5322 	return this.far;
5323 };
5324 /**
5325 * Method sets the far draw distance of the camera
5326 * @param {number} distance The far draw distance
5327 */
5328 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setFar=function(distance){
5329 	this.far=distance;
5330 	return this;
5331 };
5332 
5333 /**
5334 * Method gets the near drawing distance
5335 * @return {Matrix} Returns the cameras near draw distance
5336 */
5337 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getNear=function(){
5338 	return this.near;
5339 };
5340 /**
5341 * Method sets the near draw distance of the camera
5342 * @param {number} distance The near draw distance
5343 */
5344 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setNear=function(distance){
5345 	this.near=distance;
5346 	return this;
5347 };
5348 
5349 /**
5350 * Method gets the current camera type
5351 * @return {Matrix} Returns the camera type
5352 */
5353 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getType=function(){
5354 	return this.type
5355 };
5356 /**
5357 * Method sets the type of camera GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE or GLGE.C_ORTHO
5358 * @param {number} type The type of this camera
5359 */
5360 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setType=function(type){
5361 	if(type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || type==GLGE.C_ORTHO){
5362 		this.type=type;
5363 		this.pMatrix=null;
5364 	}else{
5365 		GLGE.error("unsuported camera type");
5366 	}
5367 	return this;
5368 };
5369 
5370 /**
5371 * Method gets the current yfov if the camera type is GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE
5372 * @return {Matrix} Returns the yfov
5373 */
5374 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getFovY=function(){
5375 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE) {
5376 		return this.fovy
5377 	}else{
5378 		GLGE.error("You may only get a yfov for a perspective camera");
5379 		return 1;
5380 	}
5381 };
5382 /**
5383 * Method sets the yfov of the camera
5384 * @param {number} yfov The new yfov of the camera
5385 */
5386 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setFovY=function(fovy){
5387 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE) {
5388 		this.fovy=fovy;
5389 		this.ymax=null;
5390 		this.pMatrix=null;
5391 	}
5392 	else
5393 	{
5394 		GLGE.error("You may only set a yfov for a perspective camera");
5395 	}
5396 	return this;
5397 };
5398 
5399 /**
5400 * Method gets the current aspect if the camera type is GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE
5401 * @return {Matrix} Returns the yfov
5402 */
5403 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getAspect=function(){
5404 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
5405 		return this.aspect
5406 	}
5407 	else
5408 	{
5409 		GLGE.error("You may only set a aspect for a perspective or orthographic camera");
5410 		return 1;
5411 	}
5412 };
5413 /**
5414 * Method sets the aspect of the camera
5415 * @param {number} aspect The new projection matrix
5416 */
5417 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setAspect=function(aspect){
5418 	if(this.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE || this.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO) {
5419 		this.aspect=aspect;
5420 		this.pMatrix=null;
5421 	}
5422 	else
5423 	{
5424 		GLGE.error("You may only set a aspect for a perspective or orthographic camera");
5425 	}
5426 	return this;
5427 };
5428 
5429 
5430 /**
5431 * Method gets the current projection matrix of this camera
5432 * @return {Matrix} Returns the camera projection matrix
5433 */
5434 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getProjectionMatrix=function(){
5435 	if(!this.pMatrix){
5436 		switch(this.type){
5437 			case GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE:
5438 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makePerspective(this.fovy, this.aspect, this.near, this.far);
5439 				break;
5440 			case GLGE.C_ORTHO:
5441 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-this.orthoscale*this.aspect,this.orthoscale*this.aspect,-this.orthoscale,this.orthoscale, this.near, this.far);
5442 				break;
5443 		}
5444 	}
5445 	return this.pMatrix;
5446 };
5447 /**
5448 * Method generates the projection matrix based on the 
5449 * camera paramaters
5450 * @param {Matrix} projection The new projection matrix
5451 */
5452 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setProjectionMatrix=function(projection){
5453 	this.pMatrix=projection;
5454 	return this;
5455 };
5456 /**
5457 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
5458 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
5459 * @type Matrix
5460 */
5461 GLGE.Camera.prototype.updateMatrix=function(){
5462 	var position=this.getPosition();
5463 	var vMatrix=GLGE.translateMatrix(position.x,position.y,position.z);
5464 	vMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(vMatrix,this.getRotMatrix());
5465 	if(this.parent) vMatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(this.parent.getModelMatrix(),vMatrix);
5466 	this.matrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(vMatrix);
5467 };
5468 /**
5469 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
5470 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
5471 * @type Matrix
5472 */
5473 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getViewMatrix=function(){
5474 	if(!this.matrix || !this.rotmatrix) this.updateMatrix();
5475 	return this.matrix;
5476 };
5477 
5478 /**
5479 * Method generates the cameras view projection matrix
5480 * @return Returns the view projection  matrix based on this camera
5481 * @type Matrix
5482 */
5483 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getViewProjection=function(){
5484 	var projectionMatrix=this.getProjectionMatrix();
5485 	var viewMatrix=this.getViewMatrix();
5486 	if(projectionMatrix!=this.vpProjectionMatrix || viewMatrix!=this.vpViewMatrix){
5487 		this.cameraViewProjection=GLGE.mulMat4(projectionMatrix,viewMatrix);
5488 		this.vpProjectionMatrix=projectionMatrix;
5489 		this.vpViewMatrix=viewMatrix;
5490 	}
5491 	return this.cameraViewProjection;
5492 };
5493 
5494 
5495 
5496 
5497 /**
5498 * @constant 
5499 * @description Enumeration for no fog
5500 */
5501 GLGE.FOG_NONE=1;
5502 /**
5503 * @constant 
5504 * @description Enumeration for linear fall off fog
5505 */
5506 GLGE.FOG_LINEAR=2;
5507 /**
5508 * @constant 
5509 * @description Enumeration for exponential fall off fog
5510 */
5511 GLGE.FOG_QUADRATIC=3;
5512 
5513 /**
5514 * @class Scene class containing the camera, lights and objects
5515 * @augments GLGE.Group
5516 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
5517 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
5518 */
5519 GLGE.Scene=function(uid){
5520 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
5521 	this.children=[];
5522 	this.camera=new GLGE.Camera();
5523 	this.backgroundColor={r:1,g:1,b:1,a:1};
5524 	this.ambientColor={r:0,g:0,b:0};
5525 	this.fogColor={r:0.5,g:0.5,b:0.5};
5526 	this.passes=[];
5527 }
5528 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Group,GLGE.Scene);
5529 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Scene);
5530 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Scene);
5531 GLGE.Scene.prototype.camera=null;
5532 GLGE.Scene.prototype.className="Scene";
5533 GLGE.Scene.prototype.renderer=null;
5534 GLGE.Scene.prototype.backgroundColor=null;
5535 GLGE.Scene.prototype.filter=null;
5536 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogColor=null;
5537 GLGE.Scene.prototype.ambientColor=null;
5538 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogNear=10;
5539 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogFar=80;
5540 GLGE.Scene.prototype.fogType=GLGE.FOG_NONE;
5541 GLGE.Scene.prototype.passes=null;
5542 GLGE.Scene.prototype.culling=true;
5543 
5544 /**
5545 * Gets the fog falloff type
5546 * @returns {number} the far falloff type
5547 */
5548 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogType=function(){	
5549 	return this.fogType;
5550 }
5551 /**
5552 * Sets the scenes fog falloff type
5553 * @param {number} type The fog falloff type FOG_NONE,FOG_LINEAR,FOG_QUADRATIC
5554 */
5555 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogType=function(type){	
5556 	this.fogType=type;
5557 	return this;
5558 }
5559 
5560 /**
5561 * Gets the far fog distance
5562 * @returns {number} the far distance of the fog
5563 */
5564 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogFar=function(){	
5565 	return this.fogFar;
5566 }
5567 /**
5568 * Sets the scenes fog far distance
5569 * @param {number} dist The fog far distance
5570 */
5571 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogFar=function(dist){	
5572 	this.fogFar=dist;
5573 	return this;
5574 }
5575 
5576 /**
5577 * Gets the near fog distance
5578 * @returns {number} the near distance of the fog
5579 */
5580 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogNear=function(){	
5581 	return this.fogNear;
5582 }
5583 /**
5584 * Sets the scenes fog near distance
5585 * @param {number} dist The fog near distance
5586 */
5587 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogNear=function(dist){	
5588 	this.fogNear=dist;
5589 	return this;
5590 }
5591 
5592 /**
5593 * Gets the fog color
5594 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
5595 */
5596 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFogColor=function(){	
5597 	return this.fogColor;
5598 }
5599 /**
5600 * Sets the scenes fog color
5601 * @param {string} color The fog color
5602 */
5603 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFogColor=function(color){	
5604 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
5605 	this.fogColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
5606 	return this;
5607 }
5608 
5609 /**
5610 * Gets the scenes background color
5611 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
5612 */
5613 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getBackgroundColor=function(){	
5614 	return this.backgroundColor;
5615 }
5616 /**
5617 * Sets the scenes background color
5618 * @param {string} color The backgorund color
5619 */
5620 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setBackgroundColor=function(color){	
5621 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
5622 	this.backgroundColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b,a:color.a};
5623 	return this;
5624 }
5625 /**
5626 * Gets the scenes ambient light
5627 * @returns {object} An assoiative array r,g,b
5628 */
5629 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getAmbientColor=function(){	
5630 	return this.ambientColor;
5631 }
5632 
5633 /**
5634 * Sets the scenes ambient light
5635 * @param {string} color The ambient light color
5636 */
5637 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColor=function(color){	
5638 	color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
5639 	this.ambientColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
5640 	if(this.renderer){
5641 		this.renderer.gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, 1.0);
5642 	}
5643 	return this;
5644 }
5645 /**
5646 * Sets the scenes ambient light
5647 * @param {number} value the red componenent of the ambient light 0-1
5648 */
5649 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorR=function(value){	
5650 	this.ambientColor.r=value;
5651 	return this;
5652 }
5653 /**
5654 * Sets the scenes ambient light
5655 * @param {number} value the green componenent of the ambient light 0-1
5656 */
5657 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorG=function(value){	
5658 	this.ambientColor.g=value;
5659 	return this;
5660 }
5661 /**
5662 * Sets the scenes ambient light
5663 * @param {number} value the blue componenent of the ambient light 0-1
5664 */
5665 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setAmbientColorB=function(value){	
5666 	this.ambientColor.b=value;
5667 	return this;
5668 }
5669 
5670 /**
5671 5672 * Sets the active camera for this scene
5673 * @property {GLGE.Camera} object The object to be added
5674 */
5675 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setCamera=function(camera){	
5676 	if(typeof camera=="string")  camera=GLGE.Assets.get(camera);
5677 	this.camera=camera;
5678 	return this;
5679 }
5680 /**
5681 * Gets the scenes active camera
5682 * @returns {GLGE.Camera} The current camera
5683 */
5684 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getCamera=function(){	
5685 	return this.camera;
5686 }
5687 
5688 
5689 /**
5690 * Sets the Culling Flag
5691 */
5692 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setCull=function(cull){	
5693 	this.culling=cull;
5694 	return this;
5695 }
5696 /**
5697 * Gets the Culling Flag
5698 */
5699 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getCull=function(){	
5700 	return this.culling;
5701 }
5702 
5703 /**
5704 * used to initialize all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
5705 * @private
5706 */
5707 GLGE.Scene.prototype.GLInit=function(gl){
5708 	this.gl=gl;
5709 	gl.lights=this.getLights();
5710 	//sets the camera aspect to same aspect as the canvas
5711 	this.camera.setAspect(this.renderer.canvas.width/this.renderer.canvas.height);
5712 
5713 	//this.createPickBuffer(gl);
5714 	this.renderer.gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, 1.0);
5715 	
5716 	for(var i=0;i<this.children;i++){
5717 		if(this.children[i].GLInit) children[i].GLInit(gl);
5718 	}
5719 }
5720 /**
5721 * used to clean up all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
5722 * @private
5723 */
5724 GLGE.Scene.prototype.GLDestroy=function(gl){
5725 }
5726 /**
5727 * sort function
5728 */
5729 GLGE.Scene.sortFunc=function(a,b){
5730 	return a.zdepth-b.zdepth;
5731 }
5732 
5733 /**
5734 * z sorts the objects
5735 * @private
5736 */
5737 GLGE.Scene.prototype.zSort=function(gl,objects){
5738 	var cameraMatrix=gl.scene.camera.getViewMatrix();
5739 	var transMatrix;
5740 	for(var i=0;i<objects.length;i++){
5741 		if(objects[i].object.getBoundingVolume){
5742 			var center=objects[i].object.getBoundingVolume().getCenter();
5743 		}else{
5744 			var matrix=objects[i].object.getModelMatrix();
5745 			var center=[matrix[3],matrix[7],matrix[11]];
5746 		}
5747 		objects[i].zdepth=center[0]*cameraMatrix[8]+center[1]*cameraMatrix[9]+center[2]*cameraMatrix[10]+cameraMatrix[11];
5748 	}
5749 	objects.sort(GLGE.Scene.sortFunc);
5750 	return objects;
5751 }
5752 /**
5753 * sets the 2d filter to apply
5754 * @param {GLGE.Filter2d} filter the filter to apply when rendering the scene
5755 */
5756 GLGE.Scene.prototype.setFilter2d=function(value){
5757 	this.filter=value;
5758 	return this;
5759 }
5760 /**
5761 * gets the 2d filter being applied apply
5762 * @returns {GLGE.Filter2d}
5763 */
5764 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFilter2d=function(filter){
5765 	return this.filter;
5766 }
5767 /**
5768 * gets the scenes frame buffer
5769 * @private
5770 */
5771 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getFrameBuffer=function(gl){
5772 	if(this.filter) return this.filter.getFrameBuffer(gl);
5773 	return null;
5774 }
5775 /**
5776 * culls objects from the scene
5777 * @private
5778 */
5779 GLGE.Scene.prototype.objectsInViewFrustum=function(renderObjects,cvp){
5780 	var obj;
5781 	var returnObjects=[];
5782 	var planes=GLGE.cameraViewProjectionToPlanes(cvp);
5783 	for(var i=0;i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5784 		obj=renderObjects[i];
5785 		if(obj.getBoundingVolume && obj.cull){
5786 			var boundingVolume=obj.getBoundingVolume();
5787 			var center=boundingVolume.getCenter();
5788 			var radius=boundingVolume.getSphereRadius();
5789 			if(GLGE.sphereInFrustumPlanes([center[0],center[1],center[2],radius],planes)){
5790 				var points=boundingVolume.getCornerPoints();
5791 				if(GLGE.pointsInFrustumPlanes(points,planes)){
5792 					returnObjects.push(obj);
5793 				}
5794 			}	
5795 		}else{
5796 			returnObjects.push(obj);
5797 		}
5798 	}
5799 	return returnObjects;	
5800 }
5801 /**
5802 * Extracts all of the scene elements that need rendering
5803 * @private
5804 */
5805 GLGE.Scene.prototype.unfoldRenderObject=function(renderObjects){
5806 	var returnObjects=[];
5807 	for(var i=0;i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5808 		var renderObject=renderObjects[i];
5809 		if(renderObject.getMultiMaterials){
5810 			var multiMaterials=renderObject.getMultiMaterials();
5811 			for(var j=0;j<multiMaterials.length;j++){
5812 				var mat=multiMaterials[j].getMaterial();
5813 				var mesh=multiMaterials[j].getMesh();
5814 				if(!mat.meshIdx) mat.matIdx=j;
5815 				if(!mat.meshIdx) mat.meshIdx=j;
5816 				returnObjects.push({object:renderObject, multiMaterial:j});
5817 			}
5818 		}else{
5819 			returnObjects.push({object:renderObject, multiMaterial:0});
5820 		}
5821 	}
5822 	return returnObjects;
5823 }
5824 
5825 /**
5826 * State sorting function
5827 * @private
5828 */
5829 GLGE.Scene.prototype.stateSort=function(a,b){
5830 	if(!a.object.GLShaderProgram) return 1;
5831 	if(!b.object.GLShaderProgram) return -1;
5832 	var aidx=a.object.GLShaderProgram.progIdx;
5833 	var bidx=b.object.GLShaderProgram.progIdx;
5834 	if(aidx>bidx){
5835 		return 1;
5836 	}else if(aidx<bidx){
5837 		return -1;
5838 	}else{
5839 		if(!a.object.multimaterials || !b.object.multimaterials) return -1;
5840 		var aidx=a.object.multimaterials[a.multiMaterial].getMaterial().matIdx;
5841 		var bidx=b.object.multimaterials[b.multiMaterial].getMaterial().matIdx;
5842 		if(aidx>bidx){
5843 			return 1;
5844 		}else if(aidx<bidx){
5845 			return -1;
5846 		}else{
5847 			var amesh=a.object.multimaterials[a.multiMaterial].getMesh();
5848 			var bmesh=a.object.multimaterials[a.multiMaterial].getMesh();
5849 			if(!amesh) return -1;
5850 			if(!bmesh) return 1;
5851 			var aidx=amesh.meshIdx;
5852 			var bidx=bmesh.meshIdx;
5853 			if(aidx>bidx){
5854 				return 1;
5855 5856 			}else if(aidx<bidx){
5857 				return -1;
5858 			}else{
5859 				return 0;
5860 			}
5861 		}
5862 	}
5863 }
5864 
5865 
5866 /**
5867 * renders the scene
5868 * @private
5869 */
5870 GLGE.Scene.prototype.render=function(gl){
5871 	//if look at is set then look
5872 	if(this.camera.lookAt) this.camera.Lookat(this.camera.lookAt);	
5873 	
5874 	this.animate();
5875 	gl.lights=this.getLights();
5876 	
5877 	var lights=gl.lights;
5878 	gl.scene=this;
5879 	this.lastMaterial=null;
5880 	
5881 	gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
5882 	
5883 	this.framebuffer=this.getFrameBuffer(gl);
5884 	
5885 	var renderObjects=this.getObjects();
5886 	var cvp=this.camera.getViewProjection();
5887 	
5888 	if(this.culling){
5889 		var cvp=this.camera.getViewProjection();
5890 		renderObjects=this.objectsInViewFrustum(renderObjects,cvp);
5891 	}
5892 	renderObjects=this.unfoldRenderObject(renderObjects);
5893 	renderObjects=renderObjects.sort(this.stateSort);
5894 	
5895 	//shadow stuff
5896 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
5897 		if(lights[i].castShadows){
5898 			if(!lights[i].gl) lights[i].GLInit(gl);
5899 			var cameraMatrix=this.camera.matrix;
5900 			var cameraPMatrix=this.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
5901 			if(!lights[i].s_cache) lights[i].s_cache={};
5902 			if(lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix!=lights[i].getPMatrix() || lights[i].s_cache.mvmatrix!=lights[i].getModelMatrix()){
5903 				lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix=lights[i].getPMatrix();
5904 				lights[i].s_cache.mvmatrix=lights[i].getModelMatrix();
5905 				lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(lights[i].getModelMatrix());
5906 				lights[i].s_cache.smatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(lights[i].getPMatrix(),lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix);
5907 				lights[i].shadowRendered=false;
5908 			}
5909 				gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, lights[i].frameBuffer);
5910 				
5911 
5912 				gl.viewport(0,0,parseFloat2(lights[i].bufferWidth),parseFloat2(lights[i].bufferHeight));
5913 				gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
5914 				
5915 				this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(lights[i].s_cache.pmatrix);
5916 				this.camera.matrix=lights[i].s_cache.imvmatrix;
5917 				//draw shadows
5918 				for(var n=0; n<renderObjects.length;n++){
5919 					renderObjects[n].object.GLRender(gl, GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW,n,renderObjects[n].multiMaterial,lights[i].distance);
5920 				}
5921 				gl.flush();
5922 				this.camera.matrix=cameraMatrix;
5923 				this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(cameraPMatrix);
5924 				
5925 				gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, lights[i].texture);
5926 				gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5927 				gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5928 				gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5929 			
5930 			
5931 			gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
5932 		}
5933 	}
5934 	if(this.camera.animation) this.camera.animate();
5935 	
5936 	//null render pass to findout what else needs rendering
5937 	this.getPasses(gl,renderObjects);	
5938 	
5939 	//first off render the passes
5940 	var cameraMatrix=this.camera.matrix;
5941 	var cameraPMatrix=this.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
5942 	this.allowPasses=false;
5943 	while(this.passes.length>0){
5944 		var pass=this.passes.pop();
5945 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, pass.frameBuffer);
5946 		this.camera.matrix=pass.cameraMatrix;
5947 		this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(pass.projectionMatrix);
5948 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObjects,0,0,pass.width,pass.height,GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT,pass.self);
5949 	}
5950 	
5951 	this.camera.matrix=cameraMatrix;
5952 	this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(cameraPMatrix);
5953 	
5954 
5955 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framebuffer);
5956 	this.renderPass(gl,renderObjects,this.renderer.getViewportOffsetX(),this.renderer.getViewportOffsetY(),this.renderer.getViewportWidth(),this.renderer.getViewportHeight());	
5957 	
5958 	this.applyFilter(gl,renderObjects,null);
5959 	
5960 	this.allowPasses=true;
5961 	
5962 }
5963 /**
5964 * gets the passes needed to render this scene
5965 * @private
5966 */
5967 GLGE.Scene.prototype.getPasses=function(gl,renderObjects){
5968 	for(var i=0; i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5969 		renderObjects[i].object.GLRender(gl,GLGE.RENDER_NULL,0,renderObjects[i].multiMaterial);
5970 	}
5971 }
5972 
5973 /**
5974 * renders the scene
5975 * @private
5976 */
5977 GLGE.Scene.prototype.renderPass=function(gl,renderObjects,offsetx,offsety,width,height,type,self){
5978 	gl.clearDepth(1.0);
5979 	gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
5980 	gl.viewport(offsetx,offsety,width,height);
5981 	
5982 	gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, this.backgroundColor.a);
5983 	if(!type) {
5984 		gl.scissor(offsetx,offsety,width,height);
5985 		gl.enable(gl.SCISSOR_TEST);
5986 		this.renderer.GLClear();
5987 		gl.disable(gl.SCISSOR_TEST);
5988 	}else{
5989 		gl.clear(gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT | gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT);
5990 	}
5991 	if(!type) type=GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT;
5992 	
5993 	var transObjects=[];
5994 	gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
5995 	for(var i=0; i<renderObjects.length;i++){
5996 		if(!renderObjects[i].object.zTrans && renderObjects[i]!=self) renderObjects[i].object.GLRender(gl,type,0,renderObjects[i].multiMaterial);
5997 			else if(renderObjects[i]!=self) transObjects.push(renderObjects[i])
5998 	}
5999 
6000 	gl.enable(gl.BLEND);
6001 	transObjects=this.zSort(gl,transObjects);
6002 	for(var i=0; i<transObjects.length;i++){
6003 		if(renderObjects[i]!=self) transObjects[i].object.GLRender(gl, type,0,transObjects[i].multiMaterial);
6004 	}
6005 }
6006 
6007 GLGE.Scene.prototype.applyFilter=function(gl,renderObject,framebuffer){
6008 	if(this.filter && this.filter.renderDepth){	
6009 		gl.clearDepth(1.0);
6010 		gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
6011 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.filter.getDepthBuffer(gl));
6012 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObject,0,0,this.filter.getDepthBufferWidth(), this.filter.getDepthBufferHeight(),GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW);	
6013 	}
6014 	
6015 	if(this.filter && this.filter.renderNormal){	
6016 		gl.clearDepth(1.0);
6017 		gl.depthFunc(gl.LEQUAL);
6018 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.filter.getNormalBuffer(gl));
6019 		this.renderPass(gl,renderObject,0,0,this.filter.getNormalBufferWidth(),this.filter.getNormalBufferHeight(),GLGE.RENDER_NORMAL);	
6020 	}
6021 	
6022 	if(this.filter) this.filter.GLRender(gl,framebuffer);
6023 }
6024 
6025 /**
6026 * Adds and additional render pass to the scene for RTT, reflections and refractions
6027 * @private
6028 */
6029 GLGE.Scene.prototype.addRenderPass=function(frameBuffer,cameraMatrix,projectionMatrix,width,height,self){
6030 	if(this.allowPasses)	this.passes.push({frameBuffer:frameBuffer, cameraMatrix:cameraMatrix, projectionMatrix:projectionMatrix, height:height, width:width,self:self});
6031 	return this;
6032 }
6033 /**
6034 * Sets up the WebGL needed create a picking frame and render buffer
6035 * @private
6036 */
6037 /*GLGE.Scene.prototype.createPickBuffer=function(gl){
6038     this.framePickBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
6039     this.renderPickBufferD = gl.createRenderbuffer();
6040     this.renderPickBufferC = gl.createRenderbuffer();
6041     //this.pickTexture = gl.createTexture();
6042     //gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture);
6043 
6044     //TODO update when null is accepted
6045    /* try {
6046         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, 4, 1, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
6047     } catch (e) {
6048         var tex = new WebGLUnsignedByteArray(4*1*4);
6049         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, 4,1, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
6050     }
6051     
6052     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framePickBuffer);
6053     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferD);
6054     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16,4, 1);
6055     //gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture, 0);
6056     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferD);
6057     
6058     
6059     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferC);
6060     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.RGBA,4, 1);
6061     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBufferC);
6062     
6063     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
6064     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
6065     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
6066 }*/
6067 
6068 /**
6069 * ray query from origin in the given direction
6070 * @param origin the source of the ray
6071 * @param direction the direction of the ray
6072 */
6073 GLGE.Scene.prototype.ray=function(origin,direction){
6074 
6075 		var gl=this.renderer.gl;
6076 		var origmatrix=this.camera.matrix;	
6077 		var origpmatrix=this.camera.pMatrix;
6078 		
6079 		this.camera.matrix=GLGE.inverseMat4(GLGE.Mat4([direction[2], direction[1], direction[0], origin[0],
6080 									direction[0], direction[2], direction[1], origin[1],
6081 									direction[1], direction[0], direction[2], origin[2],
6082 									0, 0, 0, 1]));
6083 
6084 		if(!this.pickPMatrix)	this.pickPMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-0.0001,0.0001,-0.0001,0.0001,this.camera.near,this.camera.far);
6085 		this.camera.pMatrix=this.pickPMatrix;
6086 		gl.viewport(0,0,8,1);
6087 		gl.clear(gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
6088 		gl.disable(gl.BLEND);
6089 		gl.scene=this;
6090 		var objects=this.getObjects();
6091 		for(var i=0; i<objects.length;i++){
6092 			if(objects[i].pickable) objects[i].GLRender(gl,GLGE.RENDER_PICK,i+1);
6093 		}
6094 		gl.flush();
6095 
6096 		var data = new Uint8Array(8 * 1 * 4);
6097 		gl.readPixels(0, 0, 8, 1, gl.RGBA,gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
6098 		
6099 		
6100 		var norm=[data[4]/255,data[5]/255,data[6]/255];
6101 		var normalsize=Math.sqrt(norm[0]*norm[0]+norm[1]*norm[1]+norm[2]*norm[2])*0.5;
6102 		norm=[norm[0]/normalsize-1,norm[1]/normalsize-1,norm[2]/normalsize-1];
6103 		var obj=objects[data[0]+data[1]*256+data[2]*65536-1];
6104 		
6105 		var dist=(data[10]/255+0.00390625*data[9]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[8]/255)*this.camera.far;
6106 		var tex=[];
6107 		tex[0]=(data[14]/255+0.00390625*data[13]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[12]/255);
6108 		tex[1]=(data[18]/255+0.00390625*data[17]/255+0.0000152587890625*data[16]/255);
6109 		
6110 				
6111 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
6112 		gl.viewport(0,0,this.renderer.canvas.width,this.renderer.canvas.height);
6113 		
6114 		//revert the view matrix
6115 6116 		this.camera.matrix=origmatrix;	
6117 		this.camera.pMatrix=origpmatrix;
6118 		if (obj) {
6119 			return {object:obj,distance:dist,coord:[origin[0]-direction[0]*dist,origin[1]-direction[1]*dist,origin[2]-direction[2]*dist],normal:norm,texture:tex};
6120 		}
6121 		return null;
6122 }
6123 
6124 /**
6125 * Picks and object from canvas coords
6126 * @param x the canvas x coord to pick
6127 * @param y the canvas y coord to pick
6128 */
6129 
6130 GLGE.Scene.prototype.pick=function(x,y){
6131 	var ray = this.makeRay(x,y);
6132 	if (!ray) {
6133 		return null;
6134 	}
6135 6136 	return this.ray(ray.origin,ray.coord);
6137 };
6138 
6139 
6140 /**
6141 * Returns an object containing origin and coord, starting from the camera and pointing towards (x,y)
6142 * @param x the canvas x coord to pick
6143 * @param y the canvas y coord to pick
6144 */
6145 
6146 GLGE.Scene.prototype.makeRay=function(x,y){
6147 	if(!this.camera){
6148 		GLGE.error("No camera set for picking");
6149 		return null;
6150 	}else if(this.camera.matrix && this.camera.pMatrix){
6151 		var height=this.renderer.getViewportHeight();
6152 		var width=this.renderer.getViewportWidth();
6153 		var offsetx=this.renderer.getViewportOffsetX();
6154 		var offsety=this.renderer.getViewportHeight()-this.renderer.canvas.height+this.renderer.getViewportOffsetY();
6155 		var xcoord =  ((x-offsetx)/width-0.5)*2;
6156 		var ycoord = -((y+offsety)/height-0.5)*2;
6157 
6158 		var invViewProj=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.inverseMat4(this.camera.matrix),GLGE.inverseMat4(this.camera.pMatrix));
6159 		var origin =GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(invViewProj,[xcoord,ycoord,-1,1]);
6160 		origin=[origin[0]/origin[3],origin[1]/origin[3],origin[2]/origin[3]];
6161 		var coord =GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(invViewProj,[xcoord,ycoord,1,1]);
6162 		coord=[-(coord[0]/coord[3]-origin[0]),-(coord[1]/coord[3]-origin[1]),-(coord[2]/coord[3]-origin[2])];
6163 		coord=GLGE.toUnitVec3(coord);
6164 
6165 		return {origin: origin, coord: coord};
6166 		
6167 	}else{
6168 		return null;
6169 	}
6170 	
6171 };
6172 
6173 
6174 
6175 /**
6176 * @class Sets the scene to render
6177 * @param {object} canvas The canvas element to render to
6178 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6179 */
6180 GLGE.Renderer=function(canvas,error){
6181 	this.viewport=[];
6182 	this.canvas=canvas;
6183 	try {
6184 		this.gl = canvas.getContext("experimental-webgl",{alpha:true,depth:true,stencil:true,antialias:true,premultipliedAlpha:true});
6185 	} catch(e) {}
6186 	if(!this.gl) {
6187         console.log("GLGE err:", typeof(globalNoWebGLError)=="undefined")
6188 		if( (!error) && (typeof(globalNoWebGLError)=="undefined")){
6189 			var div=document.createElement("div");
6190 			div.setAttribute("style","position: absolute; top: 10px; left: 10px; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; padding: 10px;background-color: #fcffcb;color: #800; width: 200px; border:2px solid #f00");
6191 			div.innerHTML="Cannot detect webgl please download a compatible browser";
6192 			document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(div);
6193 			throw "cannot create webgl context";
6194 		}else{
6195 			error();
6196 			throw "cannot create webgl context";
6197 		}
6198 	}
6199 	//firefox is doing something here?
6200 	try{
6201 	this.gl.canvas=canvas;
6202 	}catch(e){};
6203 	//this.gl = WebGLDebugUtils.makeDebugContext(this.gl);
6204 	//this.gl.setTracing(true);
6205 
6206 	//chome compatibility
6207 	//TODO: Remove this when chome is right
6208 	if (!this.gl.getProgramParameter)
6209 	{
6210 		this.gl.getProgramParameter = this.gl.getProgrami
6211 	}
6212 	if (!this.gl.getShaderParameter)
6213 	{
6214 		this.gl.getShaderParameter = this.gl.getShaderi
6215 	}
6216 	// End of Chrome compatibility code
6217 	
6218 	this.gl.uniformMatrix4fvX=this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv
6219 	this.gl.uniformMatrix4fv=function(uniform,transpose,array){
6220 		if(!transpose){
6221 			this.uniformMatrix4fvX(uniform,false,array);
6222 		}else{
6223 			GLGE.mat4gl(GLGE.transposeMat4(array),array);
6224 			this.uniformMatrix4fvX(uniform,false,array);
6225 		}
6226 	}
6227 	var gl=this.gl;
6228 	
6229 	/*this.gl.texImage2Dx=this.gl.texImage2D;
6230 	this.gl.texImage2D=function(){
6231 		if(arguments.length==9){
6232 			gl.texImage2Dx(arguments[0], arguments[1], arguments[2],arguments[3],arguments[4],arguments[5],arguments[6],arguments[7],arguments[8]);
6233 		}else{
6234 			gl.texImage2Dx(arguments[0], arguments[1], arguments[5],false,false);
6235 		}
6236 	}*/
6237 
6238 	
6239 	//set up defaults
6240 	this.gl.clearDepth(1.0);
6241 	this.gl.clearStencil(0);
6242 6243 	this.gl.enable(this.gl.DEPTH_TEST);
6244     
6245     
6246 	this.gl.depthFunc(this.gl.LEQUAL);
6247 	this.gl.blendFuncSeparate(this.gl.SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ZERO,this.gl.ONE);	
6248 };
6249 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Renderer);
6250 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.gl=null;
6251 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.scene=null;
6252 GLGE.C_STENCIL=1;
6253 GLGE.C_DEPTH=2;
6254 GLGE.C_COLOR=4;
6255 GLGE.C_ALL=7;
6256 
6257 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.clearType=GLGE.C_ALL;
6258 
6259 /**
6260 * Sets the width of the viewport to render
6261 * @param width the width of the viewport to render
6262 */
6263 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setViewportWidth=function(width){
6264 	this.viewport[0]=width;
6265 	return this;
6266 };
6267 /**
6268 * Sets the height of the viewport to render
6269 * @param height the height of the viewport to render
6270 */
6271 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setViewportHeight=function(height){
6272 	this.viewport[1]=height;
6273 	return this;
6274 };
6275 /**
6276 * Sets the left offset of the viewport to render
6277 * @param left the left offset of the viewport to render
6278 */
6279 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setViewportOffsetX=function(left){
6280 	this.viewport[2]=left;
6281 	return this;
6282 };
6283 /**
6284 * Sets the top offset of the viewport to render
6285 * @param top the top offset of the viewport to render
6286 */
6287 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setViewportOffsetY=function(top){
6288 	this.viewport[3]=top;
6289 	return this;
6290 };
6291 /**
6292 * Clears all viewport data and defaults back to canvas size
6293 */
6294 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.clearViewport=function(){
6295 	this.viewport=[];
6296 };
6297 /**
6298 * Gets the width of the viewport to render
6299 * @returns the viewport width
6300 */
6301 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getViewportWidth=function(){
6302 	if(this.viewport.length>0){
6303 		return this.viewport[0];
6304 	}else{
6305 		return this.canvas.width;
6306 	}
6307 };
6308 /**
6309 * Gets the height of the viewport to render
6310 * @returns the viewport height
6311 */
6312 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getViewportHeight=function(){
6313 	if(this.viewport.length>0){
6314 		return this.viewport[1];
6315 	}else{
6316 		return this.canvas.height;
6317 	}
6318 };
6319 /**
6320 * Gets the left offset of the viewport to render
6321 * @returns the left viewport offset
6322 */
6323 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getViewportOffsetX=function(){
6324 	if(this.viewport.length>0){
6325 		return this.viewport[2];
6326 	}else{
6327 		return 0;
6328 	}
6329 };
6330 /**
6331 * Gets the top offset of the viewport to render
6332 * @returns the top viewport offset
6333 */
6334 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getViewportOffsetY=function(){
6335 	if(this.viewport.length>0){
6336 		return this.viewport[3];
6337 	}else{
6338 		return 0;
6339 	}
6340 };
6341 
6342 /**
6343 * Sets the clear type for rendering GLGE.C_ALL, GLGE.C_STENCIL, GLGE.C_DEPTH, GLGE.C_COLOR
6344 * @param type how to clear the viewport for the next render
6345 */
6346 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setClearType=function(type){
6347 	this.clearType=type;
6348 	return this;
6349 };
6350 /**
6351 * Gets the clear type for rendering GLGE.C_ALL, GLGE.C_STENCIL, GLGE.C_DEPTH, GLGE.C_COLOR
6352 * @returns how to clear the viewport for the next render
6353 */
6354 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getClearType=function(){
6355 	return this.clearType;
6356 };
6357 /**
6358 * Clears the viewport
6359 * @private
6360 */
6361 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.GLClear=function(){
6362 	var gl=this.gl;
6363 	var clearType=this.clearType;
6364 	var clear=0;
6365 	if(clearType & GLGE.C_COLOR ==  GLGE.C_COLOR){
6366 		clear=clear | gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
6367 	}
6368 	if(clearType & GLGE.C_DEPTH == GLGE.C_DEPTH){
6369 		clear=clear | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
6370 	}
6371 	if(clearType & GLGE.C_STENCIL == GLGE.C_STENCIL){
6372 		clear=clear | gl.STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT;
6373 	}
6374 	gl.clear(clear);
6375 };
6376 /**
6377 * Gets the scene which is set to be rendered
6378 * @returns the current render scene
6379 */
6380 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getScene=function(){
6381 	return this.scene;
6382 };
6383 /**
6384 * Sets the scene to render
6385 * @param {GLGE.Scene} scene The scene to be rendered
6386 */
6387 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setScene=function(scene){
6388 	scene.renderer=this;
6389 	this.scene=scene;
6390 	scene.GLInit(this.gl);
6391 	this.render();
6392 	scene.camera.matrix=null; //reset camera matrix to force cache update
6393 	return this;
6394 };
6395 /**
6396 * Renders the current scene to the canvas
6397 */
6398 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.render=function(){
6399 	if(this.cullFaces) this.gl.enable(this.gl.CULL_FACE);
6400 	if (this.scene)
6401 	this.scene.render(this.gl);
6402 	//if this is the first ever pass then render twice to fill shadow buffers
6403 	if(!this.rendered&&this.scene){
6404 		this.scene.render(this.gl);
6405 		this.rendered=true;
6406 	}
6407 };
6408 
6409 
6410 /**
6411 * @class A texture to be included in a material
6412 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
6413 * @see GLGE.Material
6414 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6415 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6416 */
6417 GLGE.Texture=function(uid){
6418 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6419 }
6420 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Texture);
6421 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Texture);
6422 GLGE.Texture.prototype.className="Texture";
6423 GLGE.Texture.prototype.image=null;
6424 GLGE.Texture.prototype.glTexture=null;
6425 GLGE.Texture.prototype.url=null;
6426 /**
6427 * Gets the textures used by the layer
6428 * @return {string} The textures image url
6429 */
6430 GLGE.Texture.prototype.getSrc=function(){
6431 	return this.url;
6432 };
6433 
6434 /**
6435 * Sets the textures image location
6436 * @param {string} url the texture image url
6437 */
6438 GLGE.Texture.prototype.setSrc=function(url){
6439 	this.url=url;
6440 	this.state=0;
6441 	this.image=new Image();
6442 	var texture=this;
6443 	this.image.onload = function(){
6444 		texture.state=1;
6445 	}	
6446 	this.image.src=url;	
6447 	if(this.glTexture && this.gl){
6448 		this.gl.deleteTexture(this.glTexture);
6449 		this.glTexture=null;
6450 	}
6451 	return this;
6452 };
6453 
6454 /**
6455 * Sets the textures image location
6456 * @private
6457 **/
6458 GLGE.Texture.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
6459 	this.gl=gl;
6460 	//create the texture if it's not already created
6461 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
6462 	//if the image is loaded then set in the texture data
6463 	if(this.state==1){
6464 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6465 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE,this.image);
6466 		gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
6467 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
6468 		this.state=2;
6469 	}
6470 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6471 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6472 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
6473 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, gl.REPEAT);
6474 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, gl.REPEAT);
6475 	
6476 	if(this.state==2) return true;
6477 		else return false;
6478 }
6479 
6480 /**
6481 * @class A canvase texture to be included in a material
6482 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
6483 * @see GLGE.Material
6484 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6485 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6486 */
6487 GLGE.TextureCanvas=function(uid){
6488 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6489 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
6490 }
6491 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCanvas);
6492 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCanvas);
6493 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.className="TextureCanvas";
6494 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.glTexture=null;
6495 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.autoUpdate=true;
6496 /**
6497 * Gets the auto update flag
6498 * @return {boolean} The auto update flag
6499 */
6500 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getAutoUpdate=function(){
6501 	return this.autoUpdate;
6502 };
6503 /**
6504 * Sets the auto update flag
6505 * @param {boolean} value The auto update flag
6506 */
6507 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setAutoUpdate=function(value){
6508 	this.autoUpdate=value;
6509 	return this;
6510 };
6511 /**
6512 * Gets the canvas used by the texture
6513 * @return {canvas} The textures image url
6514 */
6515 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getCanvas=function(){
6516 	return this.canvas;
6517 };
6518 /**
6519 * Sets the canvas used by the texture
6520 * @param {canvas} canvas The canvas to use
6521 */
6522 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setCanvas=function(canvas){
6523 	this.canvas=canvas;
6524 	return this;
6525 };
6526 /**
6527 * Sets the canvas height
6528 * @param {number} value The canvas height
6529 */
6530 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setHeight=function(value){
6531 	this.canvas.height=value;
6532 	return this;
6533 };
6534 /**
6535 * Sets the canvas width
6536 * @param {number} value The canvas width
6537 */
6538 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.setWidth=function(value){
6539 	this.canvas.width=value;
6540 	return this;
6541 };
6542 
6543 /**
6544 * gets the canvas height
6545 * @returns {number} The canvas height
6546 */
6547 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getHeight=function(){
6548 	return this.canvas.height;
6549 };
6550 /**
6551 * gets the canvas width
6552 * @returns {number} The canvas width
6553 */
6554 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.getWidth=function(){
6555 	return this.canvas.width;
6556 };
6557 
6558 /**
6559 * does the canvas texture GL stuff
6560 * @private
6561 **/
6562 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
6563 	this.gl=gl;
6564 	//create the texture if it's not already created
6565 	if(!this.glTexture){
6566 		this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
6567 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6568 		this.updateCanvas(gl);
6569 	}else{
6570 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6571 		if(this.autoUpdate || this.doUpdate) this.updateCanvas(gl);
6572 	}
6573 	this.doUpdate=false;
6574 
6575 	
6576 	return true;
6577 }
6578 /**
6579 * Manually updates the canvas Texture
6580 */
6581 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.update=function(){
6582 	this.doUpdate=true;
6583 }
6584 /**
6585 * Updates the canvas texture
6586 * @private
6587 */
6588 GLGE.TextureCanvas.prototype.updateCanvas=function(gl){
6589 	var canvas = this.canvas;
6590 	
6591 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6592 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
6593 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas);}
6594 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, canvas,null);}
6595 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6596 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6597 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
6598 }
6599 
6600 
6601 /**
6602 * @class A video texture to be included in a material
6603 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
6604 * @see GLGE.Material
6605 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6606 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6607 */
6608 GLGE.TextureVideo=function(uid){
6609 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6610 	this.video=document.createElement("video");
6611 	this.video.style.display="none";
6612 	this.video.setAttribute("loop","loop");
6613 	this.video.autoplay=true;
6614 	//looping isn't working in firefox so quick fix!
6615 	this.video.addEventListener("ended", function() { this.play(); }, true); 
6616 	//video needs to be part of page to work for some reason :-s
6617 	document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(this.video);
6618 	//used to get webkit working
6619 	this.canvas=document.createElement("canvas");
6620 	this.ctx=this.canvas.getContext("2d");
6621 	
6622 }
6623 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureVideo);
6624 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureVideo);
6625 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.className="TextureVideo";
6626 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.glTexture=null;
6627 /**
6628 * Gets the canvas used by the texture
6629 * @return {video} The textures image url
6630 */
6631 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.getVideo=function(){
6632 	return this.video;
6633 };
6634 /**
6635 * Sets the video used by the texture
6636 * @param {video} canvas The canvas to use
6637 */
6638 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.setVideo=function(video){
6639 	this.video=video;
6640 	return this;
6641 };
6642 
6643 /**
6644 * Sets the source used for the video
6645 * @param {string} src The URL of the video
6646 */
6647 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.setSrc=function(src){
6648 	this.video.src=src;
6649 	return this;
6650 };
6651 /**
6652 * gets the source used for the video
6653 * @returns {string} The URL of the video
6654 */
6655 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.getSrc=function(src){
6656 	return this.video.src;
6657 };
6658 
6659 /**
6660 * does the canvas texture GL stuff
6661 * @private
6662 **/
6663 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.doTexture=function(gl){
6664 	this.gl=gl;
6665 	//create the texture if it's not already created
6666 	if(!this.glTexture){
6667 		this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
6668 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6669 		this.updateTexture(gl);
6670 	}else{
6671 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6672 		this.updateTexture(gl);
6673 	}
6674 
6675 	
6676 	return true;
6677 }
6678 /**
6679 * Updates the canvas texture
6680 * @private
6681 */
6682 GLGE.TextureVideo.prototype.updateTexture=function(gl){
6683 	var video = this.video;
6684 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6685 	//TODO: fix this when minefield is upto spec
6686 	if(video.readyState>0){
6687 	if(video.height<=0){
6688 		video.style.display="";
6689 		video.height=video.offsetHeight;
6690 		video.width=video.offsetWidth;
6691 		video.style.display="none";
6692 	}
6693 	this.canvas.height=video.height;
6694 	this.canvas.width=video.width;
6695 	this.ctx.drawImage(video, 0, 0);
6696 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.canvas);}
6697 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.canvas,null);}
6698 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6699 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6700 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
6701 	
6702 	/*
6703 	use when video is working in webkit
6704 	try{gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, video);}
6705 	catch(e){gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, video,null);}
6706 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6707 	gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6708 	gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
6709 	*/
6710 	}
6711 }
6712 
6713 
6714 
6715 /**
6716 * @class A reflection texture will reflect in a plane for a specified transform
6717 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
6718 * @see GLGE.Material
6719 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6720 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6721 */
6722 GLGE.TextureCamera=function(uid){
6723 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6724 }
6725 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCamera);
6726 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCamera);
6727 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.className="Texture";
6728 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.texture=null;
6729 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.glTexture=null;
6730 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.object=null;
6731 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.camera=null;
6732 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.bufferHeight=0;
6733 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.bufferWidth=0;
6734 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.mirrorAxis=GLGE.NONE;
6735 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.clipAxis=GLGE.NONE;
6736 
6737 /**
6738 * sets the RTT  render buffer width
6739 * @param {number} buffer width
6740 **/
6741 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setBufferWidth=function(width){
6742 	this.bufferWidth=width;
6743 	this.update=true;
6744 	return this;
6745 }
6746 /**
6747 * gets the RTT  render buffer width
6748 * @returns the width
6749 **/
6750 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getBufferWidth=function(){
6751 	return this.bufferWidth;
6752 }
6753 
6754 /**
6755 * sets the RTT  render buffer height
6756 * @param {number} buffer height
6757 **/
6758 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setBufferHeight=function(height){
6759 	this.bufferHeight=height;
6760 	this.update=true;
6761 	return this;
6762 }
6763 /**
6764 * gets the RTT  render buffer height
6765 * @returns the height
6766 **/
6767 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getBufferHeight=function(){
6768 	return this.bufferHeight;
6769 }
6770 
6771 /**
6772 * sets the RTT  clip axis
6773 * @param {number} the axis
6774 **/
6775 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setClipAxis=function(camera){
6776 	this.clipAxis=camera;
6777 	return this;
6778 }
6779 /**
6780 * gets the RTT clip axis
6781 * @returns the axis
6782 **/
6783 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getClipAxis=function(){
6784 	return this.clipAxis;
6785 }
6786 
6787 /**
6788 * sets the RTT  mirror axis
6789 * @param {number} the axis
6790 **/
6791 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setMirrorAxis=function(camera){
6792 	this.mirrorAxis=camera;
6793 	return this;
6794 }
6795 /**
6796 * gets the RTT mirror axis
6797 * @returns the axis
6798 **/
6799 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getMirrorAxis=function(){
6800 	return this.mirrorAxis;
6801 }
6802 
6803 /**
6804 * sets the RTT camera to use
6805 * @param {GLGE.Camera} the source camera
6806 **/
6807 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.setCamera=function(camera){
6808 6809 	this.camera=camera;
6810 	return this;
6811 }
6812 /**
6813 * gets the RTT source camera
6814 * @returns {GLGE.Camera} the source camera
6815 **/
6816 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.getCamera=function(){
6817 	return this.camera;
6818 }
6819 
6820 /**
6821 * does what is needed to get the texture
6822 * @private
6823 **/
6824 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.doTexture=function(gl,object){
6825 	if(this.camera){
6826 		this.gl=gl;
6827 		var modelmatrix=object.getModelMatrix();
6828 		var pmatrix=gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
6829 		var cameramatrix=this.camera.getViewMatrix();
6830 		var matrix;
6831 		
6832 		if(this.mirrorAxis){
6833 			switch(this.mirrorAxis){
6834 				case GLGE.XAXIS:
6835 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(-1,1,1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
6836 				break;
6837 				case GLGE.YAXIS:
6838 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(1,-1,1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
6839 				break;
6840 				case GLGE.ZAXIS:
6841 					matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(cameramatrix,modelmatrix),GLGE.scaleMatrix(1,1,-1)),GLGE.inverseMat4(modelmatrix));
6842 				break;
6843 			}
6844 		}else{
6845 			matrix=cameramatrix;
6846 		}
6847 		
6848 		if(this.clipAxis){
6849 			var clipplane
6850 			switch(this.clipAxis){
6851 				case GLGE.NEG_XAXIS:
6852 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[0],-modelmatrix[4],-modelmatrix[8]]);
6853 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
6854 					break;
6855 				case GLGE.POS_XAXIS:
6856 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[0],modelmatrix[4],modelmatrix[8]]);
6857 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
6858 					break;
6859 				case GLGE.NEG_YAXIS:
6860 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[1],-modelmatrix[5],-modelmatrix[9]]);
6861 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
6862 					break;
6863 				case GLGE.POS_YAXIS:
6864 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[1],modelmatrix[5],modelmatrix[9]]);
6865 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)];
6866 					break;
6867 				case GLGE.NEG_ZAXIS:
6868 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([-modelmatrix[2],-modelmatrix[6],-modelmatrix[10]]);
6869 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)-0.5];
6870 					break;
6871 				case GLGE.POS_ZAXIS:
6872 					var dirnorm=GLGE.toUnitVec3([modelmatrix[2],modelmatrix[6],modelmatrix[10]]);
6873 					clipplane=[dirnorm[0],dirnorm[1],dirnorm[2],-GLGE.dotVec3([modelmatrix[3],modelmatrix[7],modelmatrix[11]],dirnorm)-0.5];
6874 					break;
6875 			}
6876 			
6877 			var itmvp=GLGE.transposeMat4(GLGE.inverseMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(pmatrix,matrix)));
6878 
6879 			clipplane=GLGE.mulMat4Vec4(itmvp,clipplane);
6880 			clipplane=GLGE.scaleVec4(clipplane,pmatrix[10]);
6881 			clipplane[3] -= 1;
6882 			if(clipplane[2]<0) GLGE.scaleVec4(clipplane,-1);
6883 			var suffix=[ 1,0,0,0,
6884 					0,1,0,0,
6885 					clipplane[0],clipplane[1],clipplane[2],clipplane[3],
6886 					0,0,0,1];
6887 			pmatrix=GLGE.mulMat4(suffix,pmatrix);
6888 		}
6889 		var height=(!this.bufferHeight ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.height : this.bufferHeight);
6890 		var width=(!this.bufferWidth ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.width : this.bufferWidth);
6891 	
6892 		//create the texture if it's not already created
6893 		if(!this.glTexture || this.update){
6894 			this.createFrameBuffer(gl);
6895 			gl.scene.addRenderPass(this.frameBuffer,matrix, gl.scene.camera.getProjectionMatrix(),width,height,object);
6896 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6897 			this.update=false;
6898 			return false;
6899 		}else{	
6900 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6901 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6902 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
6903 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_S, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
6904 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_WRAP_T, gl.CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
6905 			gl.scene.addRenderPass(this.frameBuffer,matrix, pmatrix,width,height,object);
6906 			return true;
6907 		}
6908 	}else{
6909 		return false;
6910 	}
6911 }
6912 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.registerPasses=GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.doTexture;
6913 /**
6914 * Creates the frame buffer for our texture
6915 * @private
6916 */
6917 GLGE.TextureCamera.prototype.createFrameBuffer=function(gl){
6918 	var height=(!this.bufferHeight ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.height : this.bufferHeight);
6919 	var width=(!this.bufferWidth ? gl.scene.renderer.canvas.width : this.bufferWidth);
6920 	
6921 	if(!this.frameBuffer) this.frameBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
6922 	if(!this.renderBuffer) this.renderBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
6923 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
6924 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture);
6925 
6926 	var tex = new Uint8Array(width*height*4);
6927 	gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, width,height, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
6928     
6929 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.frameBuffer);
6930     
6931 	gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
6932 	//dpeth stencil doesn't seem to work in either webkit or mozilla so don't use for now - reflected particles will be messed up!
6933 	//gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_STENCIL,width, height);
6934 	//gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
6935 	gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT16,width, height);
6936 	gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
6937     
6938 	gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.glTexture, 0);	
6939     
6940 	gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
6941 	gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
6942 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
6943 }
6944 
6945 
6946 
6947 
6948 /**
6949 * @class A texture to be included in a material
6950 * @param {string} uid the unique id for this texture
6951 * @see GLGE.Material
6952 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
6953 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
6954 */
6955 GLGE.TextureCube=function(uid){
6956 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
6957 }
6958 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.TextureCube);
6959 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.TextureCube);
6960 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.className="TextureCube";
6961 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posX=null;
6962 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negX=null;
6963 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posY=null;
6964 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negY=null;
6965 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.posZ=null;
6966 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.negZ=null;
6967 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.texture=null;
6968 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.glTexture=null;
6969 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.loadState=0;
6970 /**
6971 * Sets the url for a given image
6972 * @param {string} url the texture image url
6973 * @param {string} image the image element to load
6974 */
6975 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrc=function(url,image,mask){
6976 	this.url=url;
6977 	this.state=0;
6978 	this[image]=new Image();
6979 	var texture=this;
6980 	this[image].onload = function(){
6981 		texture.loadState+=mask;
6982 	}	
6983 	this[image].src=url;	
6984 	if(this.glTexture && this.gl) {
6985 		this.gl.deleteTexture(this.glTexture);
6986 		this.glTexture=null;
6987 	}
6988 	return this;
6989 }
6990 
6991 /**
6992 * Sets the positive X cube image
6993 * @param {string} url the texture image url
6994 */
6995 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosX=function(url){
6996 	this.setSrc(url,"posX",1);
6997 	return this;
6998 };
6999 /**
7000 * Sets the negative X cube image
7001 * @param {string} url the texture image url
7002 */
7003 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegX=function(url){
7004 	this.setSrc(url,"negX",2);
7005 	return this;
7006 };
7007 /**
7008 * Sets the positive Y cube image
7009 * @param {string} url the texture image url
7010 */
7011 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosY=function(url){
7012 	this.setSrc(url,"posY",4);
7013 	return this;
7014 };
7015 /**
7016 * Sets the negative Y cube image
7017 * @param {string} url the texture image url
7018 */
7019 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegY=function(url){
