7020 	if(typeof url!="string"){
7021 		this.negY=url;
7022 		this.loadState+=8;
7023 	}else{
7024 		this.setSrc(url,"negY",8);
7025 	}
7026 	return this;
7027 };
7028 /**
7029 * Sets the positive Z cube image
7030 * @param {string} url the texture image url
7031 */
7032 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcPosZ=function(url){
7033 	this.setSrc(url,"posZ",16);
7034 	return this;
7035 };
7036 /**
7037 * Sets the negative Z cube image
7038 * @param {string} url the texture image url
7039 */
7040 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.setSrcNegZ=function(url){
7041 	this.setSrc(url,"negZ",32);
7042 	return this;
7043 };
7044 
7045 /**
7046 * Sets the textures image location
7047 * @private
7048 **/
7049 GLGE.TextureCube.prototype.doTexture=function(gl,object){
7050 	this.gl=gl;
7051 	//create the texture if it's not already created
7052 	if(!this.glTexture) this.glTexture=gl.createTexture();
7053 	//if the image is loaded then set in the texture data
7054 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, this.glTexture);
7055 	if(this.loadState==63 && this.state==0){
7056 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posX);
7057 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negX);
7058 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posY);
7059 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negY);
7060 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Z, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.posZ);
7061 		gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Z, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, this.negZ);
7062 		gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP);
7063 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, null);
7064 		this.state=1;
7065 	}
7066 	gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, this.glTexture);
7067 	if(this.state==1) return true;
7068 		else return false;
7069 }
7070 
7071 
7072 /**
7073 * @class The material layer describes how to apply this layer to the material
7074 * @see GLGE.Material
7075 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
7076 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
7077 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
7078 * @augments GLGE.Events
7079 */
7080 GLGE.MaterialLayer=function(uid){
7081 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
7082 	this.blendMode=GLGE.BL_MIX;
7083 };
7084 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
7085 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
7086 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
7087 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
7088 /**
7089  * @name GLGE.MaterialLayer#shaderupdated
7090  * @event Fires when a change will result in a change to the GLSL shader
7091  * @param {object} data
7092  */
7093  
7094 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.className="MaterialLayer";
7095 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.texture=null;
7096 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.blendMode=null;
7097 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapto=GLGE.M_COLOR;
7098 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapinput=GLGE.UV1;
7099 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleX=1;
7100 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetX=0;
7101 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotX=0;
7102 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleY=1;
7103 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetY=0;
7104 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotY=0;
7105 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleZ=1;
7106 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetZ=0;
7107 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotZ=0;
7108 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleX=0;
7109 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetX=0;
7110 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotX=0;
7111 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleY=0;
7112 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetY=0;
7113 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotY=0;
7114 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleZ=0;
7115 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetZ=0;
7116 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotZ=0;
7117 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.alpha=1;
7118 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.height=0.05;
7119 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.matrix=null;
7120 
7121 /**
7122 * Gets the textures used by the layer
7123 * @return {GLGE.Texture} The current shininess of the material
7124 */
7125 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMatrix=function(){
7126 	if(!this.matrix){
7127 		var offset=this.getOffset();
7128 		var scale=this.getScale();
7129 		var rotation=this.getRotation();
7130 		this.matrix=GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.mulMat4(GLGE.translateMatrix(offset.x,offset.y,offset.z),GLGE.scaleMatrix(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z)),GLGE.rotateMatrix(rotation.x,rotation.y,rotation.z));
7131 	}
7132 	return this.matrix;
7133 };
7134 /**
7135 * Sets the height for this layer, currently only used for parallax mapping
7136 * @param {number} the height of this layer
7137 */
7138 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setHeight=function(value){
7139 	this.height=value;
7140 	return this;
7141 };
7142 /**
7143 * Gets the height for this layer, currently only used for parallax mapping
7144 * @return {number} the height of this layer
7145 */
7146 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getHeight=function(){
7147 	return this.height;
7148 };
7149 
7150 /**
7151 * Sets the textures alpha blending value
7152 * @param {number} the alpha for this layer
7153 */
7154 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setAlpha=function(value){
7155 	this.alpha=value;
7156 	return this;
7157 };
7158 /**
7159 * Gets the textures alpha blending value
7160 * @return {number} the alpha for this layer
7161 */
7162 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getAlpha=function(){
7163 	return this.alpha;
7164 };
7165 
7166 /**
7167 * Sets the textures used by the layer
7168 * @param {GLGE.Texture} value the teture to associate with this layer
7169 */
7170 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setTexture=function(value){
7171 	if(typeof value=="string")  value=GLGE.Assets.get(value);
7172 	this.texture=value;
7173 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7174 	return this;
7175 };
7176 /**
7177 7178 * Gets the textures used by the layer
7179 * @return {GLGE.Texture} The current shininess of the material
7180 */
7181 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getTexture=function(){
7182 	return this.texture;
7183 };
7184 /**
7185 * Sets the flag for how this layer maps to the material
7186 * @param {Number} value the flags to set for this layer
7187 */
7188 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setMapto=function(value){
7189 	this.mapto=value;
7190 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7191 	return this;
7192 };
7193 /**
7194 * Gets the flag representing the way the layer maps to the material
7195 * @return {Number} The flags currently set for this layer
7196 */
7197 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMapto=function(){
7198 	return this.mapto;
7199 };
7200 /**
7201 * Sets the texture coordinate system
7202 * @param {Number} value the mapping to use
7203 */
7204 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setMapinput=function(value){
7205 	this.mapinput=value;
7206 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7207 	return this;
7208 };
7209 /**
7210 * Gets the texture coordinate system
7211 * @return {Number} The current mapping
7212 */
7213 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMapinput=function(){
7214 	return this.mapinput;
7215 };
7216 
7217 /**
7218 * Gets the layers texture offset
7219 * @return {object} the current offset
7220 */
7221 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffset=function(){
7222 	var offset={};
7223 	offset.x=parseFloat(this.getOffsetX())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetX());
7224 	offset.y=parseFloat(this.getOffsetY())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetY());
7225 	offset.z=parseFloat(this.getOffsetZ())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetZ());
7226 	return offset;
7227 };
7228 
7229 /**
7230 * Gets the layers texture rotation
7231 * @return {object} the current rotation
7232 */
7233 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotation=function(){
7234 	var rotation={};
7235 	rotation.x=parseFloat(this.getRotX())+parseFloat(this.getDRotX());
7236 	rotation.y=parseFloat(this.getRotY())+parseFloat(this.getDRotY());
7237 	rotation.z=parseFloat(this.getRotZ())+parseFloat(this.getDRotZ());
7238 	return rotation;
7239 };
7240 
7241 /**
7242 7243 * Gets the layers texture scale
7244 * @return {object} the current scale
7245 */
7246 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScale=function(){
7247 	var scale={};
7248 	scale.x=parseFloat(this.getScaleX())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleX());
7249 	scale.y=parseFloat(this.getScaleY())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleY());
7250 	scale.z=parseFloat(this.getScaleZ())+parseFloat(this.getDScaleZ());
7251 	return scale;
7252 };
7253 
7254 /**
7255 * Sets the layers texture X offset
7256 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7257 */
7258 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetX=function(value){
7259 	this.matrix=null;
7260 	this.offsetX=value;
7261 	return this;
7262 };
7263 /**
7264 * Gets the layers texture X offset
7265 * @return {Number} the current offset
7266 */
7267 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetX=function(){
7268 	return this.offsetX;
7269 };
7270 /**
7271 * Sets the layers texture Y offset
7272 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7273 */
7274 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetY=function(value){
7275 	this.matrix=null;
7276 	this.offsetY=value;
7277 	return this;
7278 };
7279 /**
7280 * Gets the layers texture Y offset
7281 * @return {Number} the current offset
7282 */
7283 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetY=function(){
7284 	return this.offsetY;
7285 };
7286 /**
7287 * Sets the layers texture Z offset
7288 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7289 */
7290 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setOffsetZ=function(value){
7291 	this.matrix=null;
7292 	this.offsetZ=value;
7293 	return this;
7294 };
7295 /**
7296 * Gets the layers texture Z offset
7297 * @return {Number} the current offset
7298 */
7299 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getOffsetZ=function(){
7300 	return this.offsetZ;
7301 };
7302 /**
7303 * Sets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
7304 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7305 */
7306 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetX=function(value){
7307 	this.matrix=null;
7308 	this.dOffsetX=value;
7309 	return this;
7310 };
7311 /**
7312 * Gets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
7313 * @return {Number} the current offset
7314 */
7315 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetX=function(){
7316 	return this.dOffsetX;
7317 };
7318 /**
7319 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment offset, useful for animation
7320 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7321 */
7322 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetY=function(value){
7323 	this.matrix=null;
7324 	this.dOffsetY=value;
7325 	return this;
7326 };
7327 /**
7328 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment offset, useful for animation
7329 * @return {Number} the current offset
7330 */
7331 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetY=function(){
7332 	return this.dOffsetY;
7333 };
7334 /**
7335 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment offset, useful for animation
7336 * @param {Number} value the amount to offset the texture
7337 */
7338 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDOffsetZ=function(value){
7339 	this.matrix=null;
7340 	this.dOffsetZ=value;
7341 	return this;
7342 };
7343 /**
7344 * Gets the layers texture X displacment offset, useful for animation
7345 * @return {Number} the current offset
7346 */
7347 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDOffsetZ=function(){
7348 	return this.dOffsetZ;
7349 };
7350 /**
7351 * Sets the layers texture X scale
7352 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7353 */
7354 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleX=function(value){
7355 	this.matrix=null;
7356 	this.scaleX=value;
7357 	return this;
7358 };
7359 /**
7360 7361 * Gets the layers texture X scale
7362 * @return {Number} the current scale
7363 */
7364 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleX=function(){
7365 	return this.scaleX;
7366 };
7367 /**
7368 * Sets the layers texture Y scale
7369 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7370 */
7371 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleY=function(value){
7372 	this.matrix=null;
7373 	this.scaleY=value;
7374 	return this;
7375 };
7376 /**
7377 * Gets the layers texture Y scale
7378 * @return {Number} the current scale
7379 */
7380 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleY=function(){
7381 	return this.scaleY;
7382 };
7383 /**
7384 * Sets the layers texture Z scale
7385 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7386 */
7387 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setScaleZ=function(value){
7388 	this.matrix=null;
7389 	this.scaleZ=value;
7390 	return this;
7391 };
7392 /**
7393 * Gets the layers texture Z offset
7394 * @return {Number} the current offset
7395 */
7396 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getScaleZ=function(){
7397 	return this.scaleZ;
7398 };
7399 /**
7400 * Sets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
7401 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7402 */
7403 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleX=function(value){
7404 	this.matrix=null;
7405 	this.dScaleX=value;
7406 	return this;
7407 };
7408 /**
7409 * Gets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
7410 * @return {Number} the current scale
7411 */
7412 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleX=function(){
7413 	return this.dScaleX;
7414 };
7415 /**
7416 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment scale, useful for animation
7417 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7418 */
7419 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleY=function(value){
7420 	this.matrix=null;
7421 	this.dScaleY=value;
7422 	return this;
7423 };
7424 /**
7425 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment scale, useful for animation
7426 * @return {Number} the current scale
7427 */
7428 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleY=function(){
7429 	return this.dScaleY;
7430 };
7431 /**
7432 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment scale, useful for animation
7433 * @param {Number} value the amount to scale the texture
7434 */
7435 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDScaleZ=function(value){
7436 	this.matrix=null;
7437 	this.dScaleZ=value;
7438 	return this;
7439 };
7440 /**
7441 * Gets the layers texture X displacment scale, useful for animation
7442 * @return {Number} the current scale
7443 */
7444 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDScaleZ=function(){
7445 	return this.dScaleZ;
7446 };
7447 
7448 
7449 /**
7450 * Sets the layers texture X Rotation
7451 * @param {Number} value the amount to roate the texture
7452 */
7453 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotX=function(value){
7454 	this.matrix=null;
7455 	this.rotX=value;
7456 	return this;
7457 };
7458 /**
7459 * Gets the layers texture X rotate
7460 * @return {Number} the current rotate
7461 */
7462 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotX=function(){
7463 	return this.rotX;
7464 };
7465 /**
7466 * Sets the layers texture Y rotate
7467 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotate the texture
7468 */
7469 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotY=function(value){
7470 	this.matrix=null;
7471 	this.rotY=value;
7472 	return this;
7473 };
7474 /**
7475 * Gets the layers texture Y rotate
7476 * @return {Number} the current rotate
7477 */
7478 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotY=function(){
7479 	return this.rotY;
7480 };
7481 /**
7482 * Sets the layers texture Z rotate
7483 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotate the texture
7484 */
7485 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setRotZ=function(value){
7486 	this.matrix=null;
7487 	this.rotZ=value;
7488 	return this;
7489 };
7490 /**
7491 * Gets the layers texture Z rotate
7492 * @return {Number} the current rotate
7493 */
7494 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getRotZ=function(){
7495 	return this.rotZ;
7496 };
7497 /**
7498 * Sets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
7499 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotation the texture
7500 */
7501 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotX=function(value){
7502 	this.matrix=null;
7503 	this.dRotX=value;
7504 	return this;
7505 };
7506 /**
7507 * Gets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
7508 * @return {Number} the current rotation
7509 */
7510 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotX=function(){
7511 	return this.dRotX;
7512 };
7513 /**
7514 * Sets the layers texture Y displacment rotation, useful for animation
7515 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotaion the texture
7516 */
7517 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotY=function(value){
7518 	this.matrix=null;
7519 	this.dRotY=value;
7520 	return this;
7521 };
7522 /**
7523 * Gets the layers texture Y displacment rotation, useful for animation
7524 * @return {Number} the current rotation
7525 */
7526 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotY=function(){
7527 	return this.dRotY;
7528 };
7529 /**
7530 * Sets the layers texture Z displacment rotation, useful for animation
7531 * @param {Number} value the amount to rotation the texture
7532 */
7533 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setDRotZ=function(value){
7534 	this.matrix=null;
7535 	this.dRotZ=value;
7536 	return this;
7537 };
7538 /**
7539 * Gets the layers texture X displacment rotation, useful for animation
7540 * @return {Number} the current rotation
7541 */
7542 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getDRotZ=function(){
7543 	return this.dRotZ;
7544 };
7545 
7546 /**
7547 * Sets the layers blending mode
7548 * @param {Number} value the blend mode for the layer
7549 */
7550 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.setBlendMode=function(value){
7551 	this.blendMode=value;
7552 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7553 	return this;
7554 };
7555 /**
7556 * Gets the layers tblending mode
7557 7558 * @return {Number} the blend mode for the layer
7559 */
7560 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getBlendMode=function(){
7561 	return this.blendMode;
7562 };
7563 
7564 
7565 var materialIdx=0;
7566 
7567 /**
7568 * @class The Material class creates materials to be applied to objects in the graphics engine
7569 * @see GLGE.Object
7570 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
7571 * @augments GLGE.QuickNotation
7572 * @augments GLGE.JSONLoader
7573 * @augments GLGE.Events
7574 */
7575 GLGE.Material=function(uid){
7576 	GLGE.Assets.registerAsset(this,uid);
7577 	this.layers=[];
7578 	this.layerlisteners=[];
7579 	this.textures=[];
7580 	this.lights=[];
7581 	this.color={r:1,g:1,b:1,a:1};
7582 	this.specColor={r:1,g:1,b:1};
7583 	this.reflect=0.8;
7584 	this.shine=10;
7585 	this.specular=1;
7586 	this.emit=0;
7587 	this.alpha=1;
7588 	this.materialIdx=materialIdx++;
7589 };
7590 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.Material);
7591 GLGE.augment(GLGE.QuickNotation,GLGE.Material);
7592 GLGE.augment(GLGE.JSONLoader,GLGE.Material);
7593 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Events,GLGE.Material);
7594 
7595 
7596 /**
7597  * @name GLGE.Material#shaderupdate
7598  * @event fires when the shader for this material needs updating
7599  * @param {object} data
7600  */
7601 
7602 /**
7603 * @constant 
7604 * @description Flag for material colour
7605 */
7606 GLGE.M_COLOR=1; 
7607 /**
7608 * @constant 
7609 * @description Flag for material normal
7610 */
7611 GLGE.M_NOR=2;
7612 /**
7613 * @constant 
7614 * @description Flag for material alpha
7615 */
7616 GLGE.M_ALPHA=4; 
7617 /**
7618 * @constant 
7619 * @description Flag for material specular color
7620 */
7621 GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR=8; 
7622 /**
7623 * @constant 
7624 * @description Flag for material specular cvalue
7625 */
7626 GLGE.M_SPECULAR=16;
7627 /**
7628 * @constant 
7629 * @description Flag for material shineiness
7630 */
7631 GLGE.M_SHINE=32; 
7632 /**
7633 * @constant 
7634 * @description Flag for material reflectivity
7635 */
7636 GLGE.M_REFLECT=64;
7637 /**
7638 * @constant 
7639 * @description Flag for material emision
7640 */
7641 GLGE.M_EMIT=128;
7642 /**
7643 * @constant 
7644 * @description Flag for material alpha
7645 */
7646 GLGE.M_ALPHA=256;
7647 /**
7648 * @constant 
7649 * @description Flag for masking with textures red value
7650 */
7651 GLGE.M_MSKR=512;
7652 /**
7653 * @constant 
7654 * @description Flag for masking with textures green value
7655 */
7656 GLGE.M_MSKG=1024;
7657 /**
7658 * @constant 
7659 * @description Flag for masking with textures blue value
7660 */
7661 GLGE.M_MSKB=2048;
7662 /**
7663 * @constant 
7664 * @description Flag for masking with textures alpha value
7665 */
7666 GLGE.M_MSKA=4096;
7667 /**
7668 * @constant 
7669 * @description Flag for mapping of the height in parallax mapping
7670 */
7671 GLGE.M_HEIGHT=8192;
7672 
7673 /**
7674 * @constant 
7675 * @description Flag for mapping of the height in parallax mapping
7676 */
7677 GLGE.M_AMBIENT=16384;
7678 
7679 /**
7680 * @constant 
7681 * @description Enumeration for first UV layer
7682 */
7683 GLGE.UV1=0;
7684 /**
7685 * @constant 
7686 * @description Enumeration for second UV layer
7687 */
7688 GLGE.UV2=1;
7689 /**
7690 * @constant 
7691 * @description Enumeration for normal texture coords
7692 */
7693 GLGE.MAP_NORM=3;
7694 
7695 /**
7696 * @constant 
7697 * @description Enumeration for object texture coords
7698 */
7699 GLGE.MAP_OBJ=4;
7700 
7701 /**
7702 * @constant 
7703 * @description Enumeration for reflection coords
7704 */
7705 GLGE.MAP_REF=5;
7706 
7707 /**
7708 * @constant 
7709 * @description Enumeration for environment coords
7710 */
7711 GLGE.MAP_ENV=6;
7712 
7713 /**
7714 * @constant 
7715 * @description Enumeration for view coords
7716 */
7717 GLGE.MAP_VIEW=7;
7718 
7719 /**
7720 * @constant 
7721 * @description Enumeration for mix blending mode
7722 */
7723 GLGE.BL_MIX=0;
7724 
7725 /**
7726 * @constant 
7727 * @description Enumeration for mix blending mode
7728 */
7729 GLGE.BL_MUL=1;
7730 	
7731 GLGE.Material.prototype.layers=null;
7732 GLGE.Material.prototype.className="Material";
7733 GLGE.Material.prototype.textures=null;
7734 GLGE.Material.prototype.color=null;
7735 GLGE.Material.prototype.specColor=null;
7736 GLGE.Material.prototype.specular=null;
7737 GLGE.Material.prototype.emit=null;
7738 GLGE.Material.prototype.shine=null;
7739 GLGE.Material.prototype.reflect=null;
7740 GLGE.Material.prototype.lights=null;
7741 GLGE.Material.prototype.alpha=null;
7742 GLGE.Material.prototype.ambient=null;
7743 GLGE.Material.prototype.shadow=true;
7744 /**
7745 * Sets the flag indicateing the material should or shouldn't recieve shadows
7746 * @param {boolean} value The recieving shadow flag
7747 */
7748 GLGE.Material.prototype.setShadow=function(value){
7749 	this.shadow=value;
7750 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7751 	return this;
7752 };
7753 /**
7754 * gets the show flag
7755 * @returns {boolean} The shadow flag
7756 */
7757 GLGE.Material.prototype.getShadow=function(value){
7758 	return this.shadow;
7759 };
7760 /**
7761 * Sets the base colour of the material
7762 * @param {string} color The colour of the material
7763 */
7764 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColor=function(color){
7765 	if(!color.r){
7766 		color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
7767 	}
7768 	this.color={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
7769 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7770 	return this;
7771 };
7772 /**
7773 * Sets the red base colour of the material
7774 * @param {Number} r The new red level 0-1
7775 */
7776 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorR=function(value){
7777 	this.color.r=value;
7778 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7779 	return this;
7780 };
7781 /**
7782 * Sets the green base colour of the material
7783 * @param {Number} g The new green level 0-1
7784 */
7785 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorG=function(value){
7786 	this.color.g=value;
7787 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7788 	return this;
7789 };
7790 /**
7791 * Sets the blue base colour of the material
7792 * @param {Number} b The new blue level 0-1
7793 */
7794 GLGE.Material.prototype.setColorB=function(value){
7795 	this.color.b=value;
7796 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7797 	return this;
7798 };
7799 /**
7800 * Gets the current base color of the material
7801 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base color
7802 */
7803 GLGE.Material.prototype.getColor=function(){
7804 	return this.color;
7805 };
7806 /**
7807 * Sets the base specular colour of the material
7808 * @param {string} color The new specular colour
7809 */
7810 GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecularColor=function(color){
7811 	if(!color.r){
7812 		color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
7813 	}
7814 	this.specColor={r:parseFloat(color.r),g:parseFloat(color.g),b:parseFloat(color.b)};
7815 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7816 	return this;
7817 };
7818 /**
7819 * Gets the ambient lighting of the material
7820 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current ambient lighting
7821 */
7822 GLGE.Material.prototype.getAmbient=function(){
7823 	return this.ambient;
7824 };
7825 
7826 
7827 /**
7828 * Sets the ambient lighting of the material
7829 * @param {string} color The new specular colour
7830 */
7831 GLGE.Material.prototype.setAmbient=function(color){
7832 	if(!color.r){
7833 		color=GLGE.colorParse(color);
7834 	}
7835 	this.ambient={r:parseFloat(color.r),g:parseFloat(color.g),b:parseFloat(color.b)};
7836 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7837 	return this;
7838 };
7839 /**
7840 * Gets the current base specular color of the material
7841 * @return {[r,g,b]} The current base specular color
7842 */
7843 GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecularColor=function(){
7844 	return this.specColor;
7845 };
7846 
7847 
7848 /**
7849 * Sets the alpha of the material
7850 * @param {Number} value how much alpha
7851 */
7852 GLGE.Material.prototype.setAlpha=function(value){
7853 	this.alpha=value;
7854 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7855 	return this;
7856 };
7857 /**
7858 * Gets the alpha of the material
7859 * @return {Number} The current alpha of the material
7860 */
7861 GLGE.Material.prototype.getAlpha=function(){
7862 	return this.alpha;
7863 };
7864 /**
7865 * Sets the specular of the material
7866 * @param {Number} value how much specular
7867 */
7868 GLGE.Material.prototype.setSpecular=function(value){
7869 	this.specular=value;
7870 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7871 	return this;
7872 };
7873 /**
7874 * Gets the specular of the material
7875 * @return {Number} The current specular of the material
7876 */
7877 GLGE.Material.prototype.getSpecular=function(){
7878 	return this.specular;
7879 };
7880 /**
7881 * Sets the shininess of the material
7882 * @param {Number} value how much shine
7883 */
7884 GLGE.Material.prototype.setShininess=function(value){
7885 	if (value<=0) value=0.001;
7886 	this.shine=value;
7887 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7888 	return this;
7889 };
7890 /**
7891 * Gets the shininess of the material
7892 * @return {Number} The current shininess of the material
7893 */
7894 GLGE.Material.prototype.getShininess=function(){
7895 	return this.shine;
7896 };
7897 /**
7898 * Sets how much the material should emit
7899 * @param {Number} value how much to emit (0-1)
7900 */
7901 GLGE.Material.prototype.setEmit=function(value){
7902 	this.emit=value;
7903 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7904 	return this;
7905 };
7906 /**
7907 * Gets the amount this material emits
7908 * @return {Number} The emit value for the material
7909 */
7910 GLGE.Material.prototype.getEmit=function(){
7911 	return this.emit;
7912 };
7913 /**
7914 * Sets reflectivity of the material
7915 * @param {Number} value how much to reflect (0-1)
7916 */
7917 GLGE.Material.prototype.setReflectivity=function(value){
7918 	this.reflect=value;
7919 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7920 	return this;
7921 };
7922 /**
7923 * Gets the materials reflectivity
7924 * @return {Number} The reflectivity of the material
7925 */
7926 GLGE.Material.prototype.getReflectivity=function(){
7927 	return this.reflect;
7928 };
7929 
7930 /**
7931 * Sets the material to output with 0 alpha or 1 alpha
7932 * @param {boolean} value binary alpha flag
7933 */
7934 GLGE.Material.prototype.setBinaryAlpha=function(value){
7935 	this.binaryAlpha=value;
7936 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7937 	return this;
7938 };
7939 /**
7940 * Gets the binary alpha flag
7941 * @return {boolean} The binary alpha flag
7942 */
7943 GLGE.Material.prototype.getBinaryAlpha=function(){
7944 	return this.binaryAlpha;
7945 };
7946 
7947 /**
7948 * Add a new layer to the material
7949 * @param {MaterialLayer} layer The material layer to add to the material
7950 */
7951 GLGE.Material.prototype.addMaterialLayer=function(layer){
7952 	if(typeof layer=="string")  layer=GLGE.Assets.get(layer);
7953 	this.layers.push(layer);
7954 	var material=this;
7955 	var listener=function(event){
7956 		material.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7957 	};
7958 	this.layerlisteners.push(listener);
7959 	layer.addEventListener("shaderupdate",listener);
7960 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7961 	return this;
7962 };
7963 
7964 /**
7965 * Removes a layer from the material
7966 * @param {MaterialLayer} layer The material layer to remove
7967 */
7968 GLGE.Material.prototype.removeMaterialLayer=function(layer){
7969 	var idx=this.layers.indexOf(layer);
7970 	if(idx>=0){
7971 		this.layers.splice(idx,1);
7972 		layer.removeEventListener("shaderupdate",this.layerlisteners[idx]);
7973 		this.layerlisteners.splice(idx,1);
7974 		this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
7975 	}
7976 	return this;
7977 };
7978 
7979 /**
7980 * Gets all the materials layers
7981 * @returns {GLGE.MaterialLayer[]} all of the layers contained within this material
7982 */
7983 GLGE.Material.prototype.getLayers=function(){
7984 	return this.layers;
7985 };
7986 /**
7987 * Generate the code required to calculate the texture coords for each layer
7988 * @private
7989 */
7990 GLGE.Material.prototype.getLayerCoords=function(){
7991 		var shader=[];
7992 		shader.push("vec4 texturePos;\n"); 
7993 		for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
7994 			shader.push("textureCoords"+i+"=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"); 
7995 			
7996 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV1 || this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV2){
7997 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(vec2(UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2)+"],(1.0-UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2+1)+"])),1.0,1.0);\n");
7998 			}
7999 			
8000 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_NORM){
8001 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(normalize(n.xyz),1.0);\n");
8002 			}
8003 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_OBJ){
8004 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(normalize(OBJCoord.xyz),1.0);\n");
8005 			}
8006 			
8007 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_REF){
8008 				//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
8009 				shader.push("texturePos=vec4(reflect(normalize(eyevec.xyz),normalize(n.xyz)),1.0);\n");
8010 			}
8011 			
8012 
8013 			
8014 			if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_ENV){
8015 				//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
8016 				shader.push("texturePos=envMat * vec4(reflect(normalize(eyevec.xyz),normalize(n.xyz)),1.0);\n");
8017 			}
8018 			
8019 			shader.push("textureCoords"+i+"=(layer"+i+"Matrix * texturePos).xyz;\n");			
8020 			
8021 		}
8022 		
8023 		return shader.join("");
8024 }
8025 /**
8026 * Generate the fragment shader program for this material
8027 * @private
8028 */
8029 GLGE.Material.prototype.getVertexVarying=function(){
8030 	var shader=[];
8031 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
8032 		shader.push("uniform mat4 layer"+i+"Matrix;\n");  
8033 		shader.push("varying vec3 textureCoords"+i+";\n"); 
8034 	}
8035 	return shader.join("");
8036 }
8037 
8038 GLGE.Material.prototype.registerPasses=function(gl,object){
8039 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
8040 		if(this.textures[i].registerPasses) this.textures[i].registerPasses(gl,object);
8041 	}
8042 }
8043 
8044 /**
8045 * Generate the fragment shader program for this material
8046 * @private
8047 */
8048 GLGE.Material.prototype.getFragmentShader=function(lights){
8049 	var shader="#ifdef GL_ES\nprecision highp float;\n#endif\n";
8050 	var tangent=false;
8051 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
8052 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
8053 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightvec"+i+";\n"; 
8054 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightpos"+i+";\n"; 
8055 			shader=shader+"varying float lightdist"+i+";\n";  
8056 			shader=shader+"varying vec2 spotCoords"+i+";\n"; 
8057 		}
8058 	}
8059 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 n;\n";  
8060 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 t;\n";  
8061 	shader=shader+"varying vec4 UVCoord;\n";
8062 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 eyevec;\n"; 
8063 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 OBJCoord;\n";
8064 
8065 	//texture uniforms
8066 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
8067 		if(this.textures[i].className=="Texture") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
8068 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureCanvas") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
8069 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureVideo") shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
8070 		if(this.textures[i].className=="TextureCube") shader=shader+"uniform samplerCube TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
8071 	}
8072 	
8073 	var cnt=0;
8074 	var shadowlights=[];
8075 	var num;
8076 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
8077 8078 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightcolor"+i+";\n";  
8079 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightAttenuation"+i+";\n";  
8080 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotCosCutOff"+i+";\n";  
8081 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotExp"+i+";\n";  
8082 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightdir"+i+";\n";  
8083 			shader=shader+"uniform mat4 lightmat"+i+";\n";
8084 			shader=shader+"uniform float shadowbias"+i+";\n"; 
8085 			shader=shader+"uniform int shadowsamples"+i+";\n";  
8086 			shader=shader+"uniform float shadowsoftness"+i+";\n";  
8087 			shader=shader+"uniform bool castshadows"+i+";\n";  
8088 			shader=shader+"varying vec4 spotcoord"+i+";\n";  
8089 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
8090 				num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
8091 				shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+num+";\n";
8092 				shadowlights[i]=num;
8093 			}
8094 	}
8095 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){		
8096 		shader=shader+"varying vec3 textureCoords"+i+";\n";
8097 		shader=shader+"uniform float layeralpha"+i+";\n";
8098 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_HEIGHT) == GLGE.M_HEIGHT){
8099 			shader=shader+"uniform float layerheight"+i+";\n";
8100 		}
8101 8102 	}
8103 	
8104 	shader=shader+"uniform vec4 baseColor;\n";
8105 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 specColor;\n";
8106 	shader=shader+"uniform float shine;\n";
8107 	shader=shader+"uniform float specular;\n";
8108 	shader=shader+"uniform float reflective;\n";
8109 	shader=shader+"uniform float emit;\n";
8110 	shader=shader+"uniform float alpha;\n";
8111 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 amb;\n";
8112 	shader=shader+"uniform float fognear;\n";
8113 	shader=shader+"uniform float fogfar;\n";
8114 	shader=shader+"uniform int fogtype;\n";
8115 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 fogcolor;\n";
8116 	shader=shader+"uniform float far;\n";
8117 	shader=shader+"uniform mat4 worldInverseTranspose;\n"; 
8118 	shader=shader+"uniform mat4 projection;\n"; 
8119     
8120 	shader=shader+"void main(void)\n";
8121 	shader=shader+"{\n";
8122 	shader=shader+"float att;\n"; 
8123 	shader=shader+"int texture;\n"; 
8124 	shader=shader+"float mask=1.0;\n";
8125 	shader=shader+"float spec=specular;\n"; 
8126 	shader=shader+"vec3 specC=specColor;\n"; 
8127 	shader=shader+"vec4 view;\n"; 
8128 	shader=shader+"vec3 textureCoords=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
8129 	shader=shader+"float ref=reflective;\n";
8130 	shader=shader+"float sh=shine;\n"; 
8131 	shader=shader+"float em=emit;\n"; 
8132 	shader=shader+"float al=alpha;\n"; 
8133 	shader=shader+"vec3 amblight=amb;\n"; 
8134 	shader=shader+"vec4 normalmap= vec4(n,0.0);\n"
8135 	shader=shader+"vec4 color = baseColor;"; //set the initial color
8136 	shader=shader+"float pheight=0.0;\n"
8137 	shader=shader+"vec3 textureHeight=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n";
8138 	shader=shader+"vec3 normal = normalize(n);\n";
8139 	shader=shader+"vec3 b = vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n";
8140 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
8141 		shader=shader+"textureCoords=textureCoords"+i+"+textureHeight;\n";
8142 		shader=shader+"mask=layeralpha"+i+"*mask;\n";
8143 		
8144 		if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_VIEW){
8145 			//will need to do in fragment to take the normal maps into account!
8146 			shader=shader+"view=projection * vec4(-eyevec,1.0);\n";
8147 			shader=shader+"textureCoords=view.xyz/view.w*0.5+0.5;\n";
8148 			shader=shader+"textureCoords=textureCoords+textureHeight;\n";
8149 		}
8150 			
8151 		if(this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="Texture" || this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="TextureCanvas"  || this.layers[i].getTexture().className=="TextureVideo" ){
8152 			var txcoord="xy";
8153 			var sampletype="2D";
8154 		}else{
8155 			var txcoord="xyz";
8156 			var sampletype="Cube";
8157 		}
8158 		
8159 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_COLOR) == GLGE.M_COLOR){			
8160 			if(this.layers[i].blendMode==GLGE.BL_MUL){
8161 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + color*texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
8162 			}
8163 			else 
8164 			{
8165 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
8166 			}
8167 		}        
8168 		
8169 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_HEIGHT) == GLGE.M_HEIGHT){
8170 			//do paralax stuff
8171 			shader=shader+"pheight = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").x;\n";
8172 			shader=shader+"textureHeight =vec3((layerheight"+i+"* (pheight-0.5)  * normalize(teyevec).xy*vec2(1.0,-1.0)),0.0);\n";
8173 		}
8174 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR) == GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR){
8175 			shader=shader+"specC = specC*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").rgb*mask;\n";
8176 		}
8177 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKR) == GLGE.M_MSKR){
8178 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r;\n";
8179 		}
8180 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKG) == GLGE.M_MSKG){
8181 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").g;\n";
8182 		}
8183 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKB) == GLGE.M_MSKB){
8184 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").b;\n";
8185 		}
8186 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKA) == GLGE.M_MSKA){
8187 			shader=shader+"mask = texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").a;\n";
8188 		}
8189 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECULAR) == GLGE.M_SPECULAR){
8190 			shader=shader+"spec = spec*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r*mask;\n";
8191 		}
8192 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_REFLECT) == GLGE.M_REFLECT){
8193 			shader=shader+"ref = ref*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").g*mask;\n";
8194 		}
8195 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SHINE) == GLGE.M_SHINE){
8196 			shader=shader+"sh = sh*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").b*mask*255.0;\n";
8197 		}
8198 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_EMIT) == GLGE.M_EMIT){
8199 			shader=shader+"em = em*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").r*mask;\n";
8200 		}
8201 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_NOR) == GLGE.M_NOR){
8202 			shader=shader+"normalmap = normalmap*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+")*mask;\n";
8203 			shader=shader+"normal = normalmap.rgb;\n";
8204 			shader=shader+"normal = 2.0*(vec3(normal.r, -normal.g, normal.b) - vec3(0.5, -0.5, 0.5));";
8205 			shader=shader+"b=normalize(cross(t.xyz,n));\n";
8206 			shader=shader+"normal = normal.x*t + normal.y*b + normal.z*n;";
8207 			shader=shader+"normal = normalize(normal);";
8208 		}
8209 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_ALPHA) == GLGE.M_ALPHA){
8210 			shader=shader+"al = al*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").a*mask;\n";
8211 		}
8212 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_AMBIENT) == GLGE.M_AMBIENT){
8213 			shader=shader+"amblight = amblight*(1.0-mask) + texture"+sampletype+"(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords."+txcoord+").rgb*mask;\n";
8214 		}
8215 	}		
8216 	shader=shader+"if(al<0.5) discard;\n";
8217 	if(this.binaryAlpha) shader=shader+"al=1.0;\n";
8218 
8219 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvalue=amblight;\n"; 
8220 	//shader=shader+"vec3 specvalue=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
8221 	shader=shader+"float dotN,spotEffect;";
8222 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
8223 	shader=shader+"vec3 viewvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
8224 	shader=shader+"vec3 specvalue=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
8225 	shader=shader+"vec2 scoord=vec2(0.0,0.0);";
8226 	shader=shader+"float spotmul=0.0;";
8227 	shader=shader+"float rnd=0.0;";
8228 	shader=shader+"float spotsampleX=0.0;";
8229 	shader=shader+"float spotsampleY=0.0;";
8230 	shader=shader+"float totalweight=0.0;";
8231 	shader=shader+"int cnt=0;";
8232     shader=shader+"float specularSmoothStepValue=.125;\n";
8233 	shader=shader+"vec2 spotoffset=vec2(0.0,0.0);";
8234 	shader=shader+"float dp=0.0;";
8235 	shader=shader+"if (normal.z<0.0) {normal.z=0.0;}\n";
8236 	shader=shader+"normal/=length(normal);\n";
8237 		
8238     
8239 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
8240 	
8241 		shader=shader+"lightvec=lightvec"+i+";\n";  
8242 		shader=shader+"viewvec=eyevec;\n"; 
8243 		
8244 		//shader=shader+"dp=dot(normal.rgb,eyevec.xyz); if (dp<0.0){(normal-=dp*eyevec/length(eyevec)); normal/=length(normal);}";
8245 		
8246 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT){ 
8247 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
8248 			shader=shader+"att = 1.0 / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
8249 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
8250 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
8251 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
8252 			}
8253 			shader=shader+"}\n";
8254 			if(lights[i].specular){
8255 				shader=shader+"specvalue += smoothstep(-specularSmoothStepValue,specularSmoothStepValue,dotN)*att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), 0.3*sh);\n";
8256 			}
8257 			
8258 8259 			
8260 			
8261 		}
8262 		shader=shader+"spotEffect = 0.0;\n";
8263 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT){
8264 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = dot(normalize(lightdir"+i+"), normalize(-lightvec"+i+"));";	
8265 			shader=shader+"if (spotEffect > spotCosCutOff"+i+") {\n";		
8266 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = pow(spotEffect, spotExp"+i+");";
8267 			//spot shadow stuff
8268 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
8269 				shader=shader+"scoord=(((spotcoord"+i+".xy)/spotcoord"+i+".w)+1.0)/2.0;\n";
8270 				shader=shader+"if(scoord.x>0.0 && scoord.x<1.0 && scoord.y>0.0 && scoord.y<1.0){\n";
8271 				shader=shader+"vec4 dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", scoord);\n";
8272 				shader=shader+"float depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*"+lights[i].distance+".0;\n";
8273 				shader=shader+"spotmul=0.0;\n";
8274 				shader=shader+"totalweight=0.0;\n";
8275 				shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0) {spotmul=1.0; totalweight=1.0;}\n";
8276 				if(lights[i].samples>0){
8277 					shader=shader+"for(int cnt=0; cnt<4; cnt++){;\n";
8278 						shader=shader+"spotsampleX=-0.707106781;spotsampleY=-0.707106781;\n"; 
8279 						shader=shader+"if(cnt==0 || cnt==3) spotsampleX=0.707106781;\n"; 
8280 						shader=shader+"if(cnt==1 || cnt==3) spotsampleY=0.707106781;\n"; 
8281 						shader=shader+"spotoffset=vec2(spotsampleX,spotsampleY)*0.5;\n";
8282 						shader=shader+"dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", scoord+spotoffset*shadowsoftness"+i+");\n";
8283 						shader=shader+"depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*"+lights[i].distance+".0;\n";
8284 						shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0){\n";
8285 						shader=shader+"spotmul+=length(spotoffset);\n";
8286 						shader=shader+"}\n";
8287 						shader=shader+"totalweight+=length(spotoffset);\n";
8288 					shader=shader+"};\n";
8289 				
8290 					shader=shader+"if(totalweight!=spotmul){\n";
8291 						shader=shader+"spotmul=0.0;\n";
8292 						shader=shader+"totalweight=0.0;\n";
8293 						shader=shader+"for(int cnt=0; cnt<"+lights[i].samples+"; cnt++){;\n"; 
8294 							shader=shader+"rnd=(fract(sin(dot(scoord,vec2(12.9898,78.233))) * 43758.5453)-0.5)*2.0;\n"; //generate random number
8295 							//shader=shader+"spotsampleY=(fract(sin(dot(spotcoord"+i+".yz + vec2(float(cnt)),vec2(12.9898,78.233))) * 43758.5453)-0.5)*2.0;\n"; //generate random number
8296 							shader=shader+"spotsampleX=cos(float(cnt)*"+(360/lights[i].samples).toFixed(2)+"+rnd);\n";
8297 							shader=shader+"spotsampleY=sin(float(cnt)*"+(360/lights[i].samples).toFixed(2)+"+rnd);\n"; 
8298 							shader=shader+"spotoffset=vec2(spotsampleX,spotsampleY)*0.5;\n";
8299 							shader=shader+"dist=texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", scoord+spotoffset*shadowsoftness"+i+");\n";
8300 							shader=shader+"depth = dot(dist, vec4(0.000000059604644775390625,0.0000152587890625,0.00390625,1.0))*"+lights[i].distance+".0;\n";
8301 							shader=shader+"if((depth+shadowbias"+i+"-length(lightvec"+i+"))<0.0){\n";
8302 							shader=shader+"spotmul+=length(spotoffset);\n";
8303 							shader=shader+"}\n";
8304 							shader=shader+"totalweight+=length(spotoffset);\n";
8305 						shader=shader+"};\n";
8306 					shader=shader+"}\n";
8307 				}
8308 				shader=shader+"if(totalweight>0.0) spotEffect=spotEffect*pow(1.0-spotmul/totalweight,3.0);\n";
8309 				shader=shader+"}\n";
8310 			}
8311 			//shader=shader+"color=vec4(vec3(spotEffect),1.0);\n";
8312 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";  
8313 			
8314 			if(lights[i].negativeShadow){
8315 				shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
8316 				if(lights[i].diffuse){
8317 					shader=shader+"lightvalue -= (1.0-spotEffect) / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
8318 				}
8319 				shader=shader+"}\n";
8320 			}else{     
8321 				shader=shader+"att = spotEffect / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
8322 			
8323 				shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
8324 				if(lights[i].diffuse){
8325 					shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
8326 				}
8327 				shader=shader+"}\n";
8328 				if(lights[i].specular){
8329 				    shader=shader+"specvalue += smoothstep(-specularSmoothStepValue,specularSmoothStepValue,dotN) * att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), 0.3 * sh);\n";
8330 				}
8331 			}
8332 			
8333 			
8334 			shader=shader+"}\n";
8335 		}
8336 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
8337 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,-normalize(lightvec)),0.0);\n";    
8338 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
8339 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
8340 			}
8341 			if(lights[i].specular){
8342 				shader=shader+"specvalue += smoothstep(-specularSmoothStepValue,specularSmoothStepValue,dotN) * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), 0.3 * sh);\n";
8343 			}
8344 		}
8345 	}
8346 	shader=shader+"float fogfact=1.0;";
8347 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_QUADRATIC+") fogfact=clamp(pow(max((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0),2.0),0.0,1.0);\n";
8348 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_LINEAR+") fogfact=clamp((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0,1.0);\n";
8349 	
8350 	shader=shader+"lightvalue = (lightvalue)*ref;\n";
8351 	shader=shader+"if(em>0.0){lightvalue=vec3(1.0,1.0,1.0);  fogfact=1.0;}\n";
8352 	shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =vec4(specvalue.rgb+color.rgb*(em+1.0)*lightvalue.rgb,al)*fogfact+vec4(fogcolor,al)*(1.0-fogfact);\n";
8353 	//shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =vec4(vec3(color.rgb),1.0);\n";
8354 
8355 	shader=shader+"}\n";
8356 
8357 	return shader;
8358 };
8359 /**
8360 * Set the uniforms needed to render this material
8361 * @private
8362 */
8363 GLGE.Material.prototype.textureUniforms=function(gl,shaderProgram,lights,object){
8364 	if(this.animation) this.animate();
8365 	var pc=shaderProgram.caches;
8366 		
8367 	if(pc.baseColor!=this.color){
8368 		if(this.ccache!=this.color){
8369 			this.ccache=this.color;
8370 			this.glColor=new Float32Array([this.color.r,this.color.g,this.color.b,this.color.a]);
8371 		}
8372 		gl.uniform4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "baseColor"), this.glColor);
8373 		pc.baseColor=this.color;
8374 	}
8375 	if(pc.specColor!=this.specColor){
8376 		if(this.sccache!=this.specColor){
8377 			this.sccache=this.specColor;
8378 			this.glspecColor=new Float32Array([this.specColor.r,this.specColor.g,this.specColor.b]);
8379 		}
8380 		gl.uniform3fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specColor"), this.glspecColor);
8381 		pc.specColor=this.specColor;
8382 	}
8383 	if(pc.specular!=this.specular){
8384 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specular"), this.specular);
8385 		pc.specular=this.specular;
8386 	}
8387 	if(pc.shine!=this.shine){
8388 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shine"), this.shine);
8389 		pc.shine=this.shine;
8390 	}
8391 	if(pc.reflect!=this.reflect){
8392 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "reflective"), this.reflect);
8393 		pc.reflect=this.reflect;
8394 	}
8395 	if(pc.emit!=this.emit){
8396 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "emit"), this.emit);
8397 		pc.emit=this.emit;
8398 	}
8399 	if(pc.alpha!=this.alpha){
8400 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "alpha"), this.alpha);
8401 		pc.alpha=this.alpha;
8402 	}
8403 	
8404 	/*
8405 	if(this.ambient && pc.ambient!=this.ambient){
8406 		gl.uniform3fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "amb"), new Float32Array([this.ambient.r,this.ambient.g,this.ambient.b]));
8407 8408 		pc.ambient=this.ambient;
8409 	}
8410 	*/
8411 	var cnt=0;
8412 	var num=0;
8413 	if(!pc["lightcolor"]){
8414 		pc["lightcolor"]=[];
8415 		pc["lightAttenuation"]=[];
8416 		pc["spotCosCutOff"]=[];
8417 		pc["spotExponent"]=[];
8418 		pc["shadowbias"]=[];
8419 		pc["castshadows"]=[];
8420 		pc["shadowsamples"]=[];
8421 		pc["shadowsoftness"]=[];
8422 	}
8423 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
8424 		if(pc["lightcolor"][i]!=lights[i].color){
8425 			GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightcolor"+i), lights[i].color.r,lights[i].color.g,lights[i].color.b);
8426 			pc["lightcolor"][i]=lights[i].color;
8427 		}
8428 		if(pc["lightAttenuation"][i]!=lights[i].constantAttenuation){
8429 			GLGE.setUniform3(gl,"3f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightAttenuation"+i), lights[i].constantAttenuation,lights[i].linearAttenuation,lights[i].quadraticAttenuation);
8430 			pc["lightAttenuation"][i]=lights[i].constantAttenuation;
8431 		}
8432 		if(pc["spotCosCutOff"][i]!=lights[i].spotCosCutOff){
8433 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotCosCutOff"+i), lights[i].spotCosCutOff);
8434 			pc["spotCosCutOff"][i]=lights[i].spotCosCutOff;
8435 		}
8436 		if(pc["spotExponent"][i]!=lights[i].spotExponent){
8437 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotExp"+i), lights[i].spotExponent);
8438 			pc["spotExponent"][i]=lights[i].spotExponent;
8439 			
8440 		}
8441 		if(pc["shadowbias"][i]!=lights[i].shadowBias){
8442 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowbias"+i), lights[i].shadowBias);
8443 			pc["shadowbias"][i]=lights[i].shadowBias;
8444 		}
8445 		if(pc["shadowsoftness"][i]!=lights[i].softness){
8446 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowsoftness"+i), lights[i].softness);
8447 			pc["shadowsoftness"][i]=lights[i].softness;
8448 		}
8449 		    
8450 		//shadow code
8451 		if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow && this.emit==0) {
8452 			num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
8453 			gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+num]);
8454 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, lights[i].texture);
8455 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+num), num);
8456 		}
8457 	
8458 			
8459 	}
8460 	
8461 	if(!shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat) shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat=[];
8462 	
8463 
8464 		
8465 	var scale,offset;
8466 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
8467 		if(this.layers[i].animation) this.layers[i].animate();
8468 		scale=this.layers[i].getScale();
8469 		offset=this.layers[i].getOffset();		
8470 		if(!shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]) shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]=new Float32Array(this.layers[i].getMatrix());
8471 			else GLGE.mat4gl(this.layers[i].getMatrix(),shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]);	
8472 		
8473 		try{GLGE.setUniformMatrix(gl,"Matrix4fv",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layer"+i+"Matrix"), true, shaderProgram.glarrays.layermat[i]);}catch(e){}
8474 		
8475 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layeralpha"+i), this.layers[i].getAlpha());
8476 		GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1f",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layerheight"+i), this.layers[i].getHeight());
8477 	}
8478     
8479 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
8480 		
8481 			gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+i]);
8482 			if(this.textures[i].doTexture(gl,object)){
8483 			}
8484 			GLGE.setUniform(gl,"1i",GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+i), i);
8485 	}	
8486 
8487 };
8488 /**
8489 * Adds a new texture to this material
8490 * @param {String} image URL of the image to be used by the texture
8491 * @return {Number} index of the new texture
8492 */
8493 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture=function(texture){	
8494 	if(typeof texture=="string")  texture=GLGE.Assets.get(texture);
8495 	this.textures.push(texture);
8496 	texture.idx=this.textures.length-1;
8497 	this.fireEvent("shaderupdate",{});
8498 	return this;
8499 };
8500 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCube=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
8501 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCamera=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
8502 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureCanvas=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
8503 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTextureVideo=GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture;
8504 
8505 
8506 
8507 })(GLGE);
8508 
8509 
8510
